115121111112122.content:
It was utterly impossible... beyond all belief... but nonetheless, before you laid an incredibly immense wall of flesh, a towering pedal digit eclipsing your minuscule form like some pungent living mountain. The tangy scent of your sister's feet surrounded you like a funky miasma, penetrating your senses and nearly rendering you mindless and physically ill. Shaken, you collapsed to your knees, gripping the fuzzy carpet fiber beneath you like a life preserver... and fervently wishing that the expansive plain were in fact the wide grassy hillside it seemed like and not the small singular loop of synthetic material. Similar "hills" stretched outward in all directions, forming a bizarre bumpy landscape interrupted solely by your sister's mountainous toes.

Of course, if her toes were as tall as skyscrapers...

You gulped and, almost unwillingly, craned your neck to look over the tops of those imposing digits.

This time, your mind did shut down. If your sister's toes were merely the height of skyscrapers, then her face was as wide as an entire city, as expansive as a lake. Her entire body, what you could see, stretched beyond your means to estimate in terms of relative size. You were literally microscopic in comparison. Could anything about your situation possibly get any worse?

As a sign that the fates were indeed malicious, a dull rumble thundered, and you watched in sheer terror as your sister bent down, her face looming ever greater across your entire field of vision. Her eyes danced about, obviously searching for something. You remained motionless, incapable of conscious reaction, wondering whether or not being found at this point would be advantageous if only for the peace of mind from knowing that you could at least still be seen.

...and then her gaze froze... and you had the disturbing sensation that she was staring directly at the carpet fiber bearing your tiny body...

"Oh wow..."

Even at an awed whisper, the statement was terribly loud. Still, the blood suddenly pounding through your skull blunted the pain in your ears... the slow grin spreading across your sister's face being the cause of your sudden surge of adrenaline and horror-laced anticipation. She began giggling, sending tremors through your frozen body, before adding in an extremely satisfied murmur...
115121111112122.title: Dwarfed by Her Skyscraper Toes

choices: Run away and hope something else can restore you
Go to your sister's foot and climb on
1151211111121221.content:
"Wow, he really shrank away to nothing! So long, 'little' brother!"

You blinked.

Slowly, your sister brought a finger to her chin. Tapping out a steady rhythm with that one extended digit, she mused aloud, "I wonder what I should tell mom..."

Her voice was deafening. Each word felt like running face-first into a brick wall, the sheer percussive force making it hard to breathe.

Her brows furrowed for a moment, a comical image had it not occupied the greater portion of your 'sky' so to speak. "She won't believe he's hanging with his friends forever... Maybe I'll just say I found out he died some stupid way..."

Good grief, couldn't she even come up with a believeable lie? you wondered numbly, mouth dropping as you realized how little your sister cared for you. If she were this quick to develop a story concerning your demise...

But your mind was already pondering a different concept, while desperately shelving such disquieting thoughts as your extremely minuscule size and the sheer inhumanity of your sister's desire to reduce you to nothingness and revel in your disappearance. You'd been observing the phenomenon ever since you arrived at your new stature, though your brain was only now catching up with the data your eyes had been transmitting.

For some reason, everything seemed to be happening in slow motion.

You blinked again, the thought bouncing around in your cranium, as you considered anew your sister's actions. She moved her finger from her chin and stood upright, but to you the action took far longer than your sister, the hyperactive little sugar addict, would normally take. You could almost sense your mind coming to terms with your current situation, even as your gargantuan younger sibling stood fully erect, a movement which to you seemed to last a minute or so at least. Maybe--

A horrible rumbling again shook the air, and this time you finally reacted, leaping away from the sound of crumbling rock and earth...

But it was only your sister barely shifting her toes, her enormous digits shuffling the numerous tufts of carpet. Shuffling extremely slowly.

You took only a moment, but you understood -- despite your size, or perhaps because of it, you were perceiving the real world much faster than you normally would. Perhaps it was because your brain was smaller, meaning the synapses and electrons had less distance to move and react? At any rate, now you still had a chance of recouping your losses... Now you could theoretically react faster than your sister.

Still, you had to actually move faster than she could... something still astronomically difficult with your limited speed and mobility...

Wait...

You took another moment to look around.

Hadn't you been on that other tuft of carpet...?

You grinned. It seemed that your muscles could react better than normal too, propelling your much lighter body many more times further than usual... again, compared to your normal frame of reference. Still, that meant you could play ninja at this microscopic stage; having an extremely tiny, but more importantly light, body meant that you could hurl yourself much further than normal!

You couldn't help it. Testing your balance, you took a few hops around, marveling at the comparatively long distances you were striding. It was merely from one tuft of carpet to the next, yet you could picture yourself as some kind of human flea, bounding quickly across the vast landscape. Despite your circumstances, you felt a sliver of confidence return, thanks to your microscopic yet superhuman abilities. You struck out with a flying kick, just for the hell of it, before landing in a mock combat crouch you quickly modeled after those martial arts movies of old you infrequently watched.

I ain't powerless just yet! I'll show that little brat not to play with me!

But that was a rather daunting claim to make. What could you possibly do in this situation? You took another look at your gargantuan sister.

She seemed completely unaware... naturally, but she still seemed to be lingering far longer than normal. Could she possibly suspect that you were still alive?

No matter. There were only a few survival options available given your size. Either you could run away and hope that something else could restore you to normal, or you could stay close to your sister, gambling that you could find a cure if you stuck around.

But staying with your sister... Right now, one step and she would be gone, covering far more distance than you could in the same amount of time. You'd have to physically hang on to her person... and at this height, there was exactly one way of scaling her body. It meant climbing her skyscraper-tall toes... despite the fact that evidence proved they did indeed have the power to shrink you.

Still... if you wanted to spy on your sister for a solution, what choice did you have?
1151211111121221.title: Microscopic and Presumed Dead

choices: You don't shrink much and manage to reach her ankles
You miscalculated and you're shrinking faster than you can move
11512111111212212.content:
You gritted your teeth.

There really was only one proactive option. Running away and hiding about... what could that really solve, in the long run? In the end, you'd still be waiting for forces outside your control to save you.

No, right now, you'd feel no safer than attempting to solve this problem yourself.

No matter the consequences.

There had to be some method for restoring your height, even if you had to pry it from your sister yourself.

Still...

You took a moment, gazing up at the enormous young girl. She still seemed deep in thought, and despite the fact that she was unaware of your continued existence, and that you could probably move faster than she would anticipate, there was little chance that you could make significant headway without her cooperation... or the luck of the gods.

Therein lain the rub... There really was only one way you could remain close to your sister: by climbing her already colossal toes and feet, hopefully reaching her legs before you could shrink any further. Assuming that whatever magical power your sister possessed didn't reach beyond her ankles -- this was well outside your comfort zone, but there was also little opportunity to explore all possible options. There really was only one course of action, consequences be damned.

Still, no reason to linger... It was already proven that her feet could shrink your body. But maybe if you moved quickly enough, you'd be able to escape catastrophe.

It was worth a shot, right?

You crouched down, took a microscopic yet super-powered leap as high as possible, and managed to snag a rough fold of skin nearly halfway up the side of your sister's right largest toe. Grimacing at the onset of a very familiar tingle, you leaned back before pulling yourself forward, propelling your body up and over the rough edge of one hulking painted toenail.

The vast landscape of your sister's feet stretched out before you, a sloping flesh-colored plain the length of your whole city. Normally, it would take the better part of an afternoon just to walk or jog from one end to the other, but you'd never been capable of leaping entire city blocks with minimal effort before...

You furrowed your brow in determination as you landed on the diamond-hard curve of your sister's toenail. Feeling the tingling once more and fighting off the miasma of foot stink, you leapt forward toward your sister's ankles.
11512111111212212.title: Risking a Colossal Climb

choices: Your sister commands you to honor her earlier "request"
Your mother enters the room, looking for you
1151211111121222.content:
"So, have you learned your lesson, my tiny dust mite brother?"

You gasped, eyes widening and jaw dropping, as the blood previously pounding through your skull suddenly drained to pool at your feet.

Your sister's giggles trailed off and she smirked. "Oh, believe it, micro-bro... I can see you... and that stupid expression on your face!" She crossed her arms in triumph. "It took me a moment, but I found you after all. Guess my special powers let me keep track of all the microbes I create!" She began giggling again.

Fantastic. She was developing a god complex. Not that it was entirely unwarranted, given the bizarre shrinking powers of her feet, but it certainly complicated any short term plans to regain your original height... or any long term plans, for that matter. You grimaced, glancing up at the indescribably enormous visage of your younger sister and the intimidating mountain ranges that were her feet.

"You're almost too small for anything now," she playfully chided as her colossal toes wiggled and danced on the carpet fibers to either side of you. Though dainty in a normal sense, they still resembled gigantic wrecking balls as they relentlessly pounded everything in your vicinity. Mentally you were a limp pile of spaghetti noodles, but thankfully your clenched fingers firmly held your entire body rigid atop your swaying synthetic carpet hill. After a few moments of fidgeting - which honestly seemed like half an hour or more to you - she paused in her pedal digit threatening.

"Maybe you'll be more interesting if I had more stuff to compare you to," she suddenly blurted, a focused expression on her face.

You froze, allowing your younger sister's enormous fingers to capture your minuscule body atop your carpet fiber. Though the pressure exerted by her thumb and forefinger were more than enough to completely pin you in place, you thankfully weren't compressed into a thin sheet of organic material. Her strange foot power had definitely decreased your size, but you had somehow become more resilient in the exchange.

You certainly weren't willing to accept that alteration, though. The current situation was intolerable, and you wanted your regular height and strength back.

Before you could voice your objections though, your sister started to bounce you around her room, parading your body before an endless line of gigantic LEGO figures and Brobdingnagian dolls that seemed to tower over your utterly insignificant figure. After laughingly comparing you to the colossal nose of her favorite stuffed bear, she placed you atop the toes of a Barbie doll, which were still over 30 times your size.

"Oh no, 'Ken'," she exaggeratedly gasped, the curling of her lips betraying her amusement well beyond the sarcasm in her voice. "However will you satisfy your beloved Barbie now?"

You honestly tried to ignore the question, given how close to home it hit. You hadn't thought much of girlfriends since the beginning of this debacle, as much as you wanted an incredible lady friend before, and you were under no illusions that any dating relationship would continue as normal under the circumstances. As far as you were concerned, "Barbie" could go fuck herself. There was no helping the situation until you were back to your regular size. After a brief glance back at your overbearing sister, you darted away from the doll's legs, despite the utter futility of your endeavors.

Your sister let you "escape" about an inch or two - at least a football field in length from your perspective - before she moved to recapture you between her fingers. She held you up near her immense nose, a mockingly disappointed expression on her young face. "Aww... what's wrong, 'Ken'? Didn't you want to stay with the girl of your dreams?"

You hung quietly in your sister's grasp, not willing to rise to her bait.

After a few long moments of silence, she smirked. "Ah... I see how it is, bro. Fine, no playing around any more. Let's move on to the next order of business..."
1151211111121222.title: Adventures of the Human Dust Mite

choices: You acquiesce; there's really no other option
You refuse again; what else can she do to you anyway?
11512111111212221.content:
"Speaking of which, I'd almost forgotten..." A wide grin spread across your younger sister's face, and you swallowed heavily. She lazily shifted one of her massive feet, bringing the big toe to nudge her clenched fingers, with you barely out of range. Her grin widened.

"I'd ordered you to lick my toes earlier. Are you gonna refuse again?"

Your eyes widened as you stared at that enormous digit for an extremely long length of time, your mind having shut down. Numbly, after a small huff of air (a freaking hurricane from your perspective), you glanced upward at the enormous sky-filled billboard that was your sister's impatient face. Though it should have been impossible for her to focus on you, being as small as you were (damn it all!), she easily zeroed in on your panicked visage.

"Oh yeah," she smirked, haughtily folding her arms though still keeping you within sight... and within reach of her shrink-inducing toes. "Thought I'd forgotten, didn't ya? Well, you still haven't paid me proper respect like I asked, so I'm gonna tell ya again. Ya gotta lick my toes, 'big' brother!"

You flailed about for a moment, gawking mindlessly at your obstinate younger sister, though you couldn't completely free both your arms. "Wait, wait, didn't you already... you know, punish me for that? Already?" You glanced meaningfully at her gigantic feet, still within shrinking range.

The enormous little girl rolled her eyes, drumming her fingers against said reducing digits before fixing you with both a glare and a pointed finger. "Listen, bro. I make the rules here. ME! And if I say that you haven't done enough, then that's that! And I say that you still gotta worship my feet! Just gettin' punished ain't enough! I gotta know that you actually love my giant feet now! So... show me some love, bro! Right here!" Excitedly, she shoved her clenched fingers, containing your shrunken figure, between both her feet. The soles of her body pedal features covered your entire field of view, yet you could still hear your sister excitedly shout, "Come on, bro! Just give me a few kisses on both my feet, and I'll consider your debt repaid! But I gotta feel it, or it won't count!"

You sat there for a very long moment, clenched between your younger sister's fingers and within a stone's throw (for you) of her enormous feet. Surely, if you refused, you would be shrunk again, or perhaps even crushed completely. Even so, neither option really carried much negative weight any more, given your current size. After all, if your sister crushed you, then you'd be relieved of your current misery. Yeah, you'd be dead, but it was almost preferable to being toyed with this way. And if your sister simply shrank you, then you would be in the same boat as before, only smaller... which wasn't that much different at this scale. Shrinking even smaller wouldn't really affect you any more, right? In fact, it'd make it even harder for your sister to spot you.

Still, you would definitely like to return to normal size at some point, and at the moment, the only person with even the remote possible capability was your demanding, Lilliputian-creating younger sister. Perhaps if you continued to agree to her demands, she would return you to normal. Certainly, it was an outside chance, but so was becoming "normal" by refusing her wishes and fighting back.

The options, then, involved "wishes" and "results" weighed against "personal satisfaction" and the potential for regaining your size through audacity. So, how would you address the call to worship your younger sister's feet?
11512111111212221.title: Dwelling on Unfinished Business

choices: The foot-scented spit makes you shrink even more, albeit slower than earlier
Your sister covers the glass and leaves you trapped and treading spittle
115121111112122212.content:
Even under these extreme circumstances, you weren't going to bow down before your sister and kiss her feet, despite the very real threat of additional shrinking beyond the infinitesimal. There was simply no stopping her from doing whatever she wished to you, so you figured you'd try and maintain some pride and dignity (what little there could be had) here at your microscopic juncture. So, you thinned your lips in resolution, glared darkly at the eternal walls of foot flesh before you, and kept absolutely still.

After about a minute or two, you heard the lilting voice of your sister again. "I'm not feeling any worship, 'big' bro! Are you even trying, or are you just so tiny I can't even feel it anymore?" She giggled at the thought.

You remained stoic, again not rising to her bait.

Another minute passed. "C'mon, 'big' bro. I'm not gonna wait all day."

Of course you won't, you impatient brat, you thought. You never wait around for anything anyway.

Sure enough, within half a minute, your sister moved her feet a bit so she could actually see you again, clenched as you were between her fingers. "I swear, bro, you mustn't be trying at all..." She blinked at your bland expression and glare, before frowning hard and returning your anger a hundredfold. Baring her teeth, she hauled you up to her face. "What the hell?! I told you to worship my feet! Now you'd better do it or else you'll really be sorry!"

"Oh yeah?! What're you gonna do, huh? Shrink me again?" you bitterly retorted, drawing your sister's tirade up short. "Big fucking whoop. You already did it so many times that there's nothing I can do any more. Everything's so fucking huge already. Not like it'll make me unable to play video games, 'cause I'm already there. So fine. Go ahead and punish me or whatever." Glaring, you speared your enormous sister in the eyes... as best you could, at least.

She was still quite angry, gnashing her teeth at your resistance, though the contemplative glint in her eyes showed that she was seriously considering your words. She sat there for a long moment, brows furrowed in thought and fingers still firmly pinning you in place. Then, like someone turning on a light, she blinked away the anger and instead leveled an extremely insidious grin at your tiny figure. Despite yourself, you swallowed hard and wondered if your bravado had been a poor choice of plans.

"You know what, 'big' bro... you're absolutely right. I can't just shrink you again for being disrespectful. I gotta do something else." She again bared her teeth, this time in a crocodile's smile. "And I have just the thing."

You shivered at the tone, feeling your stomach drop as you stared numbly at those mountain-sized incisors. What kind of horrible idea had your resistance inspired?

Quickly, your sister jumped to her feet and tore out of her bedroom. The planet-sized house blurred past until she skidded into the kitchen and opened one of the upper cabinets. Selecting a clear drinking glass, she tossed another evil grin at you, still held tight in her fist, before returning to her room. Throughout the journey, you tried to keep an eye out for your mom despite all the blurring and jostling, and you even yelled for help a few times to no effect. Wherever your mother was, she clearly wouldn't be able to stop your sister from implementing her recently concocted plans for your further abasement.

Back in her bedroom, your sister shut the door before plopping down on the floor next to her desk. Setting the empty glass aside, she tossed you another grin and said, "Alright, 'big' bro, time for your punishment! Remember, this is all your fault!"

You winced, preparing yourself for anything...

Except for the sight of your sister grabbing one of her ankles, hauling her foot to her face, and stuffing her toes into her mouth. You blinked in confusion, watching from the still clenched fingers of her other hand, as she moaned hungrily while doing her level best to slobber all over her foot. The strange activity lasted a number of minutes, and she layered her toes with a surprising amount of saliva that she continually tried to produce. Then, after offering one muffled giggle, she began sucking up all the spittle she'd coated on her flesh. After finally reclaiming all she could, she dropped her spit-cleaned foot, raised the empty glass to her lips, and deposited all that disgusting foot-funk-infused saliva within.

By now, you had a pretty damn good idea about what your punishment would entail. After setting the glass on her desk and wiping off her mouth, your sister flashed you a toothy grin, which turned downright evil at your ghastly pale, terrified expression. "Ah, looks like you've figured it out already!" she gleefully sang, standing up. She positioned the clenched fingers holding your minuscule body just above the rim of the glass, allowing you to hover over the small revolting globs of spit, though of course they were lake-sized globs of spit to you. Even from this far away, the scent of stomach acid, breakfast cereal, and wet feet washed over your body like a stinky blanketing fog, and you quickly clamped down on your gag reflex to keep from adding another foul smell to the mix.

Blinking sudden tears from your eyes, you glanced up at your little sister's pleased face, hoping that you could convince her otherwise--

Her fingers suddenly released you, and the hastily drafted plea instead left your lips as a terrified scream trailing your unwilling plummet into the makeshift torture chamber, with her lilting laughter playing a sadistic counterpart. You at least had the good sense to clamp your mouth shut before cannonballing into the vast sea of saliva. Though mostly water, the viscous liquid felt more like swimming through runny syrup, and you fought hard to return to the surface after your initial plunge. The moment you broke the plane, you took a large breath of air, which even tasted of your sister's nasty foot-spit. You nearly gagged, trying valiantly to keep your head from submerging, and shook your hair out in a futile attempt to remove as much spit as you could. All throughout, your sister's insane laughter echoed oddly in the glass, and you finally glanced upward into her excited grinning face.

"Looks like the punishment is a success!" she crowed, placing both her hands on the desk on either side of your open prison. From your vantage point, they seemed impossibly far away, even given the illusion due to the curving glass. "I know there's not a whole lot of spit in there, but it's probably hundreds of feet deep to you, 'big' bro! That's gotta suck! Better keep swimming or you're gonna drown!" She laughed at the idea, as if your microscopic death in waves of spittle was merely a source of entertainment for her, and not the murder of a severely disadvantaged human.

Perhaps she didn't even consider you human any more. An extremely depressing thought. If that were the case, then there really would be little chance in ever having a normal life again. In desperation, you called out, "Come on, sis! Don't leave me in here like this!" Your whole body tingled, and you wondered uncomfortably if the saliva was trying to break your own body down, like some insignificant crumb of food.

Your sister shook her head, still grinning. "Sorry, 'big' bro! It's your punishment after all!"

You grimaced. It had been a long shot, but I still had to try, you thought despondently. This day has gotten more and more horrible with each minute. God, how much worse is it gonna get?!
115121111112122212.title: The Ultimate Punishment for a Human Dust Mite

choices: She does, pouring you into her cavernous mouth
She doesn't, pulling the glass back and swishing it around instead
1151211111121222121.content:
You paddled around the gigantic sea of spit for a bit before deciding to make for the closest part of the interior glass wall. At your size, the imperfections in the material would probably be big enough for you to grab, allowing you some footing so you could climb out. And failing that, considering just how far you'd have to climb to reach the miles distant rim, you could at least climb high enough to get out of the sea of spit. Whether or not your sister allowed you to do so was another matter, of course, but you again felt that you needed to be proactive in getting out of this mad situation. Balefully, you glanced skyward at your younger sister as she raptly watched your endeavors like some bizarre microscopic version of Man vs Wild. She perked up at your gaze, cheekily waving at you like an over-enthusiastic sports fan. You snorted and resumed your slow progress to the edge of the lake of spit.

Overhead, your sister hummed in minor befuddlement. You chanced another look upward to find her staring at you quite intently now, like a scientist examining an odd new species of bug rather than like a father cheering on his baseball-playing son. You shivered at the gaze, wondering what attracted her attention this time, and then shook yourself again in a futile attempt to dispel the full body tingling you were still experiencing. Setting your jaw, you again started to make your way to the edge of the glass.

The journey was horrific, including both the foot-funk-fragrance added to the spit, and the fact that you had to either breathe in through your nose and smell it, or breathe in through your mouth and possibly taste it instead. Generally, given the lack of 'waves' apart from the ones you were making in your passing, you opted for the latter and managed to keep your mouth mostly free of your sister's nasty saliva.

After about five minutes of travel, she suddenly slammed both palms on the desk.

"Oh my God!" she laughed, eyes shining with delight as she stared at your startled figure. "I wasn't sure if my eyes were playing tricks on me there or not, but now I'm sure! You're still shrinking, 'big' bro!"

You frowned worriedly. Now that you thought about it, the full body tingling you'd been experiencing since getting the spit dunk had felt rather familiar... Of course, given your current size and location, there wasn't anything nearby to compare your body against, and your indescribably enormous sister was still as far away as ever and appeared nearly the same. Maybe she was simply teasing you again. "Yeah, right!" you shouted back, your voice hitching briefly due to your spit-treading activities. "That only happens when I'm touching your feet! You know that!"

"Yeah, but I was sucking on my toes for a while, and maybe I sucked some of that shrinking power into my spit." She winced, trying to focus more clearly on your figure, then nodded in renewed conviction. "Yup, you're definitely getting smaller. Not as fast as earlier, though. I guess it's not as powerful as the real deal. That's nice to know." She giggled, a funny thought coming to mind. "Maybe I can use this trick to surprise guys when I start dating. I can kiss 'em and shrink 'em and make 'em my little slaves!"

Personally, you thought the idea horrifically inhuman and further cemented the feeling that your sister was developing a dangerous god complex. "Yeah right," you yelled, trying to steer the subject back to the slightly less dastardly matters at hand. "You just wish your spit could do that. You're just trying to rile me up some more."

"Am not!" she childishly retorted. "How do you know how my magical feet powers work anyway? I bet I did suck some of that power into my spit! That's why you're still shrinking!"

"I am not shrinking, you big liar! Besides, there's no way you could even tell if I were!"

She huffed, crossing her arms in a very know-it-all fashion. "'Cause I can see your tiny body against the pattern on the desk, silly!"

You glanced down through the spit sea. Beneath your feet and beyond the bottom of the glass, flecks and spirals of color spread out along the 'floor' in all directions. You recalled that your sister had a Disney-themed desk cover with a variety of characters printed on it. It was hard to tell, given your size and angle, but you're pretty sure you were in the corner of the group near Rapunzel, given all the yellow hair. Specifically, your little spit prison seemed to be placed directly atop Rapunzel's bare feet. Your sister's glass placement was either deliberate and sickly sadistic, or accidentally symbolic. You were betting on the former.

Still, despite the pattern beneath you, the resolution was still too large for you to make a similar comparison. "Well, don't you think I'm already just too small for you to really tell?" you ground out, resuming your earlier trek to the edge of the glass. "It's not like you can accurately measure my height that way. The bottom of the glass distorts the image."

Your sister snorted, obviously unimpressed by your apathetic and negative response. "Fine then, we'll try this." Grabbing a pair of scissors, she snipped a very small segment of one of her hairs. She then casually dropped the strand into the glass as close to your position as she could. It landed not too far from you, sticking fast in the slimy spittle. "Now you've got something small to measure yourself. You'll see that you're still shrinking."

Shaking your head, you made your way to the floating hair. For her, the snippet was merely a centimeter long and 90 microns wide, but for you, that width was nearly double your current height, making the little piece of hair almost two hundred times longer than you were tall. Eventually, you drew up next to the fiber and, seeing an opportunity, grabbed hold of the rather rough microscopic surface and hauled yourself out of the spit. You were still drenched head to toe, and the scent of wet feet seemed to permeate your entire being, but at least you could give your arms and legs a break now. Idly you looked down the length of the hair...

"Oh no..." you whispered, feeling extremely light-headed. As much as you hated to admit it, your sister had been right. The change wasn't happening quickly, but you could indeed see the hair growing ever so wider and longer beneath your infinitesimal body. If you had to guess, the hair was now definitely twice as wide as you were tall, and approaching the triple-sized range.

"See! See!" your sister gloated, laughing at the look of horror on your face. "I was right! I got my spit all funky from my feet, and now it can shrink you too!"

You sighed, feeling your center slowly return. Really, given your day so far, this was par for the course.

"And you were doubting me, too! Calling me a liar and stuff! I might have to think up another punishment for that!"

Good god, couldn't she quit with the endless punishments? Also, your blood circulation was going to be completely screwed up for years to come, given all the times it rushed to and from your face within the past few hours. Assuming you lived that long, of course. Stiffly, you turned your ashen face skyward. "C-come on, sis... isn't this enough? You've got me shrinking in a glass full of spit!"

She frowned, wagging her finger at you like some scolding parent. "But that's still for the last time! This is new!" She held the pose for a moment, a peculiar expression crossing her face as she stared down at you and your glass prison. Then she flashed her evil grin again. "But I know what to do! It's the next thing you'd normally do after getting a glass of something..."

Your face went even whiter, since the implications this time around were all the more blatant... and horrifying. "Wait! You don't mean--"

"I do indeed, 'big' bro!" she lilted, reaching down to grasp your glass prison. "It's been a lot of work, shrinking you down and all that. I think it's time for a drink!" She hefted the glass from the desk, your fingers reflexively digging into the hair fiber beneath you to keep from slipping into the shifting sea of spittle. "In case I never see you again, I just want you to know that this has been loads of fun!"

And without further ado, she placed the rim of the glass against her smirking lips and tipped the vessel back.

You screamed in utter terror at the infinite abyss that yawned before you. Her hot breath wafted throughout the glass, and you fought to stay atop your hair-boat as the sea of saliva poured down the side. You considered leaping off and trying to slog to safety, but that would require so much effort for so little chance, and time was definitely against you. Your safety couldn't be guaranteed regardless of your actions, and she could always pick you out and toss you into her mouth if you survived this. Like you realized before, your sister was in complete control, and there was nothing you could do to save yourself.

So as you slipped ever closer to that enormous deadly void, you could only gibber in utter terror and dejection... and wonder if your sister really truly planned to go through with this...
1151211111121222121.title: Shrinking in Foot Slime

choices: Your sister pulls out her spit-coated foot with you stuck between her toes
11512111111212221211.content:
At your back, a slow-moving avalanche of foot funky spittle sloshing down the sloped curve of a colossal drinking glass.

To your front, a normally imperceptible but at your size incredible hill rising from the end of your crystalline slide. And beyond that minuscule bump, a dark gaping cavern the size of a county. Your younger sister's mouth, a near-infinite fleshy abyss promising untold anguish and torment. Titanic teeth lined the void, foreboding white sentinels that stretched for miles. A vast reddish landscape, carpeted with rows upon rows of bumpy taste buds, spanned the divide between the bottom ring of ivory soldiers. The view was alien and nightmarish, and you fervently wished to waken from this terrible dream your day had become.

The advancing wave carrying your hair canoe finally reached the edge of the glass and settled, spreading out and holding the perimeter like an occupying military force. For a long moment, you simply hung there at the rim, your little bead of saliva balancing precariously upon the lip of the glass, fractions of an inch from your sister's own lower lip. Her gargantuan tongue twitched in anticipation of the upcoming microscopic delicacy...

Then the glass suddenly turned vertical as your sister threw her own head back, pouring the slimy concoction into her waiting mouth. Like a revolting waterfall, the spit dribbled into that ungodly maw. Drowning in shifting slobber, you dared not open your mouth even to scream.

You fell hard and fast, encased in a torrent of spittle, before pooling against your sister's voluminous tongue. Lost under waves of drivel, you dug in hard, trying to swim to the surface again despite your complete disorientation. You cracked one eye, braving the stinging saliva, and focused on the strongest source of light. It could only be her gaping mouth, and you furiously swam toward your only avenue of escape.

Surprisingly, you broke through the surface rather quickly. You quickly shook your head and arm off, dragging slimy fingers across your face in a mostly futile effort to clear your vision. Feeling your time quickly counting down, you braved a glance skyward.

It was as equally an alien a vision as before, when you were merely looking in. Your sister's enormous lips marked the divide between flesh-colored darkness and glass-tinted light. You could barely make out the overhead fixture of your sister's bedroom light through the bottom of the glass, and you surmised that she was taking as much time as possible to drink all her spittle, guaranteeing that you were swallowed up. In fact, there were still a few drops clinging to the inside wall of the glass–

You had no time to adjust. The endless velvet landscape below, your sister's previously dainty tongue, abruptly shot forward. The behemoth muscle idly scooped aside the river of slobber bearing you aloft, and you tumbled amid that revolting fluid before slamming up against one of her molars. Clenching your teeth, you struggled to climb the tremendous tooth.

Once again, you broke through the surface of the drivel and glanced upward. Your sister was scraping her tongue against as much of the glass surface as she could, making absolutely certain that you had been gathered up. For a moment, you considered making another break for freedom, but that colossal muscle was shifting too quickly and radically for you to predict a likely avenue of escape. Like a mountain-size bouncer, it shifted from one side of her lips to the other, promising either a forceful return to the confines of her mouth... or a swift crushing death against her lips or teeth.

In due time, your sister decided she'd drunk as much spittle as she could, and you were treated to the stomach-churning view of her lips closing. The prodigious pulsating cavern was instantly shrouded in near-absolute darkness, a deep but faint red tint indicating the line where her lips met. Surprisingly, there was comparatively very little open space now that her jaw was closed, though given your size it still seemed quite immense. You held your breath, wondering what would happen next...

And then the swishing commenced.

Like someone fighting off plaque with a little mouthwash, your sister began swirling her saliva around her mouth. Unprepared, you were easily sucked from atop your molar mountain. Like a limp rag doll, you were cast back and forth across the wide expanse between her teeth, tumbling through an ocean of disgusting spittle. Thankfully, you never actually impacted anything within her mouth, though you felt your hips and shoulders aching severely. Hoping to avoid a dislocated limb, you curled up into a tight ball to ride out the hurricane and prayed that you could surface for air before you completely blacked out.

Thankfully, your prayers were answered. The swirling vortex of water calmed long enough for you to fight your way to the surface again. Spots danced before your vision as you drew an enormous breath. Though the air literally tasted of your sister's halitosis, you were never more grateful for the ability to breathe.

Even better, after a moment's respite, light suddenly poured into that dark cavern. You felt your sister's jaw moving beneath you, and you looked up to see her lips parting before you like a portal splitting wide open. Located as you were, smack dab in the middle of her tongue, you had the best possible view of the outer world, beckoning invitingly beyond those distant lips. Though your limbs felt like some unnatural super-heavy jelly, you began swimming frantically for the bright exit ahead.

You only managed a few strokes before the ramifications of this latest development began to hit you. Why on Earth was your sister opening her mouth? Was she preparing to let you go? If so, why wasn't she trying to spit you out again instead? Surely that would be the easiest way to go about it.

Unless she was planning to punish you some more, somehow. In which case...

Oh, sweet merciful God, NO!!

But as another shadow began to blot out the shining world beyond your muculent prison, you knew your situation had just gone from bad to worse.

For the second time that day, you had the disturbing benefit of watching your sister stuff her foot within her mouth. Only now, you had a harrowing front row seat to the toe-sucking carnage. Her enormous pedal digits landed just to either side of your body, and you felt the gargantuan muscle beneath you rise up to taste them. The light illuminating the fleshy cavern faded away as your sister clamped her lips around her foot, and once again you were locked in a dark horrid chamber full of saliva.

Only this time, the rancid stink of nasty foot funk permeated the air, and you felt that awful tingling sensation return.

Yes, you were once again shrinking, this time within the confines of your sister's mouth.

The swishing resumed, and you found yourself tumbling amid those monolithic toes. Her tongue repeatedly lashed out, coating her skin with more saliva, and you flailed aimlessly amid the indescribably huge organs. You curled up once again, praying as hard as ever that you would survive your unimaginably intolerable ordeal – shrinking away to nothingness while trapped inside your younger sister's mouth.

Yet through it all, you maintained a firm grip on your consciousness, unwilling to succumb to a sleep from which you may never reawaken. As hopeless as your situation had become, you would see it through to the end, for better or worse...

Please... please... for better...
11512111111212221211.title: A Whole Mouthful of Trouble

115121111112122212111.content:
Suddenly, you felt an unbelievably strong pressure pulling your body to the back of your sister's throat. Horrified, you cracked open your eyelids, once again braving the sting of her saliva. There wasn't much to see in the darkness, but you knew that something disastrous was about to happen. Frantically pumping your nearly deadened arms, you tried to break through to the surface again, if only to get a better look at your surroundings...

You finally emerged from the sea of spittle, still tingling and shrinking from the presence of your sister's foot. But not for much longer, as you soon realized – the incredible pressure from before was because your sister was sucking her toes dry while pulling them out of her mouth. Even now, you could finally make out the corners where her lips weren't quite flush against the skin of her foot... and it was obvious that her foot flesh was slowly receding from her mouth.

A terrible realization dawned upon you: those shrink-inducing toes, those mountainous banes of your existence, were now your only ticket out of this slimy hellhole. If you weren't back upon your sister's foot by the time she removed it from her mouth... you weren't going to be leaving at all.

Panicked, you paddled furiously toward the nearest prodigious toe...

...only to watch it recede much faster than you were capable of swimming. Your stomach dropped, and you yelled hysterically, begging your sister not to do this – not to swallow her older brother whole.

But even in the remote chance that she heard you, she had obviously already made up her mind about what to do with her microscopic sibling. Her toes finally passed between her lips with a disturbing slurp, and her tongue suddenly shifted, pushing you and your wave of saliva again to the back of her throat. You screamed once again before becoming buried in foot funk spittle, and with one final contraction of gargantuan muscles, you were forced down the back of your sister's throat in a tidal wave of spit.

A terrifying rumble shook your body during your downward plunge, and you later deduced that your sister had moaned after you had slipped beyond her vocal chords. As if she were actually savoring your body, like a mere morsel of food for her nourishment. God, even if you did manage to escape this impossible prison, how on Earth could your life be anything like normal, now that your younger sister thought of you as nothing but a subhuman delicacy to be shrunken and savored?

The trip down her esophagus took an unfortunately short amount of time, and before long you splashed down into another cavernous chamber full of unbelievable rolls of flesh and horribly stinging fluids. Your sister's stomach, primed and ready to reduce your body to a steaming pile of shrunken nutrients.

How would that work, anyway?

You grimaced among the shifting gastrointestinal liquids and honestly gave the question some thought. There was precious little else to do in your situation, after all.

You had shrunken to a microscopic fraction of your size. Had everything shrunken proportionally? (You'd already given up debating whether or not shrinking can happen at all; you had plenty of evidence to refute any argument against the notion.) In other words, would the acids in your sister's digestive juices still be able to break down your body, or had you grown too small for the molecular science to work in that regard? Had your atoms literally shrunken too, and were thus incapable of interacting with normal atoms on a chemical level? If so, you'd be impervious to any reaction at all. You'd just have to watch out for the normal dangers of being crushed by just about everything in existence. Not an entirely optimal trade-off, all things considered.

Of course, that still depended on whether or not you could be dissolved in the first place. So there you sat in a large pool of tingling fluids, wondering morosely whether or not you'd make it out of your sister's body alive...
115121111112122212111.title: Down the Hatch!

1151211111121222121111.content:
Before too long, you had your answer. Throughout this entire unearthly journey, your clothes had managed to shrink with you. There's no fathoming why this was so; hell, the fact that you were shrinking was itself incomprehensible.

Nevertheless, your microscopic T-shirt was gradually falling apart, the fibers disintegrating under the onslaught of a tidal wave of gastric juices. Your pants quickly followed suit, and you realized that the tingling sensation you felt was no longer the unnatural sense of diminution – it was pain, literal pain, from the dissolving of your body. However the mechanism of your shrinking, you were still being macerated as if your atoms were normal.

In the end, you really were reduced to nothing more than a niblet for your younger sister's monstrous appetite.

Ugh. What a way to go.

Your last conscious thoughts, as your body succumbed to the debilitating wave of acid, were that you hoped no one else would have to experience your terrible fate... and that your sister would suffer ungodly excruciating indigestion after devouring you.
1151211111121222121111.title: A Microscopic Morsel for Little Sis

choices: Incredibly, she spots you floating there and fishes you out
Unfortunately, she doesn't notice you at all and flushes you down
1151211111121222121112.content:
It was like something out of the bowels of hell, your little sister's stomach. Considering how she'd been acting all afternoon, you figured the description was as appropriate an analogy as any, assuming it wasn't the literal Hell. Of course, you couldn't actually see anything. It was black as pitch, deep in her colossal belly. But the heat, the cloying odors, the horrible gurgling, the constant shifting of your surroundings, the tingle and sting of her funky foot saliva... now mixed with bile...

It was probably best that you couldn't see anything anyway.

Still, despite the tingles and the terror, you found yourself merely riding along the sea of stomach juices. Though they saturated your clothing, her stomach acids showed no signs of breaking down the synthetics and fibers of your garments. You felt wet, nasty, and sticky all over, but the sensations you experienced never extended beyond the dull tingle of your body slowly shrinking.

Ugh, yes, you were still among her stinky foot spit. And it was still affecting you. Even knowing you were somehow immune to the effects of her stomach acid, you were still extremely frustrated to know that her unnatural feet powers were still working against you, even after being devoured.

You shook your head, dismissing the negative thoughts. You were still alive. That was certainly something, so long as you managed to eventually escape this gastric prison. You tried not to think about the most logical means to do so...

Additionally, it seemed that you no longer required to breathe. You'd been buried under waves of saliva and bile for far longer than you knew you could survive. That was a fair enough assumption, though, all things considered – if your shrunken cells couldn't interact with normal-sized matter, then you probably couldn't breathe in normal-sized oxygen molecules either. Perhaps your entire body was now immune to any process involving the exchange of atoms to and from your body. That meant you no longer needed to drink, or eat, or even use the restroom.

Of course, that implied that you could survive indefinitely within your sister's intestinal tract. Not a very appealing option. One way or another, you absolutely had to make for the nearest... exit.

After what felt like a dozen minutes or so, you finally passed over a ledge and fell into an extremely large tunnel. Out of the stomach at last, and on to the small intestines. It seemed that, since you were far too small to be considered any sort of solid food, you were traveling through her body as quickly as a regular glass of water. That being the case, maybe you'd be able to escape this torture rather quickly...

...

Five hours later, you realized you had set your hopes far too high. After so much time bumping along among the rest of the material in your younger sister's digestive tract, you seemed no closer to the exit. Not only that, but you could detect an extremely familiar, and unpleasant, odor. Yes, as nutrients were being extracted from the matter around you, the contents of her intestines were being slowly converted from food to shit. You were literally swimming in feces now. Really, given how the rest of your day had gone, you should have known better.

Not only that, but you'd been experiencing the same dull tingling the entire time. And though the scent of poop was slowly becoming overpowering, you could still detect the pungent aroma of your sister's nasty feet. You weren't certain whether or not you were still actually shrinking, given that you couldn't see anything in this pitch black cavern to compare your minuscule size against, but you were pretty certain that you hadn't been getting any bigger over the past few hours.

On that topic, there had been plenty of time for you to stew over ideas and plans for recovering your normal height, and a common hope included the notion that time away from her unnatural feet powers would simply allow your body to return to normal.

Obviously, that couldn't be tested considering the foot funk tainted saliva that she'd swallowed alongside you, but perhaps if you managed to escape and could hide out long enough...

...

Countless hours passed. You had no concept of time anymore. You might have nodded off for a while there, though you weren't entirely certain. You figured that would be the only reason you'd suddenly found yourself half buried in shit. The upper half, even. Since then, you fought your hardest to stay atop the colossal train of poo... at least, whichever direction "atop" was. Thankfully, you hadn't suffered any hunger pangs as of yet, nor the fatigue and lightheadedness that would normally follow from not having eaten or drunk anything in over twenty-four hours.

Not that there was anything nearby you'd actually like to eat.

An abrupt gurgling roared throughout the cavernous intestine, and you clenched your fists. Was it finally time to see release? As unfathomable a scenario as it was – being shat out of your sister's ass like some subhuman piece of... well... shit – it had been the only option for your freedom ever since being swallowed.

The only real problem was getting the hell out of the toilet bowl before she flushed you down.

The rumbling returned, and you felt the fecal train below you begin to move. The walls of her intestines bore down on your shit-train, and you felt yourself sliding down... down... down... squeezing through one final wall of wrinkled flesh...

And you were out!

You splashed down in the ocean spanning the toilet bowl, already feeling like a new man. The water smelled of piss; obviously you and your shit-train weren't the only things to come out. Shaking filthy water from your head, you glanced skyward–

Right into the gaping city-sized anus of your younger sister. What a sight.

There wouldn't be enough time to swim to the edge of the toilet, climb the side, and reach the rim before she flushed, though. Loathsome as it was, your sister was still your only hope for escaping the commode before being sucked down another series of tubes.

Your enormous sibling stood up again and briefly peered down into the bowl. You threw up your arms, yelling and hoping that she could see you... and would actually be willing to help...
1151211111121222121112.title: Fantastic Voyage Through Little Sis

115121111112122212112.content:
You didn't know whether it was fate, happenstance, or your sister's own perverted horrible will.

Either way, you suddenly found yourself mashed up tightly against her foot flesh, deep within the folds between her largest and second toes. Her tongue bore down on you like a great throbbing mountain, the force practically embedding you along the cells of her skin. Though that titanic muscle dragged back and forth across your entire body, almost as if she were tasting you among the pungent flavors of her own smelly foot, you found you were stuck fast.

To be honest, given the circumstances, you weren't certain whether or not this was a bad thing.

Case in point, while you were stuck to her foot, you were at least guaranteed to exit her mouth. The bad side, as you were beginning to experience yet again, was that being so close to her smelly toes once again caused you to shrink... a marginally unpleasant sensation compared to the threat of complete obliteration within that gaping maw.

After a few tense moments involving your continued shrinkage and your sister's apparent toe worship, you were finally extracted from her mouth along with her spit-covered foot. You coughed, trying your best to clear the slime away long enough to draw a few breaths, before taking a good look forward.

An enormous face loomed across your entire field of vision, though the revolting flesh of your sister's foot and toes marked the horizons, as well as two ungodly columns rising to your left and right. It was like being trapped in the deepest of canyons, stuck in a slimy river, skin-colored walls rising like towers to your sides, and a sky not of cerulean blue and fluffy white but of haughty all-powerful prepubescent girl. There was not a single thing you could see from your perspective that was not a part of your sister's body. That fact above all others truly illustrated how helpless you were, how much power she wielded before you, and how much your continued existence depended entirely on her.

You sighed despondently at the sight, feeling your spirits plummet even lower, and reassessed your situation. Yes, you were out again, but to what end? Your sister had been able to spot you earlier, and she would undoubtedly be able to repeat that feat since she seemed to sense your presence precisely between her largest and second toes. What would she do when she found you?

The only certainty was that you would not enjoy it.

"Wow! You actually managed to survive, 'big' bro!" The gargantuan preteen giggled, her eyes twinkling as they finally focused on your infinitesimally small body. Two unimaginably large thumbs reached forward, separating her toes a little to make you more visible. "God, you're really microscopic now! I'm actually kinda impressed! I thought you were gonna drown for sure!"

"So you really meant to kill me?!" you choked out, struggling just to keep your head above the glaze of saliva covering everything.

"Well, you're not much good for anything else anymore," she lilted mercilessly. "You're too small to toy around with. It sure was a blast shrinking you down like this, but now there's no fun games we can play together. So I figured I'd just make you vanish forever! There'd be no way anyone could find out what happened to you, and you wouldn't be around to warn anybody else!" Her grin turned sinister. "'Cause if I can make you shrink, then I can probably make other people shrink, too! Then I'll always have little toys to play with!"

You shook your head, horrified by your sister's words. No, she wouldn't DARE– yes, she would. Grimacing, you tried to persuade her otherwise. "You can't do that, sis! It's just not right! Shrinking people down to the size of dolls or bugs or... hell, what you've done to me! It's not respectful! It's just cruel and inhumane! You shouldn't take advantage of your fellow man like that! They're still human beings, like you! Like me, even!"

She laughed. "Oh yeah, you certainly look like a regular human being, 'big' bro! No, right now you're nothing more than a germ to me! With this new power, I'm like a total goddess, and everyone else will just have to deal with it! They should be paying me respect, or I'll shrink them down to the microbes they deserve to be!"

"You are not a goddess, and I'm not just a germ!" you screamed, frantic. "C'mon, you've had your fun, now let me go!"

She snorted. "Looks like you still haven't learned your lesson. You can't bark orders at me anymore, 'big' bro," she said condescendingly. "Face it. There's nothing you can do." She smirked. "Though you should be happy – just now I've decided not to kill you. No, I'm just gonna leave you stuck there on my foot, where you can shrink away forever. Unless of course you can get away fast enough, but it looks like you're having trouble with that..."

Indeed, though you'd been trying to free yourself throughout her little 'god complex' monologue, you had made precious little progress. Now exposed to ordinary air, the water in her saliva was slowly evaporating, leaving behind a far more gelatinous substance that was becoming increasingly difficult to move through. Especially since you were still shrinking, surrounded by toes the size of counties and growing larger yet.

Good grief, you were smaller than a bacterium now! Was there any hope at all left? Did you even have enough strength to continue fighting, considering everything that had lead to this horrible juncture?

"You're doomed, 'big' bro! Guess I'll have my last bit of fun watching you disappear between my toes! Good-bye!"

Ugh, like HELL you'd give up now!

Gritting your teeth, you mustered up all your energy, drawing from wells of power you didn't realize you had, and began clawing frantically toward something, anything, that could give you just the tiniest bit of leverage to free yourself from this solidifying sea of saliva...
115121111112122212112.title: Stuck Fast to an Apathetic Sister's Foot

choices: You keep shrinking, and things start getting really trippy
You shrink until you hit the minimum - 5 nanometers tall
1151211111121222121121.content:
It was just like before, trying to paddle across an ocean of spit, and the most horrifyingly awful form of déjà vu you had ever encountered in your scant decade and a half of existence. Thankfully, this vast slimy lake wasn't as deep as the one contained in the drinking glass. On the other hand, being spread out directly over the pungent folds between her toes meant that you were shrinking faster than the previous time. And the more you shrank, the greater the ocean you were swimming in seemed to become. At this rate, it certainly wouldn't take long until this body of saliva grew perceivably larger than the earlier one, making it nigh impossible to escape this ever-expanding aquatic prison with malodorous titanic toe vistas.

Hardly an ideal trade-off. The first time was honestly more manageable and survivable – an extremely depressing thought indeed.

A bone-rattling giggle shook your entire body, and you were again reminded of another similarity to the previous drool dunk. Like a cuter but intimately more vicious version of the Great Eye of Sauron, your younger sister was keeping close watch over your microscopic struggles. With her slobber-caked foot pulled close to her face, all you could now see in the 'sky' between her colossal toes was her right eye and cheek. That terrifying optical orb remained fixated on your position, gleefully tracking your every futile move and swimming stroke. Ever so often, she would yell out confusing warnings, empty praise, backhanded compliments, and scathing ridicule concerning your continually futile attempts to find the nearest shore or fleshy island in this unending sea of spittle.

And despite your initial gusto, you really weren't getting anywhere. Your gigantic tormentor had done a rather thorough job in coating her own foot with her saliva. You couldn't spot any surface nearby that didn't glisten from a recent meticulous coating of slime. And though extremely thin from a normal perspective, the layer of fluid stretched many times deeper than your ever decreasing height. Lacking the opportunity to rest and recharge, especially since you'd been madly struggling through the past few trials and tribulations, you found that your energy was quickly flagging against the thickening soup surrounding you. Each stroke was harder and more laborious than the last, and you were beginning to fully realize the futility of this, your final best effort.

And apparently, your younger sister had come to the same conclusion.

"Well, this looks like the end," she chuckled, the sound rolling over you like a concussive death knell. Already drained from the futile swimming, you paused and glanced upward into her enormous twinkling eye. "You're actually getting too small for me to see, even with my powers... but I can still sort of feel you down there. That's pretty cool, actually. Now I'll know for sure that I've got you trapped between my toes, forever!"

She laughed again, then leaned back far enough for you to see more than just her eye and cheek, although the distance was becoming so great that her upper body actually appeared blurry. You blinked, realizing that the magically enhanced limits of perception concomitant with your shrunken figure worked both ways. The smaller you shrank, the narrower your own visual acuity became. Your stomach completely bottomed out with the knowledge that, eventually, you would see nothing around you except for the endless expanse of your sister's foot flesh. Nothing but toes, soles, and stinky smelly wrinkles of skin for the rest of your miserable life.

The she-devil seemed to realize this as well, a fact that kindled unbridled joy in that sadistic, ungodly being. Spitefully, the ultra-colossal preteen waved down at you. "So, I guess this'll be our final farewell. Just so you know, I'm officially downgrading you to 'micro-bro' now." Her overjoyed grin stretched a little wider, and she blew an exaggerated kiss at her toes. "So, welcome to your insignificant tiny life on my foot, micro-bro! It'll be your entire world from now on... or even a whole universe if you keep shrinking! Now, you'd better keep your world clean, alright? And if you worship me properly like a true goddess, then maybe I'll send you some friends to keep you company!"

Finally, she released her foot, stretching her legs out across the carpet of her bedroom floor and playfully curling her toes. From your microscopic vantage point, you could only make out the ponderous shifting of those pedal digits. Beyond her toes, a mottled light-grey sky stretched between those skin-colored horizons, showing none of the vibrant hues filling your sister's bedroom. It was the worst kind of hell, and you felt yourself crying... the first time you'd done so throughout this nightmarish day. At long last, you'd finally given up any and all hope of ever returning to your normal life again.

"Goodbye, micro-bro," a hauntingly smug voice called, itself becoming muffled and distant. "It's been really awesome..."

"Not for me," you whispered, knowing that the limits of your verbal communication had just reached the same wall as your limits of vision. Tears poured down your cheeks in little rivers. Now you couldn't even talk with anyone else. Cut off from the rest of humanity, you were all alone, lost and still shrinking within the wrinkles of flesh between your sister's almighty toes.
1151211111121222121121.title: Condemned to Micro Life on Her Foot

choices: It's a twisted, nightmarish, insufferable world of nasty feet!
It's actually rather pleasent... for a dimension full of feet
11512111111212221211211.content:
For a very long time, you simply floated there in that revolting ocean of slime, trying to come to terms with everything that had happened that day. You could occasionally see those monumental toes moving, like land masses shifting via tectonic continental drift. For a moment, you thought you even saw the entire 'sky' darken – perhaps your younger sister had donned a pair of socks. You had no way of knowing, of course, but the brief mental exercise distracted you from the horrific reality before you.

A lifetime trapped on the skin of her colossal foot.

And still shrinking, of course.

You could still see the effects of her unbelievable foot powers. Trapped in the ocean of spit not too far from your own position was a phage, a sub-microscopic bacteria virus only 200 nanometers tall. And as you watched, you gradually shrank to half the phage's height.

Then, only a quarter.

And the smaller you became, the more... interesting... the sea of spit surrounding you appeared.

For one thing, you'd never in your entire life seen any fluid quite as lumpy as this. The ocean of saliva was transforming into what seemed to be a layer of oatmeal. After a few moments pondering this development, you realized that you were approaching the atomic, and subatomic, levels. What you were witnessing was actually molecules pressing against and repelling each other, forming an uneven microscopic carpet. It was an environment only visible by electron microscope, and you were certain that no one else in the universe had ever seen this world as closely.

At least, you certainly hoped. And given your sister's recent god complex, you might not be the last. But there was little that you could do about that any more.

Defeated, you merely floated in that endless sea of digestive fluid. There wasn't anything else to do, even if you had the desire to do something.

Before long, that sea began to instead resemble the ball pit at a toddler play center. The hazy electron shells of individual atoms were now becoming visible and distinct, and they bounced and shifted about in that vast seemingly still sea of saliva. You even began to see balls soaring through the air, molecules of oxygen, nitrogen, and other gases that were normally invisible to the naked eye. Here, at the atomic level, the world was growing decidedly alien.

Though, this being the case, how were you still breathing if oxygen atoms were nearing the size of your fists?

You didn't have long to ponder this thought, however, before you suddenly began slipping between the molecules in your sister's spittle. Shocked momentarily, you instinctively flailed your arms, trying to return to the surface... before you remembered your current situation. Drowning would probably be a good way to end all this. (Assuming you could, of course. After all, if you didn't need to breathe...) At any rate, you went limp once more and simply let your body slide down.

Actually, it felt like you were being pulled...

You blinked and stared below, trying to discern the source of that force. After a few moments, you noticed what appeared to be a colossal sinkhole beneath the sea of spit molecules, a vast chasm well over a thousand times wider than your microscopic body. You weren't certain how you could actually tell the difference between the saliva atoms and those marking the rim of that crevasse, but on an instinctive level you just did.

By that same token, you also knew that this titanic hole was merely one of the pores in the skin of your sister's immeasurable foot... and that the force gripping your body was pulling you toward that fathomless abyss.

You grimaced in resignation. Again, it was just par for the course. Not content with letting you eke out a life on the surface, your sister's unbelievable shrinking powers were drawing you deep into the proverbial heart of her monstrous infinite foot. Your existence, forever suffused and enveloped by that ungodly horrific appendage... what sort of environment would you encounter in there as you shrank beyond the subatomic level?

You passed beyond the rim of her gargantuan pore, breaking the plane and entering her infinite body. Now technically surrounded within her wretched foot, you shrank even more quickly, the small electron shells of each atom ballooning in size from grapefruits to medicine balls. Eventually, you were enveloped within the space of what you believed to be a carbon atom, judging from the cluster of protons within its ever swelling nucleus. Pulled by that invisible force, you dove into the center of that subatomic particle cluster.

An amorphous black mass writhed within the innermost core of the carbon atom. As you approached, it seemed to reach out toward you, beckoning you forth. You toppled through the surface of that unnatural cloud, pressing onward through a sea of very dense, thick fog...

Unexpectedly, you emerged from the darkness, tumbling through an oddly bright sky. You had barely enough time to register the bizarre change in environment before you impacted a rather spongy surface. Gritting your teeth, you slowly shook the ringing from your head and drew up on your hands and knees. Blinking a few times, you chanced a look at your surroundings.

Not more than a couple dozen feet before you, though aimed in the opposite direction, five massive toes wiggled and danced... almost as a greeting.

"Oh great," you muttered, "I'm back on top of my... sister's... foot?" Your eyes widened, taking in the sight a second time.

These toes were merely the size of mansions. ('Merely?' That still sounded bad.) Last you remembered, you had shrunk beyond the atomic level, trapped within the flesh of your own sister's foot. Had her powers somehow teleported you back outside, enlarged you to the size of a flea, and placed you back upon that horrible appendage, ready to be shrunk again?

You gritted your teeth, whirling to glare up at her obviously enthused face–

Nothing but cream-colored sky met your gaze. Befuddled, you scanned the heavens above, now noticing its unnatural uniformity. A solid beige canvas stretched across your field of vision, not the myriad of colors decorating your sister's room, nor the azure blue, occasionally cloudy firmament above the Earth. You gnawed on your cheek in puzzlement...

The ground shifted beneath you, drawing your attention downward until you saw skin once again.

Your jaw dropped. And rightly it would, for before you lay the top of an enormous foot.

A disembodied foot, to be precise.

Seemingly cut off at the ankle, a swell of perfect unmarred skin covered the top of the appendage like a small fleshy hill. You took a moment to glance back toward the toes of this mighty extremity, which continued to wiggle and dance. Wiggling toes, connected to an enormous foot disconnected from any larger body. An extremity that, by all laws of nature and physics, shouldn't move much less survive by itself. Not only that, beyond the curves of skin falling to your left and right, down beneath this weird foot, lay more fields of solid beige, extending well below the horizon and blending seamlessly with the cream-colored skies above. It was as though this solitary giant foot was somehow floating in an entire dimension of beige. How in the world...

The faint sound of light footsteps caught your attention, and you glanced back toward the 'ankle'... only to lose control of your jaw once again. At least a dozen disembodied feet, normal-sized compared to yours, bounded over the 'horizon' despite any means of locomotion. By all rights, they appeared to be attached to invisible legs, the way they moved. Like a small pack of dogs, the unattached feet hopped forward, surrounding you in a small circle. One foot jumped a little bit closer, then leaned back on its heel and pointed its toes toward you, as if they were sensing information about this humanoid intruder...

Was this their leader?

Seemingly coming to a decision, the foot rolled forward onto its pad before bouncing exaggeratedly, tapping out a random rhythm against the fleshy ground beneath you. Some sort of pedal communication?

Suddenly, a veritable army of feet bounded over the 'horizon', summoned by the obviously senior foot. Each one unique in shape, skin color, and even size, the wave of disjointed feet swarmed upon your position, eventually leaping upon your body. The weight of so many feet eventually pressed you to the ground, itself the upper flesh of yet another colossal foot.

The smell of feet was overpowering. Detached pedal appendages of all sizes assaulted your tired body. Your entire world, your 'planet' as it were, was a colossal foot. Once again, information concerning your predicament leapt unbidden to your conscious mind.

You somehow knew, you were now forever within the thrall of... The Footsie Zone.
11512111111212221211211.title: Beyond the Foot, Diving Into Abnormality

115121111112122212112111.content:
The feet continually rubbed themselves upon you. The smell of FEET was constantly invading you every which way. It was very difficult to fight them. The feet all smelled horrible, just like the air in this new world that you were trapped in. The smell of the air was an ever present smell of feet, it just smelled of distinct feminine foot sweat. Each of the feet smelled like the feet of Isabel. The small was rank, cheesy, potent, thick , and extremely stinky. The feet continually made sure that the smell went into your nose and thoroughly made you sniff.

Somehow you managed to escape their grasp. You ran for your life. You kept thinking, there has to be an exit, there has to be a way out. If this was how you had to spend the rest of your life, then you would most definitely choose to die instead. Now you just either had to find a way out, or a way to kill yourself. You kept running, and running, and running. The feet were always right behind you, keeping up with you. It's almost as if they LET you escape, they LET you keep a small distance in front of them. Even so, you kept running unitl you reached the "edge" of this world, and you proceeded to jump down, believing that really anything was better than getting caught under those sweaty stinky feet.

As you jumped down, your body was swung around to the underside of your world. You finally realized what this place really was. Even your fate. The beige skies, the beige "ground", the ever present smell of feet. You were in some kind of foot dimension. If it was shrinking infnitely into your sister's feet that put you here, then really, there could be no way out. Your sister's feet are what shrunk you, and now you're in a dimension of her feet, her power would keep you in here for as long as you live. You broke down, and began to cry. The final sight broke the last straw. As you looked forward, you saw a massive expanse of foot sole. The entire place was a foot. More specifically, the foot of your sister, replicated in this dimension. You could see glistening sweat all over, if you looked far enough, you could see massive toes, that had toe-jam right in the middle. The stench was simply incredibly disgusting. You tried to turn around, depsite the fact that there was an army of more stinky feet waiting for you. But the sole of this world was just too much for you. It smelled too bad. As you turned around to try to jump back to the other side, it somehow seemed you couldn't...The gravity simply pulled you around back onto the sole.

You tried to regain hope...there must be a way out. You walked around the sole, staying as far away from those ultra stinky toes as possible. Sometimes it seemed like the world had a will of its own. It caused you to trip and then the gravity would intensify, holding your face plastered to the sole of the world, forcing its sweat into your mouth and the stink into your nose. This would happens every ten minutes or so. Finally you got so fed up, so tired, there was nothing but FEET EVERYWHERE. You screamed out, "LET ME OUT OF HERE!! NOW!!" Suddenly, a foot the size of your body pressed down on your back, pushing you into the sole once again. You tried to stand up but it was too heavy. Then, you heard a voice that infuriated you. It was Isabel. "How's the stink little bro!?" She exclaimed. She finally lifted her foot, and there she was. Isabel, just sitting there. Her foot was the full size of your body, and her body was proportionally bigger. You yelled, "Isabel! What the HELL! GET ME OUT OF HERE!"
115121111112122212112111.title: It's a twisted, nightmarish, insufferable w...

1151211111121222121121111.content:
"Tee hee!" Isabel simply giggled, and then proceeded to disappear just as quickly as she appeared. The army of feet from before re-appeared. You could see them catching up to you in the distance, drawing closer and closer. It was almost as if their stink was visible. Maybe you were so delirious you were losing your mind, but as you watched them draw closer, you felt like you could see the vapors of smelly feet coming from the army of feet. It was a sickly thick cheesy odor. It looked like it wanted to swallow you whole. You could see the toe jam in between the toes of each foot as they quickly stomped towards you. The very nature of their advance was as if their very purpose of existence was to make you suffer under incredible sweaty and stinky feet. You hit the ground in frustration. A grave mistake. The giant sole that was your floor sucked in your fists. You couldn't pull them out no matter how hard you tried. You now had to just watch in horror as the sweaty stinky foot army got closer and closer, you could almost feel their excitement to rub themselves all over you.
