Suddenly, your arms were pulled into the sole, and you were held fast, facing the sole. Then, a pair of feet began to grow from the ground. These looked like an exact replica of Isabel's. They clearly smelled like hers, and were just as sweaty. They wiggled their toes in anticipation of making contact with your face. With your arms held tight, all you could do was try to pull away from these feet, but they only grew closer and closer to your face. Until finally, they made contact. You couldn't pull away, and the feet were rubbing very efficiently all over your nose. She made sure to cup her toes over your nose to get all that stink in there, as well as rub your nose in between each toe. You peered over to the side to see that the army had finally reached you.

The feet from the ground disappeared and the army of feet pounced on you. Never had you experienced a smell so vile. You couldn't seem to throw up though, not even pass out. And you noticed, that ever since you arrived in this world, you hadn't felt fatigued, or sleepy in any way. Not even hungry. None-the-less, the feet had their way with you. Forcing you to drink foot sweat, inhale foot stench. No mercy. You were so mentally tired of fighting it, that you just laid their and cried while they assaulted you with foot stench, relentlessly. After a couple of hours, the feet disappeared again, and Isabel appeared before you. "Why are you doing this, Isabel?" You asked. Your sister simply smiled, and replied, "Because it's funny!" and proceeded to begin rubbing her stinky feet on your head, flossing her toes with your face.

She continued, "I'm not ACTUALLY Isabel...I am her, but I'm not her...See, here's how it works. You were shrinking down to a really small size. Smaller and smaller into until you were passing through the atoms of the real Isabel's feet. At a certain point, I bet you felt yourself get sucked into this world right? Well that was actually me. See, I'm the ruler of this foot world, I am Isabel, but my only goal is to have you smell my stinky feet. You didn't realize it...but your body had actually broken down by that point. It couldn't get that small, so your atoms literally just broke down. What would normally happen is that you'd die, and your soul would go to heaven. But I thought of something WAY more fun. When your body was finally broken down, you were close enough to my dimension that I could suck you in, so I did just that!"...Your eyes grew wide, almost unable to comprehend what she just told you. You managed to utter, "So...you're saying that.." and Isabel interrupted.."Yup! You're not here for the rest of your life...No, no, no...this IS the after-life. You're here FOREVER! We can spend the next million years having SO much fun. For the next million years you'll smell my feet, then for the million after you'll lick them! Then I'll have you eat my toe-jam for a million years! We'll just go on forever! Isn't this so fun LITTLE BRO!?" You're mind couldn't even process what she just said. It simply rejected even the idea. You immediately sprinted in another direction. Before you knew it, Isabel appeared before you. "Hey, where do you think you're going? You. are. stuck. here. forever. By the way, I control every aspect of this dimension. Have a look see." Then, before you appeared a horror. You saw your mother, Linda, your sisters friend, Sally, and your cousin Laura. "You're gonna be smelling lots of stinky feet bro." With that, she brought up her stinky sweaty soles, and wiggled her toes in your face. She forced your head into the stinky toe flesh in between her big and second toe and said with a smile, "Better get sniffin...we have a whole eternity together!"
1151211111121222121121111.title: Nope! You're stuck here forever!

choices: You have no choice.  Agree to the insane bet
This is ridiculous! You refuse and run away.
1151211111121222121121112.content:
"Hmm!" Isabel put on a mock thinking pose, tapping her chin thoughtfully, lounging on a foot-shaped chair. "Wellll, I guess I could give you SOME chance, but what to do, what to do.,,"

You stand under her, nervously looking around for any sign of more feet as she contemplates your fate. You can barely focus on anything with the stench of sweat an toejam permeating everything. You want to run away, but as far as you can see in every direction is just the sole of this giant foot. You wrack your brain trying to think of a way out of this, but the whole situation is just too unreal.

You're suddenly shocked from your reverie when Isabel nudges you with her big toe, nearly knocking you over. "Alright, little brother, I have an idea!" She says. That can't be good, but you hold onto hope that you'll have some chance to get out. Even Isabel couldn't possibly be this cruel. She holds up the sole of her foot over your head and the smell feels like it could dissolve your skin. You can see that it's covered in grime and grass stains, and glistening with sweat; toejam has piled up between her toes, and there's dirt caught under her toenails. "I'll let you leave... IF you can lick my foot completely clean in one hour, BUT you have to agree that if you fail, you will be the personal SLAVE to all of the feet in my little world from now on." Stunned by the offer, you hardly notice that feet of all sizes have begun to gather around you. "You'll clean them, massage them, kiss them, give them pedicures, and anything else, all willingly. Agreed?"
1151211111121222121121112.title: Isabel has some mercy.

choices: Give pedicures to all of the feet here with your teeth
Be trampled and ground under the crowd of feet as punishment.
11512111111212221211211121.content:
"...I agree," you whisper. There's no choice; this is your only way out.

Isabel's face lights up like a light, and she giggles. "Alright then little footboy, your hour starts now, so START LICKING!"

You don't even hesitate; you just grab her foot and press your tongue into it. It tastes even worse than it smells, and the grime slimes onto your tongue, coating it and leaving you tasting Isabel's foul feet. Still you press on, not even stopping to spit; you just lick. You lick her heel, her arch, her toes, and even in between them. Your fervently lick her foot all over, going so far as to swallow the gunk when you have to, just so you can keep going.

"Wow! You're going to love it here if you love eating the mmm fibre-rich goodness from under my lovely feet," Isabel taunts. "I promise you'll have plenty to eat from now on."

You don't stop to listen, you just keep licking her disgusting foot, using your teeth to pick out the dirt from under her toenails. You're even making good headway at the half hour mark, and you're sure you'll be finished in time, but soon you notice another problem; your tongue has gotten so coated in her foot grime that you've been leaving streaks of it behind as you licked her feet! You look around in a panic and she just grins down at you. Unbelievable! For the last fifteen minutes, all you've been doing is pushing the grime around; you haven't even been picking any of it up!

Isabel laughs out loud. "Aaaw, is my poor widdle bwother realising he took a bet he can't win?"

Panicking, you spit and swallow and wipe your tongue and keep going, but it's no use; 29 more minutes of licking her feet, scraping them with your teeth, getting your body and mouth thoroughly coated in her foot scum, and you've barely gotten anywhere. Your heart falls and you slump to your knees as the final minute ticks down.

"Aaaaaand ding ding ding ding! That's time!" Isabel says. "Aww, looks like you failed, but hey, wanna know something good?"

You look up at her, on the verge of tears.

"I'm not actually Isabel! See, everything in the world has a sort of spirit, even feet! And I'm the SOLE of your sister's feet! Hehe, get it? Soul? Well, you'll have lots of time to learn your puns from now on. See, you got so small that I was able to pull your spirit into my little world before you ceased to exist, but I couldn't actually keep you here; souls have places to go when they're freed!"

Your eyes go wide and you're filled with hope that you'll get to leave.

"Don't get so excited Mr. Footslave, or did you forget the deal you made with me? I COULDN'T keep you here; you'd have been pulled away in time, but then you took my bet without thinking, like a silly little boy. You agreed to be the slave of every foot here if you lost, like you just did, so now I can do whatever I want! Isn't that great?"

Oh god, how could you be so stupid! No no no, this can't be happening; it must be a dream!

"Hahaha, that look on your face right now is just what I've been waiting to see! That pathetic look of realisation that you sold your soul to a sole! I never thought I'd get my hands on a real human soul, but here you are! You know, there aren't many spirits ranked below us foot-fairies, but now you truly are the lowest of the low! You don't even get to rate yourself as MY slave; you're nothing but a slave to these feet of mine!" She wiggles her toes at you tauntingly, the gathered feet wiggling theirs in unison. "You truly are the scum beneath my feet, but enough talking; lets get you your uniform!"

Your clothes begin to shimmer and change; you try to run, but everywhere you turn, one of the assembled feet just kicks you back into place, leaving dirty footprints all over your body and face. The shimmer fades and Isabel holds a hand-mirror (to her) down to your level so you can see your new outfit... oh no: It's a short skirted french maid costume! You can't believe it; the frilly apron has even been altered to the shape of a large foot covering your body. Your face turns red with embarassment as a nearby foot kicks up your skirt suddenly so that you can see you're wearing a pair of lacy black panties with tiny feet patterned into them.

"Don't you just love it! You're going to be wearing that outfit a lot, although if you're very good, I might do some up in different colours for you. Now lets see; you didn't do a very good job of cleaning my feet, so I think your first task will be...
11512111111212221211211121.title: You have no choice.  Agree to the insane bet

115121111112122212112112.content:
Your eyes widened with the realization. The 'Footsie' Zone? Surely, this was the greatest hell you could possibly endure!

You gritted your teeth, fighting against the tumbling wave of disembodied feet. Snarling, you leapt from the footpile and dashed toward the right side of that colossal foot, your hopefully temporary platform. Thankfully, you managed to outpace the trailing army of feet. Happy for minor miracles, you ran for the edge of your enormous pedal 'Earth', leaping once you were close to the steep downward fleshy slope with no regard for what might lay below...

Only to bizarrely swing around and slam down into the sole of your enormous foot world. You blinked, wondering what had happened, before realizing the awful truth: despite its size, this tastefully severed foot was truly the 'Earth' to you, and its phenomenal gravity would forever keep you pinned to its surface, no matter how far you ran. You certainly had time to test that theory, considering that the army of feet undoubtedly chasing you had yet to catch up. You sprinted across the immense sole stretching out before you like a skin-colored plain, with some gently sloping hills and a random rippling texture. Overhead, the sky remained a consistent cream color, just like the heavens above the upper side of this foot-shaped planetoid. Nevertheless, no matter where you explored, gravity still pulled you toward the sole of this massive foot, 'up' relative to your initial reference point in this dimension.

An image of you running around a giant foot-shaped planet popped into your mind, and of course you were appropriately clad in a red shirt, blue overalls, and a cap bearing an 'M' emblem. Too bad there wasn't a convenient warp pipe or sling star to carry you out of here.

The distant rumble of flesh slapping against flesh caught your attention, and you looked up. The army of feet was finally closing in on you, surrounding you completely. One foot, seemingly the leader from earlier, bounced high in the air before landing amid its innumerable brethren. A few other feet followed suit, and you gritted your teeth, wondering what sort of devilry you should be preparing yourself for...

A tingle shot through your body, and your eyes widened in horror. Not a new sort of devilry, but a painfully familiar old one. You felt your body shrink once again, shuddering as the approaching tidal wave of feet swelled both in apparent and absolute size. Thankfully you didn't shrink for very long, but nonetheless you now stood merely half the height you were just a few moments ago. It seemed that even escaping into what seemed to be an entirely separate dimension would not protect you from your sister's shrinking powers.

Despondent, you collapsed to sit down cross-legged, only to plop onto an unexpected plushy seat. Startled, you glanced downward and realized you were resting atop the underside of a giant upturned toe, like a perfectly sized, soft, and warm ottoman. You glanced to the side, then backward, verifying that you were indeed seated on the big toe of yet another monstrous foot, this one upside down and just a little bit longer than a school bus. You had no idea how it managed to get so close, and flip itself, without alerting you somehow.

Even so, that curiosity quickly faded from your mind as the roar of a hundred echoing slaps and claps swelled, and you sadly resigned yourself to the oncoming onslaught of ginormous stinky feet. Closing your eyes, you bowed your head, surrendering to the inevitable.

The cacophony of bounding feet surged alarmingly... before abruptly petering out. A long stretch of eerie silence followed, and you glanced up to discover the reason why. The army of feet indeed surrounded you, though for some odd reason it stopped short of completely invading your personal space. The amassed throng kept a somewhat comfortable distance away, swaying back and forth or deftly curling their toes whenever your vision lingered on a particular group, like a polite kindly greeting compared to the enthusiastic welcoming footpile you received at first. In fact, you got the distinct impression that they were acting... sympathetic to your situation, realizing that they had spooked and overwhelmed you in the beginning and were now trying a much calmer, gentler approach. It was an unnerving thought, both from the standpoint that these disembodied feet were intelligent enough to detect and react to human emotions, and by the fact that you in turn seemed to sense the intentions of an army of feet.

After a few moments of feeling like a show animal on display, you figured you might as well return the greeting. Woodenly, you raised your arm, offering a hesitant wave in reply.

The crowd reacted happily, bouncing around, a few even offering "high fives" to each other by clapping their soles together. Amid the tableau, a rather pretty pair of feet emerged from the group and hesitantly approached. Unlike many of the surrounding feet, this pair was actually smaller than your own, seemingly belonging to a petite young woman roughly your age. They paused at your side, anxiously twiddling and curling their toes, before the right foot took a short hop into the air before bounding right into your lap.

You were taken aback, simply staring wide-eyed at the blatant intrusion of your space. The pretty little normal-sized foot wriggled about for a moment before settling in the crook of your elbow like an amorous housecat, her dainty toes gently caressing your arm. You watched the foot cuddle for a few moments, before glancing back at the crowd. They had gone still once again, seemingly awaiting your reaction to the invasion of your lap space.

Blinking confusedly, you returned your attention to the petite right foot. It really didn't seem to want for anything other than to be cuddled. While exceedingly odd, having that soft, warm presence against your arm and side actually felt rather... nice. Hesitantly, you placed a hand on the lapfoot, causing it to spread its toes languidly and casually nudge up against your palm. Its skin felt incredibly soft and silky smooth, and you couldn't help but stroke that perfect pale creamy flesh, causing it to flush an appealing rosy red shade. After a few tender strokes, you carefully lifted the foot with both hands, a rather light weight all things considered, and examined the lovely foot up close. The skin was utterly without blemish, no cracking or splitting at all. Each toenail was tastefully trimmed and shined, the natural finish looking particularly gorgeous. Turning the foot over to examine the sole, you found more lovely clean flesh covering the underside, which felt even softer to the touch. The petite foot wriggled at the sensation, seemingly in bliss, as the wondrous immaculate skin flushed even redder.

Immaculate skin. You glanced curiously at the waiting foot army, taking a longer second look and realizing that each and every foot was in fact extremely clean and without blemish. Even the more masculine individuals showed extreme cleanliness, though truthfully it was somewhat hard to discern each foot's gender. If they even had genders. Still, a majority of the feet seemed feminine to you. At any rate, with the realization of such pedal purity came a second – being a population of extremely clean feet, their scent was much more benign than you determined initially. Certainly, the smell of feet utterly saturated the atmosphere, but it was a muted freshly-bathed sort of scent, lacking the funky, cheesy, acrid tang of normal sweaty feet... or your little sister's nasty unwashed feet. After the tortures your sibling had put you through, simply breathing in the fragrance of hygienic feet felt surprisingly... nice.

Best of all, the foot throng's continued patience really impressed you. They really weren't out to harass you, and their initial reaction was probably just overzealous footpiling due to possibly meeting the first human being they'd ever encountered. You didn't quite know what to make of it, their consideration for your initial unease, and idly continued to stroke the petite foot on your lap.

A tap on your shin drew your attention – the left foot, partner of the foot in your lap, leaned against your leg, acting like an adorable timid puppy wanting another spot in your arms. You considered for a moment, then carefully reached down and picked up the second foot. The pair settled in like cats, stretching and curling and rubbing up against your hands; it was almost surprising that they weren't actually purring. You blinked, the thought making you wonder...
115121111112122212112112.title: The Dimension of Feet Is... Pleasurable?!

choices: Fantastic footjobs amid the fertile fields of fascinating feet!
The feet play matchmaker and bring you a pretty girl from your home dimension
1151211111121222121121121.content:
You glanced up and spotted the head foot from before, now nearly the length of your entire arm. It reared back on its heel again, pointing its toes toward your face. You opened your mouth, considered for a moment, then tentatively asked, "Can any of you understand me?"

A handful of seconds passed, with you feeling more foolish every moment, before the head foot wiggled its toes. A pedal nod?

"You can? Really?" Oddly hopeful, you added, "Please hop three times if you understand."

The army of feet bounced in compliance, the most surreal wave you'd ever seen.

You grinned bemusedly. "You know, that actually kinda makes me happy." At your reply, the petite pair in your lap nuzzled you all the stronger, and the crowd seemed equally pleased. Your grin turned wry, and quirking a brow you asked, "I don't suppose any of you can speak too?"

The head foot swayed from side to side, a negative.

You sighed. "Worth a shot, at least. I was kinda hoping to find out how I got here, and if there's a way to get back home and back to normal."

The army of feet seemed to fidget restlessly, while the pair in your lap rose up against your stomach, toes daintily, tentatively even, curling to grip the fabric of your shirt. Almost as if they were saddened by your thoughts and intentions of departure. The large and numerous foot army could easily keep you contained here, after all, so your intent must honestly be depressing them. And if it depressed and worried them, then maybe you could somehow return after all!

Trying to ignore the nearly tangible earnestness of those oddly adorable petite feet, you asked the assembled crowd, "Is there a way for me to go back home?"

Again, the feet shuffled nervously before the leader offered a hesitant nod.

You smiled, hope blossoming in your heart. "There is? Excellent! Oh man, you guys are all weirdly nice and stuff, and this place isn't as bad as I thought at first, but I'd really like to go back to my normal life again." The petite pair gripped you even harder, while the restless fidgeting among the crowd increased in strength. You grimaced, gently grabbing the attached feet and trying to pull them free, with no success. "Come on," you implored, feeling both silly and exasperated for arguing with a pack of pleasant yet clingy feet. "You agreed that I could go back to my normal life!"

At this, the leader foot loudly slapped the fleshy ground before offering an extremely vehement shake in the negative.

You gritted your teeth. "What?! But you just–"

Suddenly, you felt that shrinking sensation again, quick but fortunately brief. Even so, the lead foot now stretched the length of your leg, while the previously petite pair on your chest spanned the length of your forearms. The leader stomped the ground twice before leaning back and curling its toes, themselves nearing your seated eye level.

A thought crossed your mind. "Wait a minute," you drawled, slowly and dangerously. The larger yet still petite feet on your chest shivered at the tone. Leveling a glare at the leader's toes, you asked, "Did you just shrink me?"

The leader nodded.

You gritted your teeth, hard. "And you shrank me earlier too."

Another nod.

Your control shattered and you made to throttle, somehow, the suddenly-identified bane of your existence. Two larger feet deftly seized your arms between their toes, leaving you standing and glaring at the lead foot, the petite pair from before gamely clinging to your shirt. Deprived of swift vengeance, you shouted, "Dammit, do you have any idea how shitty my day's been?!"

The foot nodded, almost morosely.

Undaunted, you growled, "'Course you would, you fucking freaky shrinky foot. It's all your fault anyway."

At this, the foot slowly shook in a somber deliberate negative.

You frowned. "But you said you'd shrunk me earlier..." A recent memory flashed, that of you shrinking on the sole of the foot planetoid beneath you. Something that indeed happened earlier, not even twenty minutes ago. But it wouldn't be acting this... sadly... if it–

You blinked, stomach falling as the missing pieces of this partially verbal conversation snapped into place. "You only shrank me after I got here," you intoned with lifeless resignation. "My sister still caused all the shrinking before. You're the ones who brought me here, and you could send me back, but you wouldn't be able to restore my regular size, and you could only return me to the exact place I left. Meaning I'd still be stuck shrinking inside my sister's gigantic foot."

The lead foot nodded at each bullet point, as morosely as ever. You sagged, feeling similarly defeated. The bouncer feet calmly released their hold on your arms, and you collapsed back onto your slightly larger toe ottoman. The pair still clutching your shirt settled onto your lap again, though they never released their grip and were actually shivering, almost as if they were deep in the throes of a crying fit.

Crying? Crying for you? Could they even feel that emotion, sadness? And why?

Numbly shaking your head, you muttered, "So in the end, you saved me from a certain fate worse than death. Being stuck inside my sister like that would have been horrible. And here, at least, I've got something – someone? – to talk with." You shrugged, glancing tiredly over the assembled crowd. "But... what do I have to look forward to here? No offense, but there's nothing here but feet. Better than any feet I'd seen in my entire life, but still... just feet. How am I gonna survive? Is there anything for me to eat? Or drink?" You buried all disturbing thoughts about toe jam, foot sweat, or any other substance someone might naturally find on their feet. No matter the wondrous cleanliness of this world of feet, some things were still too gross. Then you stopped and considered this bizarre dimension and its own unnatural set of physics. "Do I even need to?"

The lead foot cocked briefly to the side before shaking in a tentative negative.

You look up to see your little sister towering above you with her hand on the door, holding it shut. She is staring down at you with a disappointed look on her face.

"This isn't fair - I wanted to wrestle! Whenever I was the small one we always wrestled even though I always lost. Now that you are smaller and I can finally win you just quit."

You can't help but acknowledge that she is right, and you almost feel bad for her a little - until she speaks again.

"Well, if you are not going to wrestle with me, then I can think of a different game we can play, but first I need to shrink you more."

Before you can even react she kicks you in the chest and you fall helplessly to the ground, face up. You look up at her face as she puts her foot on your chest, pinning you to the ground.

"Ready," she asks with a big grin on her face, as if you had a choice. All you can do is look up in horror as she raises her foot above your face and slowly lowers it down. The ball of her foot pins down your forehead as her soft, warm arch touches your nose and her heel lands on your chin. Her foot is already bigger than your face! She slowly increases pressure until her warm sole is firmly pressing on your face. You hold your breath, hoping to avoid shrinking by not smelling it.

"I can wait!" you hear her say above. Soon you cannot hold your breath any longer. You exhale in a long sigh and are forced to take a long, deep breath, taking in the scent of your sister's foot. Shortly after you feel yourself shrinking again. Well, actually, you feel her foot getting bigger on your face, so you know you are shrinking. You start to plead with her and beg her not to shrink you any more.

"Relax," she says. "I'm only going to shrink you for a while so I can have some fun with you, then I'll let you go and we'll see if you grow back."

You are now roughly a foot tall you estimate. Your sister's heel is on your stomach while the ball of her foot pins down your whole face. She continues until you are about an inch tall, your whole body pinned down under her arch. She lifts her foot off of you and you stand up, looking around your giant room. Everything seems so different now.

"That's better," your sister booms from above in a deafening voice. "Now we're going to play godzilla. I'm Godzilla and you are a little human and your room is the city. You have to try to escape me and I have to try to crush you or eat you. Just to make things fair, I'll close my eyes and count for twenty seconds so you can get a head start." It must be a nightmare to be trapped in a large version of those socks, or worse, be shrunk and in them, sliding around because of the slipperiness, only to be pressed so uncaring into her soles when she walks, or squeezed in the infinite folds of her toes, probibly to be stuck there forever. The dampness will be the worst aspect, but the alternative seems less attractive. If she decides to somehow peel off her socks, and utilize her raw weapons, then the experience would be very different. There would be little problem with any sweat soaked in the fabric of her sock, but her bare foot up close won't act shy with their own weapons. You may accidentally catch sock lint or toe jam into your mouth, or worse yet, swallow some. You have had a previous experience where your sister surprised you with an oreo, but the insides were filled with the residue washed from between her toes, and it tasted awful. You don't want that taste in your mouth again. The actual foot itself would have more traction and be less prone to sliding. Her probibly feisty toes also formed an effective mechanism to latch on to your face, although it would be only a weak grasp. If one were small enough to be held by the weak force of someone's toe muscles, and forced inside the horribly disgusting toe crevice, then they would be powerless to stop all the combined repulsion the simple foot can offer. 115231.content:
After a short time, you decided that you would stay home. After all, you knew all the greatest places to hide, the best routes to use as an escape, and you figured the girls would forget about the game by the time it even became relevant. You sat back down and continued listening to your music, when your sister returned to your room.
"Alright David, I've called all my friends, and I made sure to remind them to bring dirty socks and shoes that don't breathe!" she exclaimed, her voice full of excitement.
"That's great." you sarcastically respond. Your sister gives you a disapproving look, and then continues to explain how the night will play out.
"Well, I've called Sally, Maxine, Vanessa, and Alice. They all agreed to come by at 8:00, so I'll have the game start at 9:00." Isabel said. All four of the girls she had mentioned were on her soccer team, so not only did you have to worry about her sweaty soccer feet, but all of her friends soccer feet as well. You shooed Isabel out of your room so you could prepare for the rest of the night. You might have underestimated how difficult the task your sister set for you really will be, but your confidence hasn't dwindled yet and it certainly won't anytime soon.
A few hours pass, and you hear Isabel open the front door downstairs. Soon after, you hear the joyful (and soon to be sinister) giggles of the young girls. At...worst...

This vast crater of flesh would be your new and permanent home.

Time passes on as you clean up Isabel's navel. Meanwhile, she was lying on the couch in the living room, watching one of her favorite shows on either Netflix, or some other sort of streaming service.

"It's fine...I can't expect you to always do the...Impossible!?" You trailed off. Seeing that for some reason or another, your phone showed that it was charging. Even going up a percentage as you look speechless at your phone.

"Y-y-yeah...All good down here..." You responded. Still wondering how this feat was achieved.

As the time went on, your phone wavered up and down in power. Never fully recharging, but still higher than before you used it in your sis's belly button. You suspected that if you were to not use it for a while, it should fully recharge.

*YAWN!* [Lips smack] "Well, David...It's getting pretty late, don't you think?" Isabel sleepily says as she gets to her feet.

Fortunately, her common place movements didn't spell life threatening perils for you. Her navel skin was soft enough for you to sink in deep enough that her movements didn't drastically affect you, but shallow enough that you could still move around whether she moved or not, as well as the the close proximity to her approximate center of gravity. You felt that you were...Safe...
Crazy, right?
Feeling safe after your little sister somehow shrank the ever living shit out of you.

But...All things considered...It felt cozy in there. Izzy's body temp relaxed your muscles, while an ample draft made it so that you wouldn't feel hot. You could hear her pulse like it was white noise, while her digestive system made noises that were comparable to whale noises in your perspective. Her skin was silky soft and smooth. If you were on any other part of her, you'd be feeling a barrage of disorienting forces. But here...you felt like you were at sea, fishing with your dad, catching grouper, trout, bass, carp, and anything else that was edible. Too bad that he was a no-good womanizer and cheated on your mom when Isabel could just speak coherent words, but at least you have a few great memories with him. That's more than what other kids of broken families can say. At least mom is moving on. She already is in a 15 month relationship with someone named "Morgan". You haven't met him yet,(At least you think it's a 'him') but he apparently has a job in bioengineering. Apparently he and Kayla(Your mom's childhood friend) often work together. Not surprising, since Mrs. Kane is a biochemist at the top of her field, as well as a certified general physician and family doctor.

*Fwooop!*

"Holly hand grenade!" You shrieking in utter surprise as your sister flopped onto her bed. You were so lost in thought that you didn't even notice that your sister was already for bed.

A shadow approached, cutting off your access to light, until you were caught up in the thing that blocked the light. It pulled you out like a ginormous monster, forcing you out in the open until you were halted in front of a ginormous view of what you could only guess to be your sister Isabel's face.

She seemed indifferent of your safety before, and more concerned about entertaining herself with you, like you were a mere toy. But as of recent, she seems to have returned to looking at you as a person, but more importantly, her brother. You didn't know what the future had in store for you, but as long as Isabel retained this docile and hospitable attitude, you didn't have to cower in fear for now.

Maybe call Sally over...Or just head over there myself...Or...Spend the day having more fun with you, Davey! The possibilities are endless..." She rattles off.

After setting down your sweatpants full of stuff, you started by wetting your hair and taking a palm full of shampoo and worked it in. Lathering it up, you could hear Isabel humming in the shower. You couldn't make out the tune she was humming. Ignoring it, you grabbed another handful of water(Like in Ant Bully) and used it to rinse out your hair.

So far so good. This makeshift bath seems to be working so far. You continued on by working in some conditioner in and moving the water into the "O" in "ONE CENT" to make a more suitable bathtub. After it was filled with enough water, you dived in and ran back out to get two handfuls of body wash and headed back, sitting on the edge of the "O" you washed yourself up ease. This will make for one helluva story. After washing every inch of your body, you jump into the "O" pool and rinsed off. Enjoying the warm water and swimming in the chest-high pool. Meanwhile, Isabel was taking a run-of-the-mill shower, you were having fun all on your own. After finishing up, you realize that Isabel was still washing up. Figures. She is your mother's daughter after all. You took advantage of the situation and started to wash your soiled clothes. Wringing out the dirt and filth that Isabel put on you, lying them down out to air dry, you sat on the mass of belly button lint that you saved and killed time on your phone once again.

A short while later, Isabel turned off the water and stepped out to dry off.

Picking up her change of clothes.
"HEY! David! I'm done! I hope you are too!" She said, wearing something to dry off.

"It's about time you got...out...HEY! WHY ARE YOU WEARING MY BATHROBE!?!" You asked, ticked off.

"RELAX...It's not like you're gonna use it anytime soon!" Isabel said, drilling her fingers against the robe into her navel.
"Anyways, you're probably freezing cold from that bath of yours! C'mere! Let your "BIG SIS" Izzy dry you off!" Isabel said in a babying tone. She plucked you up and placed you onto her palm. Bringing you up to her face.

"AWE! You look SO CUTE!...Why do you have all that hair down there?" She asks.

"Huh!?...AAAAAH!!!" You covered yourself as best you could. "Don't look!"

"HE HE HE HE HE!!! It's so small!"

"Because I'M so small!"

"Mmhmm...Okay..." Isabel said.

"Now!...Back to drying you off...but first...C'mere! Give me a hug, David!" Isabel said, bringing you to her chest in a loving embrace.

"Uuugh! Isabel...Fine! I'm hugging you! I'M HUGGING YOU!" You said, doing your best to hug her ginormous torso.

"Perfect!" She exclaims.

"Hey...What are you-Uuuuuugh!!! Isabel! What are you doing?!" You struggled to say.

Isabel squished her breast together, rubbing them, and you between them.

"Drying you off, bro! I wanted to be gentle, so what better way to be gentle with than between my brea-"

"OKAY, OKAY! I'M DRY NOW! PLEASE JUST STOP!!!" You begged.

"Okay...I'll just put you back in my belly butto-"

"WAIT!" You shouted.

"What?"Isabel asks puzzled.

"I forgot my stuff on the penny!"

"Oh...Good thing that you remembered...Can you imagine if you lost all of your stuff?!" Isabel moved you b to the penny once more.

You got off and checked your stuff. The only thing that was dry was your sweatpants. The rest of your clothes were still a bit too damp. Gathering back the belly button lint into your sweatpants, you slipped your phone into one of it's pockets and held it with one arm, and your other damp clothes in the other.

"Alright! I got my stuff! I'm ready!" You joller to her.

"Okey dokey!" Isabel responds, bringing back her monolithic finger near your position. You climbed back onto it like before. Isabel draws you up to her face again.

"In ya go, lil' bro!" She rhymes, plunging you back into her gaping navel.

You get off of the wrinkly back of her belly button and unpacked the lint. Sitting in the pile once again. It's strange. You actually felt good to be back. Isabel didn't need to know that though.

"Alright! I'm going to change now! No peeking!" Isabel said in a singsong voice.

"Just don't take too long...If your stomach keeps growling this loud, I won't be able to hear crap off of my phone...Plus it just reminds me of how hungry I am..." You said.

"Good point...I'll hurry along!" She replies.

Her movements to change were definitely felt by you. But it wasn't so bad. It was like you were in the world's biggest water bed. You noticed that her skin was smoother and softer than before. The atmosphere of her navel had a more pleasant aroma. The same fruity stuff you smelled before was much more prevalent. Although something familiar to Isabel's feet could also be detected. Much fainter than before, but you wondered what it meant. Figuring that it wasn't that important, you moved on to resuming your favorite shows in your little sister's belly button.

"All done! Let's go get some breakfast!" Isabel spoke with glee.
121131222222111221112.title: "Don't worry! I have an idea!"

1211312222221112211121.content:
Her movements became a bit easier until she got to the stairs, in which case, the shaking entered a whole new level of harsh. You were bounced around her belly button like a pinball until she reached ground level, and made her way to the kitchen. A bit dazed, you went to the lint pile to ly down a bit. Just as you settled down from being thrown around, Isabel's ginormous finger crept back in to snatch you up once again.

"Hey! What the heck are you--AAAAAAAAAAAAAHH!!!" *Splash!* You were dropped into an ice cold lake of some sort. After collecting yourself, you looked to see large inner tube-like objects floating all around you. The water didn't look like or feel like water. It looked white and very murky, like you couldn't see your appendages underneath it. The fluid had a familiar taste and smell. That's when it hit you. Isabel put you in a bowl of cereal. As this revelation came to you, an enormous shiny object plunged into the cereal and agitated it's contents, you included.

Fearing for your life, you call up to her, "ISABEL! I'M IN YOUR CHEERIOS! PLEASE! DON'T EAT ME!"

She appears to be ignoring you. Colossal spoonful after spoonful, dodging and evading as best you could until she plunged the spoon right next to you, causing the colloid solution to drag you into it like a riptide. Frantically, you swam in hopes of getting back to the surface but were laid out on a hard convex surface pulling you up until it slowed down and momentum brought you to the surface. You see that you were floating in a cheerio and realized that you were being drawn to Isabel's face. You knew of the impending doom, and panicked accordingly.

"PLEASE...DON'T EAT ME...ISABEL, PLEASE! I'M BEGGING YOU...I DON'T WANNA DIE! ESPECIALLY NOT LIKE THIS...Please...don't eat me...I thought I got my sister back...Don't...*Sobbing* Don't eat me..." You begged like a baby.

Isabel's monstrously massive mouth opened, revealing her pearly white teeth and beast of a tongue. You could see strands of saliva formed. Beyond her uvula, you saw an endless darkness, knowing where it leads.

Desperate, you make one last attempt to get Isabel's attention.
"ISABEL!!! NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!" You cried out as the spoon was just about to enter her mouth until...

"Gotcha..." Isabel whispered, mouth right in front of you.

You sobbed "What?!..."

"GOTCHA!" She shouted in a deafening tone.

Once your ears stopped ringing, you asked "WHAT!?! What do you mean "Gotcha!" Isabel, what's going on!?"

"I totally pranked you! You should have seen the look on your little face! Priceless!" She replies giggling.

"I...I thought that you were going to eat me!" You shouted back upset.

"Oh, David...If I was gonna eat you, I'd at least have the decency to tell you...Unless I didn't notice...But all I wanted was to reenact that one scene from that one, really old movie...C'mon! Why else would I eat cheerios? You know I love me my fruity pebbles!" Isabel said.

"Still...It's wrong to eat people! And as small as I am, I'M PEOPLE!" You said back.

"Yeah...But it was funny, huh?!" She replies.

"You're lucky that I dropped my phone before you snatched me out! Now I need to take another bath..."

"I have another idea!"

"What?!"

"Hang on a minute..."She said, slurping the milk from the spoon until you reached her ginormous lips and held on for dear life as she ate the whetted cereal off the spoon. She brought a finger to you and kissed your insignificant frame. She then moved you onto the kitchen table below you and departed to the refrigerator. After grabbing a drinking glass, she came back with a cold carton of orange juice. Isabel poured herself a glass of it and took a sip, then setting it down near you.

"Well?" You asked impatiently.

"Give it a moment..." Isabel responded.

After a while, condensation formed on the outside of the OJ glass, until beads of it began to make their way down.

"There's your second bath! Sorry, but it's good to be really cold...nothing I can do..." She said, returning to the rest of her cereal.

Realizing that there's little else you could do, you decided to wash off your milk bathed body with the cold droplets. The water chilled you to the bone. You finished up around the time that Isabel finished her cereal.

"Aaah!...All done! I left you some cereal and milk in that spoon I left, so-"

"Woah! Woah! Woah! That's it?! That's breakfast!? Cereal and OJ!?! Uh uh!...That's not breakfast..." You said with confidence.

"What do you mean "That's not breakfast" ? Cereal is a breakfast food! Meaning that it's breakfast!" She replies.

"Maybe a bowl of frosted shredded wheat, but sure as hell ain't one bowl of cheerios!...What part of "Part of this complete breakfast" don't you understand?" You responded.

"Alright...you make a good point...but what do you want me to do? Grow you back, so you can cook something? I don't even know how!" Isabel said.

"Well then...I guess I'm going to have to teach you how to cook some breakfast...Let's see...Fried eggs can be a bit tricky...and you could easily burn bacon if you sont know what you doing...Scrambled eggs is pretty foolproof...but alone isn't breakfast...Ah Ha! An omelet! I'll teach you how to make an omelet!" You decided.

"An omelet?!...I like omelettes...Hang on...How are we gonna communicate on how to make an omelet?" She asks.

"Luck us, I have my phone...and with an app I have on it, I can use any bluetooth device as a loudspeaker! Do you have your earpods with you?!" You ask.

"Uh huh!" Isabel confirmed.

"Alright...Turn them on and I'll pair to them...Then, put me on your shoulder or something, so I can see what you're doing..."

"Okey doke!" She said, moving you to her navel to retrieve your phone, then on her nose so you could see everything.

After telling her what she needed, she gathered all the ingredients and supplies that she'd need for this.

'Okay...First thing's first...crack some eggs in that bowl...Make sure not to get any eggshells in it" You said.

"Okay...One...Two...Three...and...Four!" Isabel sounds off, cracking the eggs into the bowl. To your surprise, she did it very well.

"Do I add milk to it?!" She asks.

"No...It actually dries the eggs out when you cook them...common mistake most people make...Alright...Beat A.K.A. beat the eggs until the yolks are well incorporated into the mix, then put the pan on the burner and turn it on to medium-low heat, add a bit of butter, let it coat the pan, then add the beaten eggs to the pan once the butter is all melted. Then comes the fun part! Add cheese, ham, turkey, whatever you want to the omelet. Wait until the edges are cooked and the fold it like a taco shell would be. Give it a little time before you flip the whole thing over and turn off the burner. Plate it after a while and boom! Omelet! Got that?!" You asked.

"Uuuh...Could you walk me through that while I do it?" She asks, still only having cracked the eggs into the bowl.

"Okay...I'll talk you through it as you go..." You said.

After helping Isabel step-by-step, her efforts resulted in an omelet.

*Sniffs* "Mmmmm...This omelet smells yummy! Thanks David!" Isabel said, grateful of your guidance.

"You're welcome! Now...Give it a little time to cool down a bit...In the meantime...do you know how to make toast?!" You asked.

"Duh! Of course I know how to make toast!" She said.

"Then if you want to, make some, and add butter and jelly or jam to it" You said.

"Right on it!" Isabel says.

After some more time, Isabel made some toast with butter and strawberry jam. Her comple breakfast was complete. Now all she has to do is eat.

"Time to dig in!" Isabel exclaims.

Your little sister devours her breakfast with a look of enjoyment. Thankfully, she left some of it over for you to get your breakfast. After telling her that you were all done, she finished what's left, returned you back into her navel, and washed all the dishes she used.

"Okay! Time for some fun, lil' bro!" She exclaims.

"Fun?! What...What kind of "Fun" are you talking about?" You asked nervously.

ISABEL!...You're probably right...But I think that we should give this show a little break and watch something else..."

You're impatiently wait for your sister to wake up, because you were taught that it's common courtesy to wait until everyone is up before you eat breakfast.

at 9:30, you hear movement from your sisters room, so you go eat a bowl of corn flakes. You notice that each time you eat that cereal, your sexual urges lessen, for a time. Your sister comes out of her room, and says "Morning!" She then pours herself a bowl of raisin bran.

1323.content:
As you slowly chew on your corn flakes, you have to stiffle a yawn more than once to prevent some falling right back into the bowl. Since you were free today anyway, you had assumed staying up until three in the morning would be no problem. At first, you've had some awesome chats with cool people from all around the web and later, you just aimlessly browsed some random articles on sites that didn't really interest you as well as youtube videos of people smashing their PCs to pieces. You had also stolen a bottle of beer which your dad has bought some weeks ago. Your dad often drank beer and enjoyed it a lot, but right now, he was in Indonesia because of his work. Your mom, Linda, however, did not like the beverage at all. And even more, she didn't like seeing you drinking it at any time. "No alcohol until he is 18, do you understand me?" You have heard your mom thunder more than once, whenever she had spied your dad secretly pouring you a glass. "It's just one glass, dear. That hardly has any alcohol." Your dad would then soothe your mother, but she would have none of it.

Now your dad was never one to be easily intimidated, but you were sometimes a little scared of your mother. Not only was she tall enough to tower over yourself, but her voice was loud whenever she got emotional and her fits of anger were legendary, even though she was a good person most of the time. Her punishments were always really harsh, too. Once, she had ordered you to clean your room and when she had complained that it wasn't good enough, you tried arguing with her only for the shortest time. Your mom had instantly taken away your computer for an entire week, literally plugging it off and locking it away in her bedroom. You knew you could have stolen it back from there easily, but there was no way she wouldn't have known. And you always knew better than to piss her off further when she was already boiling. That never lead to pleasant results.

You groggily shake your head to drive the unpleasant memories from your brain. Looking at Isabelle, your little sis, you are amazed how she can be so full of energy today. Isabelle seems to be trying to gulp down her cereals as fast as possible, her face carrying a fat grin whenever her mouth wasn't filled and her sparkling eyes were darting around the room like flying arrows. You also noticed how her legs were constantly shuffling and twitching around. Did this brat ever know how to sit still?

"So..." you wearily mumble, dimly remembering how your mom had commanded you to look after your sister today. Since your mom is a businesswoman (Some sort of secretary, but you sometimes call her Mrs. Important, mockingly. Never to her face, though), she would usually send one of her two chosen babysitters after you, but since one of them was on vacation and the other one had caught some sort of flu, your mom had given the responsibility to you, this time. "I think you are old enough for this, anyway." She had said "And it's only for a week." You had asked her if she couldn't simply hire someone else, but your mom didn't trust others easily.

Your thoughts had drifted off once again. "Hmmm?" Isabelle replies, through a cereal-filled smile. You shake your head and groan softly. "So, uhm... You wanna do anything special today, sis? Since I gotta babysit you, or something." You crack a smirk at her frown and Isabelle spits "I'm not a baby!" after swiftly making room in her mouth. You just chuckle and take another spoon of cornflakes. "But... No. Not really. I don't know what I wanna do today, yet." Sounds like an easy job for me!, you think, but you remain silent. You watch her for a little longer and add "You kinda seem to be in a hurry, though..." To which she starts beaming like the sun itself. "Oh, I have to finish quickly! In ten minutes or so, the new episode will come!" Isabelle chimed.

You try to remember what exactly she's talking about, but you give up quickly. You shrug and say "One of those girly trash shows, right?" and are once again delighted by Isabelle's swift outburst "It's NOT trash! It's awesome and I bet even you would like it if you gave it a try!" "Yeah, well, no thank you."

True to her word, Isabelle swiftly finished and then rushed off from the table wordlessly, to the front of the TV. You stare darkly at her cereal bowl and spoon she had left. "Hey! Put those into the dishwasher yourself!" You yell, but only get the impatient reply "I don't have time now! It's gonna start now!" You pound the table with your fist in frustration. You always have to do stuff like that. If you just removed your own like a good boy and left Isabelle's dishes there, you just know mom would get on your nerves why YOU didn't remove it. It just made no sense.

Getting up with another yawn, you take both of your dishes and put them away properly. As you walk across the living room, you spy your sister lying flat on her stomach, her eyes glued to the TV screen. From the TV screen, horrible, colorful faces stare back at you, with oversized eyes and loud, shrill voices. How anyone could watch something like that willingly, that was beyond you.

You decide to walk up wordlessly to your room and play some good old video games in peace and quiet. Your sis would be in the loving care of the Television anyway and you knew you couldn't compete with that, even if you tried. Let alone the fact that you didn't want to try. So you retreat to the safety of your room and get out your sweet handheld game system. Despite being armed with a working computer and all the glory of the internet, you decided to start playing this particular game, one you once got for your birthday and had played through twice already. Noticing that the faint smell of beer was still in the air, you wisely decided to open the window at first.

You jump on your bed and turn on your little device and almost instantly, you are lost in this amazing game. While you are absorbed in the wonders of eletronic entertainment, warm summer air comes creeping into your room, making you lazy and tired. You keep gaming on for several minutes, but eventually, you feel your eyelids getting heavier and heavier...
1323.title: Cereals, and video games

Isabelle soon wants something from you!
13232.content:
At some point, you must have fallen into a light sleep. The steady flow of heavy, warm air, together with the fact that you didn't exactly slept much the last night helped you greatly as dozing off. Because of that, your heart almost burst out of your chest when the door to your room suddenly flew open with a loud crashing noise! You literally jumped up from bed, your little gaming tool (Still running, the battery power was good) flying away like a released bird and landing on the other side of the room.

"Hey, bro! I'm hungry!" Isabelle eagerly announced. You shook your sleepy head and glared at her angrily. "God damn... Don't you ever fucking knock?" Isabelle looked a bit startled and you remembered that mom didn't like it very much if you spoke like that... especially to your younger sis. But it didn't matter, she wasn't here right now. "I said I'm hungry!" Isabelle said defiantly, crossing her arms in front of her chest and pouting.

With a heavy groan, you get up from bed. Oh, how you would love to tell her Go get some food yourself! and then slam the door into her face, but no, you are much too good a brother for that. Your mom ought to be thankful. Either way, it wasn't like you actually had to cook something, which is good because you knew about as much about cooking as a cow knows about playing a piano, but your mom always left something for you in the fridge that needed to be microwaved. In the evening, she would be home again anyway and in the morning, both of you had your cereal anyway, so that was pretty much all the food-work you had to do.

Still, right now, the urge to drop back into bed and sleep for another few hours was overwhelming. But at least your sisters eyes shone with joy (And also hunger) as she watched you walking to the door. "Come on, I'll make us something..." You mutter and she follows you squealing and screaming in delight, jumping up and down. You wearily walk to the fridge, staring at your sister in disbelief. You only just noticed something; as she was bouncing up and down, a few droplets of sweat were dripping down her face every now and then. She starts sweating easily..., comes rushing into your mind Just like mom.

It was true, only that with mom, it was usually much worse. Because mom did not only sweat a whole lot, but you could also very much smell it from the other side of a room, which was very much disgusting. Also it was wise never to tell her that she smelled outright, because doing so was like waking an angry dragon!

But all those grim thoughts faded away as you look into the fridge and find, safely stored in a sealed container and wrapped into aluminium foil... "Schnitzel!" You scream in joy, looking at Isabelle, who returns the facial expression. "Mom made Schnitzel for us! How awesome is that??? Oh yeah, and some fries, too. Yesss!" You cheer as you tenderly remove the fine food from the fridge and carefully arange it onto two plates, before putting it into the microwave. "Yay! Mommy's Schnitzel are the best!" You hear Isabelle cheer from behind you and you find yourself nodding sagely. "True that. They are the best thing ever. Ok, maybe Pizza or Spaghetti, but hey, Schnitzel is Schnitzel, you know. Oh yes... how I love Schnitzel." You ramble more to yourself than to your sister, but she doesn't mind.

After a loud TING noise, you remove the precious food and place it on the table. This time, both of you devour it like starved tigers, savouring the fine taste. Both of you are finished shortly, and once again, you move out to remove the dishes since Isabelle has run off once more. This time, you didn't mind quite as much. Maybe today won't be such a bad day after all... you think smiling as you whistle some video game music to yourself.

Yes, maybe today would be nice after all. It would mostly depend on what Isabelle was going to do, though...
13232.title: The day goes on...

132322.content:
Ah, another sweet time period of peace and quiet... Or so it seemed at first. After just a short time, Isabelle was right at you again, wanting something from you, yet again. "Huh? What is it now?" You say slightly annoyed as she stares at you with sparkling eyes. "Hey, bro! I wanna play something!" She beams at you. "Eh? Go play then. Leave me alone." You say, heading to your room. But already, you can feel her little hand tugging on your arm. "No, I wanna go outside. Come with me, it'll be stupid all alone!" You groan and are just about to tell Isabelle to go on her own again, but then you remember the road going just outside your house. Stupid as she is, she might as well get run over by some car... And then, it'll be my fault again, of course... you think bitterly as you nod your head with another sigh. "Yeah, alright, let's head out."

You head to the door to put on your street shoes and almost gag as you bend down to tie them properly. You soon spy the source of the problem: Your mother's running shoes. With a grunt of disgust, you kick them further away. That was another exceptionally unpleasant thing about your mom: Her feet absolutely reeked. Partly thanks to her heavy sweating, but even when she wasn't doing anything especially sweat-provoking, like lying around watching TV, her feet would have a very noticable, repulsive smell that made itself painfully obvious once you moved in too closely. Sitting on the floor while mom was on the couch was DEFINITELY not a good idea, if you wanted to survive the encounter. You remember Isabelle wondering a few times if Mommy's feet were made entirely of cheese, because of the strong smell and jokingly agreed on that. Their stench was mostly one of stale, ripe cheese, but there was also some sort of sour, burning sting to it, not unlike vinegar.

You look at the offending shoe with contempt. You remember that your mom had gone for a quick run yesterday... Even though the shoes have had more than a full day to air out, the strenght of their stench was still surprising. You remember how you once dared a classmate who had come over to take a quick whiff at them and he had agreed up to the point where he moved the huge, offending thing closer to his face. You couldn't blame him, not only were those shoes very big (Due to your mom's very long and large feet), but if you looked inside, you could clearly see the dark imprints of her terrible soles and toes, painted with the horrible footsweat of hers. You didn't dare to imagine what those must smell like up-close, let alone right after they had come off!

Shaking your head vigorously, you manage to push those disgusting thoughts away. "Are you coming or what?" Isabelle is shouting, already standing at the door, in her stupid pink shoes she adores so much. She wears them all the time, you think once those had been bought for her, she had never worn any other ones. With a shrug, you quickly run to her and open the door. "Yeah, let's go."

As you step outside, the heat of the midday sun hits you like a brick. "Ahhhh... You sure you don't wanna get out later? It's really hot right now..." You complain, shielding your eyes from the sun. But Isabelle doesn't seem to mind. "Come on already!" She just laughs and storms off. You know you can't just walk back inside and have her dashing around outside, probably killing herself in the end in some stupid way. Groaning once more, you head after her.

In the end, you end up chasing each other for a long time, just aimlessly running around in circles it seemed. Truly the best form of spending time outside, you knew it. All was well, until one point, where Isabelle suddenly decided to tried climbing up a nearby tree. Before you could even rush over and yell to her that she should stop doing needlessly stupid things like that, you already see her slipping and falling to the ground! Thankfully enough, it wasn't a very high fall, but even so, Isabelle fell to the ground, breaking into tears instantly.

"Ah crap. Isabelle, are you hurt?" You cry out, sounding more annoyed than genuinely concerned, but it didn't matter. Rushing over to your crying sister, you kneel down quickly. She still seemed to be pretty fine from the outside, aside from her wailing, but even then, you ask again "Hey, where does it hurt?" and see Isabelle pointing to her left foot. "I-I-I think I... I think I broke m-m-my foot... Wahhhh!" She screamed loudly. You feel yourself taken aback a bit. It sure doesn't look this bad, but what if it actually is?

"Let me have a look at it..." You sigh, fearing for the worst. You reach out to her foot and pull it closer to yourself, it still being clad in her annoying, bright pink shoes.

As soon as you start pulling it off and thus revealing her small foot, clad in a disgustingly discolored sock, a wave of strong, cheesy foot smell comes washing over yourself, almost directly into your face! You cough and turn your head to the side while waving your hand around to drive the stench away. It seems like your little sis has one more thing in common with your mom! "Argh! Your feet stink terribly, you know..." You mumble as you look back at Isabelle. Isabelle doesn't seem to care much as she shoves her small foot even closer to you. "Is it broken? It hurts, bro! Tell me what's wrong with my foot!" She screams, not really willing to calm down just yet!

You groan out of frustration and also nausea as the footsmell intensifies! You block her sole, which seems to be coming directly for your face with the palm of your hand and shiver as you feel that her sock is not only moist, but literally soaking wet with sweat! "Ah... oh god..." You mumble as you delicately and with shaking fingers move to pull her sock off. You aren't even sure why you're bothering to do this, her foot is obviously fine. Apart from the terrible stench.

As you slowly pull the soaked sock off, it sticking to her tender sole like glue, the smell only gets worse and worse. Your eyes start to tear up as the rancid smell of old cheese and stale popcorn overcome your senses, and you start to feel more than a little dizzy. Finally though, with your hands slick with your little sister's footsweat, you succeed in freeing her small, reeking foot.

You stare at the thing in disgust as you slowly turn it around in your hands. The strong aroma makes you feel like the whole world's slowly spinning around, but even then, you try to focus. "N-Nothing wrong... *cough* with it..." You mumble through the thick waft of cheesy stench. As you look at the ankle, you find a blueish-purple area there. "Ah, it's just a bruise, see?" You say as you try to push the foot further away again.

But suddenly, you realise that everything is starting to turn horribly wrong! Your sister's foot suddenly seems to become bigger and bigger, suddenly too heavy to hold with one hand. But as you look around, you see that everything is starting to get bigger and bigger! Except for you. "Hey! Hey, what's going on?" You yelp out in fear. "Stop this, whatever you're doing!" "Bro? Hey, what is happening?" Isabelle suddenly cries out, startled by the tone in your voice.

But before either of you can do anything to improve the situation, you shrink down to an even smaller size. Your sister's hot, sweaty foot becomes even heavier and heavier... And suddenly, with a horrible shock, you realise that your grip on it is loosening more and more! Also because of the size difference, it is now looming directly over you! "Sis! Sis! Isabelle! Remove your- *ummmmmmpppfff!*" Too late. With all the slimy sweat covering it, your hands finally slip from the smelling foot and it comes crashing down on top of you!

Your hands dig into the soft, moist flesh of your sister's sole, trying desperately to push it off, but the weight of it is too great already! An unbearable, ripe stench of sweat and feet is covering your entire body, making you weaker and weaker while shrinking you even further at the same time! Finally, even your last bit of resistance is broken as your arms get pushed to the side and the meaty, wet mass of footsole comes down on you for good, pressing you flat against the ground! You groan in pain as the heat and pressure become painfully high but the worst thing is still the inhuman stench.

"Bro? Bro, where are you?" You hear someone scream, but it sounds as if it's coming from many miles away. Can she really be... so stupid... You weakly think as you finally give away to the brutal smell and fall unconscious for good!
132322.title: Isabelle soon wants something from you!

133.content:
You're finishing up with your breakfast when your Sister walks into the Kitchen. You tell her Mom is out for the day and that you are in charge. The two of you walk into the living room, she puts the TV on and you grab your gameboy and start playing. About a minute goes by before Isabelle starts complaining that there is nothing on and she wants you to play a game with her.

"Not Now" you tell her. "Im in the middle of this"
"Youre just playing Gameboy, you can do that later!" she wines. "Plus Mom would want you to play a game with me!"
"Listen!" you tell her. "I'm in charge here and I say we will play later"
"Why are YOU always in charge?" she asks
"Because I'm bigger than you" you respond, "When Mom is home she is in charge because she is the biggest, when she isn't I'm in charge because I am the biggest here. The bigger person is always in charge, that's how it is. If you were bigger than me, You would be in charge, but you're just my little sister so right now I am".
"Fine!" Izzy says, a little angrily, but understanding the rules. "But maybe someday i'll grow up to be bigger than you".
"Well, when that happens I will do whatever you say" you tell her, knowing that as your little sister she will never reach your height, probably not even as an adult.

Some time goes by and you are basically done with the gameboy. You figure it would be nice to play a game with your sister. You always got along because for the most part she did what you told her to. You tell her youre ready and ask her what she wants to do. When she told you she wanted to play you were excited. Every once in a while you and your sister would play "princess". She would be in charge and you and all her little dolls would do what she said. You always had a bit of a foot fetish, and though she was your little sister, izzy had extremely beautiful feet for a girl her age. And when Izzy played "princess" at one point she would always tell you to kiss the royal feet, or something of the sort. "So what's your name, little squirt?" She grinds your face into her butt as she says this.

"My name..." you sigh and mumble out, "is Buttmunch."

"Sorry, I couldn't hear you," she says, barely containing her laughter. "You're such a tiny twerp you'll have to speak up."

"MY NAME IS BUTTMUNCH" you say loudly.

She bursts out laughing and it doesn't die down for a full minute. "Nice to meet you, Buttmunch. From now on, you tell everyone that's your name. Oh! I just had a thought! Since you're so tiny and weak, and you need your big strong sister to protect you, maybe I can get mom to put you back into grade 3 with me." She giggles at the thought as you quiver in fear. Surely there's no way your mom would do that to you! Isabel would be free to abuse you all day every day...

"If you don't want me to shrink you and step on you all the time, you'll ask mom to do it." You can't believe it, Isabel is going to make YOU ask? Good god, how have you fallen this far? You don't really have a choice though...

1511212121211111.content:
A few hours pass; Isabel alternates between sitting on your face while she plays your videogames, and having you worship her feet to keep your standing height consistently eye level with her butt. You grow all too used to the feeling of her farting in your face to the point where her giggles as you obediently sniff them up don't even bother you anymore. As pitifully weak as you are now, her colossal ass completely overpowers you when she sits, and after awhile she barely pays attention to you except to "rub it in" both figuratively and literally. Finally, she gets up and puts her pants back on, leaving your head in its own little groove in the couch. You just lay there unmoving, exhausted from struggling under your "big" sister's ass.

"Well, Buttmunch, I hear mom coming up the driveway. Hope you're ready to perform."

You groan and stand up, still incredulous that she expects YOU to be the one to ask for this. Then again, who knows what she'll do if you don't.

A moment later, your mom comes through the door and nearly trips over you on her way into the house. You fall flat on your ass and she jumps a little bit as she notices you.

"Oh! Sweety, you have to be careful now! You're so small mommy can barely see you," she exclaims, talking to you as if you were a four year old. "It's a good thing you grew back a little bit, or you'd be stuck to mommy's shoe now! Have you and your big sister been having lots of fun together?"

Isabel shoots you a look and you quickly stammer out, "y-yes mom! Lots of fun."

"Oh, that's wonderful! You're such a good girl looking after your brother like this, Izzy. Isn't it nice to have such a good sister, Davy?" Inwardly you cringe, both at her statement, and the way she's begun talking to you like a child. You think about telling your mom everything, but the words stick in your throat; Isabel has dominated you so thoroughly that you find yourself terrified to speak against her.

"Um.... y-yeah," you manage. Isabel then gives you another look that suggests you'd better get on with it, so you do. "Um... actually," you say, staring at the floor, "I was wondering if..."

She waits a long moment, then smiles down at you, and in the most patronizingly babyish voice imaginable coos, "aaw, does my little man need his big sister to take care of him at school?" Isabel is barely containing her laughter.

"...yes," you say.

"That is so CUTE!" She exclaims, reaching down to pinch your cheek. At the same time, your sister walks up beside you and drapes an arm over your shoulder, ruffling your hair with her other hand.

"I can take care of my cute baby brother!" She says.

"Well, if that's what you both want then, I'll make some calls and see what I can do, but this will be a big responsibility for you, Isabel."

"Well alright then. Gosh! It's so exciting to think of you both in school together. I can't wait," she says gleefully as she walks away, leaving you alone with Isabel, who is looking down at you with an evil grin that speaks of painful days to come.

151121212121111112.content:
Well, here you are, recess of your first day back in grade 3. You could almost cry.

Isabel has been torturing you day after day ever since she became able to shrink you, but she acts like an angel when your mother is around. Isabel has used her control over you to make you look incapable of taking care of yourself to the point that your mom has continually given her greater responsibility for your life, while treating you more and more like a child. You don't even have your own room anymore; your mom moved your bed into Isabel's room, leaving you unsafe from your sister even at night. You spend most nights sleeping in one of her dirty, smelly socks. Repeated shrinking has also caused you to start growing back much more slowly, and your height seems to cap at about four feet now. Your mom refused to buy new clothes for you, which means that most days you are stuck wearing Isabel's hand-me-downs. Right now, you're wearing a pair of jeans and a pink Barbie t-shirt, which your sister helpfully picked out for you. Your teacher actually thought you were a girl, and Isabel has forced you to play along, much to the amusement of her classmates.

You sigh and think about what to do with your recess; you don't dare play sports with the boys, as you are too weak to protect yourself. Your thinking is interrupted by a call of "hey, Buttmunch, get over here!" From your sister. You plod off in the direction of her call, drawing giggles jibes from her peers as you answer to the name Isabel gave you.

You find her, and four of her friends behind the school. Sally is there, giggling like mad at your humiliation, along with two girls you don't know, one very small for her age (even smaller than you are right now), and another who is overweight.

"Hey there, Buttmunch," Sally says with another giggle, poking you in the stomach which almost causes you to double over. As you bend, Isabel darts behind you, and you feel her reach into the back of your jeans. Suddenly, she yanks your underwear, a pair of little girl's panties with pink hearts on, up, lifting you off the ground with a tremendous wedgie. You squeal out loud, kicking and squirming about to get free, but the assembled girls just laugh at you, especially Sally. Finally, Isabel drops you to the ground, and the group decides to....

15112121212111111222211.content:
Faster than you could blink, Kate was upon you. Your eyes widen at the sudden display of speed and you were powerless to stop her from wrapping her arms around you. Fear began to set in as you realized you couldn't break the now taller girl's grip. It was like being trapped in an anacondas vice.

The next thing you knew you were suddenly being lifted into the air. Oh god she was going to slam you. She was going to squash you like a jobber. You hastily shut your eyes as you waited for the inevitable pain that was to come, only to gently feel the earth settle beneath you and weight settle on top of you.

Confused, you squint open an eye too see Kate resting on you in a pinning position. All around you, you could hear Isabel and her friends teasing you. But then another voice entered your ears... Kate's voice. It was a low whisper that only you could here. "Please stay down."

Your ears must be deceiving you. Was that concern. Genuine concern over your wellbeing. That couldn't possibly be... and yet you weren't in any real pain. She didn't piledrive you into the ground like you knew she could. She was just trying to pin you. That's when it finally hit you... Kate was trying to help you.

Knowing that made you want to cry. If it wasn't for the fact you would look even more pathetic if you did, you just might've. This one girl was the only one showing you any kind of compassion in your weakened state while everyone else would rather take advantage of you.

So lost in thought you were, you didn't even notice the pressure being lifted from your torso. Kate had pinned you clean for the victory. All around the other girls either booed or grumbled about the pathetic display of combat. They wanted to see some action, maybe even a little blood. Damn savages.

Nonetheless when you finally came back to reality you were relieved. Outside of the small blow to what little remained of your pride, you'd made it out relatively unscathed. Maybe someone out there had taken pity on you. Now if only karma could roll on through and smite Isabel for putting you in this situation.

"What the hell was that?" Sally said with mild annoyance.

"Yeah!? That wasn't a fight, you just pinned him!" Lisa growled. She wanted to see some blood and violence.

"You went easy on him didn't you?" Isabel accused. She wasn't wrong.

Kate began to grow nervous now. "I... Uh"

"Hey!" You called out finally getting to your feet. "She won fair and square! If you've got a problem then why don't you pick on someone your own size!" Okay, bad analogy. But still, seeing the girls gang up on the one person that didn't treat you like shit or a child got your blood boiling.

Silence hung in the air for a moment as the girls (minus Kate) laughed at you. "HAHAHA! Oh my god! Did he really just say that!?" Sally continued laugh.

"He can't be serious." Lisa chuckled. "At his size a first grader could beat him! HAHAHAHA!"

Something in you snapped. "You want to say that again fatty!"

Lisa's laughter suddenly stopped. Everyone's did. Lisa looked at you as if you'd grown a second head before barring her teeth. "You wanna run that by me again?"

Kate, Sally, and Isabel began to back away.

"I didn't stutter! I called you a fatty. If you've got a problem with it, then come do something about!" You challenged. You must've been out of your mind. On the outside you might've sounded tough, but on the inside you were scared half to death. You couldn't even defeat Isabel, how were you supposed to take down the female equivalent of Fat Albert?

"Ohhh! Those sound like fightin' words to me." Sally smirked.

"How about it Lisa? You just gonna let Buttmunch talk to you like that?" Isabel grinned.

Kate began to look around nervously. Where was a teacher when you needed one. She had to step in and do something. If Buttmunch was really as weak as she believed then Lisa could seriously hurt him.
15112121212111111222211.title: One Kind Soul
