151121212121111112222111.content:
"Wait!" Kate cried out. The short girl's outburst got the desired affect of gaining everyone's attention. The bad news being she got everyone's attention. Everyone was looking at her expectantly before she spoke. "Y-you two can't fight."

"Why the hell not!" Lisa growled. Even the other two were curious? Why couldn't they just settle things here and now?

Kate gulped nervously. She never did like all eyes on her. "I-I still haven't given Buttmunch a punishment for losing." she explained. Per the rules of the match she was allowed to pick a punishment. Hopefully her friends would honor that.

"But you took it easy on him!" Lisa argued. "Besides, he called me fat! I can't just let him get away with that!"

"Regardless she still won the match." Isabel sighed.

"Isabel!?" Lisa shouted. Was she being for real right now. Who cared about the damn rules!? "Sally?"

Said girl also sighed. "Isabel's not wrong. Wrestling was my idea and I never said we couldn't go easy on him."

"Oh come on!" Lisa fumed.

While this was going on you looked utterly confused. A second ago you were trying to stand up for Kate and the next everyone's arguing about whether or not you should even be punished at all considering Kate went easy on you. The whole thing was really weird.

Kate on the other hand was nervous. She prayed her friends honored the rules and let her pick Buttmunch's punishment. If not he would have to fight Lisa and that just spelled disaster. To think this whole argument started because he tried to defend her despite his condition. He was really nice.

Meanwhile the arguing continued. "Fine!" Lisa shouted. "Let her pick the stupid punishment! Next time his ass is mine!"

The other two nodded. "Kate" Isabel called.

"Yes."

"What punishment do you want?"

Kate looked relieved while you looked nervous. Her friends were going to honor the rules after all. Just one problem, she never put in actual thought into a punishment. That wasn't good. She'd better think of something fast.

But what?
151121212121111112222111.title: Punishments

151121212121111112222112.content:
"I'll clean his clock!" Lisa declared. She then slammed her fist into an open palm. She wanted to destroy you.

"Bring it chubs." You fired back. You already talked a big game and couldn't back out now. If you did, Lisa would still probably try to kick the crap out of you anyway.

How did you get yourself in these messes?

Kate looked worried.

Isabel looked amused.

Sally grinned. "Looks like this match is official." She then placed herself between the two of you. "Same rules as the first match apply here."

"What rules?" You questioned.

Sally didn't loose her grin. "Simple. There are no rules. Just one winner and one loser."

"And by loser she means you." Isabel elaborated, much to your annoyance.

"Wait? So we can do whatever we want?" You again asked. If there were no rules then... you might just stand a chance.

"That's right shorty. Your ass is mine and I can do whatever I want to finish you off." Lisa explained. It was clear she really wanted to tear you apart for calling her a fatty.

That wasn't your fault. If she didn't want to be called fat then she should lose some damn weight.

Kate was about to say something but was abruptly drowned out by your demon of a sister. "Enough talk. Let's see some blood already!"

"Sounds good to me." Lisa agreed.

Sally nodded. "Ding. Ding."

Before anyone could blink, you turned tail and ran. The four girls were left dumbfounded by the cowardly action after you put up such a tough front.

After a few seconds their brains booted back up. Isabel was annoyed, Sally laughed, Kate sighed in relief... Lisa was livid. How dare you run from her before she could kick your freakin' teeth in?

She charged after you. "Get back here you little shit stain!"

"There she goes." Sally chuckled.

"We should follow her and make sure she doesn't hurt him too much." Kate urged.

"Ah he'll be fine." Isabel brushed off. "But I don't wanna miss Lisa crushing him flat."

"Maybe she'll sit on him." Sally joked.

"Oh! Kung-Fu Panda style." Isabel snickered.

Kate didn't find any of this amusing, but never the less the group chased after the two combatants.

While the girls played catch up, you ran your little heart out. You might not be the strongest anymore but you were still the fastest when scared to death. Adrenaline was a hell of a thing.

"Think, think, think!" You screamed. "How do I take down Ms. Mass?"

You had three paths ahead of you as you continued to run. You could try and get an advantage by cutting through the playground? Or you could try running back into the school? But then again you could try and lure that fatty into the parking lot.

Damn it all! Which path do you take? You needed to make a choice!

Your thoughts were then interrupted by an all to familiar voice. "You little shit! When I get ahold of you..."

Yeah? You need to choose fast.

And you definitely need Isabel to somehow change you back to normal. When you finish your mother shakes her head and stands up straight again, crossing her arms once more.

"It's just so crazy," she mutters almost to herself before turning back to your sister again. "Show me."

"Mom! No!" you shout in horror but your pleas fall on deaf ears drowned out by your sister's delighted laughter. She's obviously enjoying your situation way too much. "She'll shrink me away to nothing!" You scramble back pushing even deeper into the pillows as you look around horrified. You see the edge of the bed and your mother's huge, denim clad legs beyond and think about making a run for it.

Isabel meanwhile is looking around for her sneaker again. She remembers then that she tossed it over the side of the bed but spies the toe of one of her socks poking out from beneath the sheets. She had taken them off at some point over night when she had gotten too warm but she was certain they'd work as they hadn't been washed for a few days and had been worn to soccer practice at least twice. She yelped with glee and quickly snatched it up, balling the sock as she lunges at you.

"Nnnmmmph!" you scream as your sister's left hand slams against your chest forcing you even deeper into the pillows while the sock in her right engulfs your face. You immediately smell the foul stench of her unwashed sock as she scoots closer holding you trapped. You try to struggle but again can barely breathe from the pressure of her enormous hands and the only air you get is being filtered through the horrid foot odor in her stocking. You hear her giggling as your tiny fists beat futilely on her arms and you start to sweat and feel that strange sensation again.

Your mind swims and spins as you feel the weight of your sister increasing. You try to kick but your legs are so heavy. You hear your mother's voice muffled and far away whispering to God and Jesus and your sister just keeps laughing.

"That's enough!"

Your eyelids are heavy as the sock is pulled away and you gasp once more for fresh air. You squint and blink as your sight comes back into focus, the mammoth shadow looming over you slowly morphing back into the form of your huge grinning sister. You whimper too see that she is even larger than before. You turn away in a panic and see that your mother too looks taller as she stares down at you in astonishment. You try to move but your sister's left hand is still planted in your chest holding you in place and this time your mother does nothing to stop her torment.

"I never would have believed it," your mother says as she leans closer again this time resting her hand on the headboard of the bed above you. "David... You must be six-inches tall now." You have no idea but figure she must be right as the whole world seems bigger than it was before. You really don't care however. You just want your sister to change you back and let this nightmare be over with.

You can see by the curious expression on your mother's face however, that she has something else in mind.

"Mom..." Your eyes grow wide as you see your mother lift her leg and reach behind her with her right hand.

"I wonder if it works with my feet," she says more to herself than you or Isabel and you watch in horror as she slips her old, leather black flat off of her foot. You start to struggle again as best as you can, seeing what's coming.

"Mom! No!" you scream thrashing about.

"Hold him down, Isabel," she says as your mother lowers the raggedy rank insole of her old shoe over your already tiny body...
151332.title: Linda, your Mom walks in on you both...

choices: Isabel gives Linda her sock and your mother brings it down...
Isabel ignores your mother wanting to shrink you herself...
1513322.content:
You scream as your mother slips the toe section of her old, back leather flat over your head and what little of your tiny upper body that is visible above your sister's titanic hand. Your upper arms are pinned by Isabel's spread fingers but your forearms thrash as you beat wildly against the shoe that is slowly engulfing you. You can hear your sister's laughter as she holds you tight against the pillows on her bed - held tight at your mother's own request - as the light in the bedroom fades again and your senses start to reel.

The smell of your mother's old shoe is overwhelming as it becomes your world; far worse than your sister's feet and socks or even her old raggedy canvas high-top. You know these are your mother, Linda's favorite shoes, which she wears around the house and even outside when she can. She's had them for years and they're weathered and worn; frayed around the sole and ratty and ragged on the inside. But worst of all is the smell.

Your mother either ignores it or is oblivious but even your sister had commented on the stench when your mother slips her feet from the old flats. Your mother often laughed it off and even joked once or twice about using her shoes as punishment when you or Isabel were especially deserving. Thankfully it had never come to that, at least until now.

You squirm as you feel your mother increasing the pressure, making certain that you are totally enveloped by her malodorous shoe. All your screaming has made it impossible to escape as you are forced to draw in the horrible smell to regain your breath. You start to feel dizzy and weak from your struggles and lack of fresh air. Slowly the fight drains out of you, little by little as the horrid stench takes its toll.

Then almost as suddenly as it began you feel the huge, smelly shoe lifted away. Fresh air washes over you again as you watch through bleary, tear-filled eyes as the giant flat floats up and away with an almost surreal grace until it disappears from your sight. Your gaze shifts to Isabel who is still kneeling on the bed in front of you. Her hand is still holding you down but the pressure has eased allowing you to breathe the blessed fresh air. The look on her pretty face seems almost disappointed.

"Nothing..."

Movement to your right and you see your now huge mother looking to the floor and shifting her leg. Somewhere in the back of your mind you recognize the movements as she slips her foot back into her smelly flat, then returns her attention to you. You know you must look pathetic shrunken to six-inches and still easily held in place by your eight-year-old sister's hand pressed casually against your chest. You're sweating and weak and almost sobbing both from their abuse as well as the joy of every breath of fresh air you draw; glad that your torment finally seems to have come to an end.

"I guess he's reached his limit," your mother Linda says as she leans closer again. You shiver as her hand swoops in and close your eyes fearing the worst but then feel the weight of Isabel's hand lift off of your chest. Tentatively you open your eyes to see your frowning sister and your mother watching you intently; your mother's hand still hovering nearby. Expecting the worst you whimper and scrunch back into the pillow drawing your knees up to your chest.

"P-Please..." you look up beseeching, "No more...". You plead and hold yourself tighter. You can half-expect and understand how your little sister would take advantage of you when you're like this; she's young and thinks it's all a game. But you can't understand how your own mother can seem so indifferent to your situation.

"Shh..." your mother soothes. You cower and whimper again as her hand moves in, her huge finger brushing your arm. The hand is quick to recede however as Linda appears to realize that she is not helping you at all. You open your eyes again to see her standing tall once more with her hands on her hips. She's staring down at you with knitted brows and her lips pursed and you know that she's deep in thought. A quick glance to your sister who has leaned back on her heels shows almost the identical expression, though you doubt they are thinking the same things.

"Are you hurt, David?" your mother finally says, her voice loud and booming to your tiny ears.

"I'm shrunk!" you shout as anger suddenly bubbles up within you. You hear your sister giggle at that revelation and even your mother's lips curl at the corner in a tiny smirk.

"We know that, Dear," she says patronizingly in that special sarcastic way that only mothers know so well. "What I meant was; are you in pain?"

You look into your mother's dark, piercing eyes and finally shake your head from side to side knowing that she cannot possibly hear your feeble, whispered 'No...'.

"Well, that's something at least," she says with a little lift of approval in her voice. You gasp as her building-sized body shifts again and she suddenly sinks to her knees beside the bed. You hear the massive 'THOOM' of impact, which only seems loud to you apparently, and you even feel the bed tremor a bit.She leans in and folds her arms on the edge of the bed as she stares at you; her face looming large as it is now closer than ever.

"I'm sorry we did that to you, David," she continued and you could see that she did appear regretful to some extent. Unfortunately confusion was present as well, and fascination and perhaps even a little bit of... amusement? "But we had to find out

"People just don't shrink. David. I came in here and found you a foot tall with your sister on top of you. What was I supposed to think?"

"You could have stopped her!" you shout pointing at Isabel, your anger growing. "You didn't have to experiment on me! God! What if I'd shrunk away to nothing and disappeared? How'd you feel then, Mom?"

You see your mother frown as she settles back on her heels, her face drifting back a bit. She looks cross and annoyed for a moment, then seems to relax again.

"It had to be done, David. I'm going to get you help, but first I needed to find out just how you are shrinking and why. I'm not going to be laughed out of the doctor's office because I'm delusional thinking you shrink! Isabel said it was her feet, and that seems to be the case. You've both been blunt about the stench of my shoes; way worse than Isabel's feet, but my smell didn't dwindle you a millimeter. So it appears that it's only in Isabel's power to make you smaller; her or the smell of her feet, shoes and socks. Either that or maybe you've reached your limit. You seem to be about six-inches now, and maybe that's as small as you go."

"I dunno, Mom," Isabel finally interjected. You looked at her young, pretty face and saw a devilish smile on her lips, that mischievous twinkle in her eyes again as she leaned closer. "When I had the sock on him it felt... Well... It felt like I had power; like I could shrink him forever."

You pale to see the evil grin on your little sister's face. Turning to your mother for support you see that same look of concentration she had before; her mind speeding as she contemplated what to do. Movement to your left and you see Isabel wadding her sock up in her right hands just out of your mother's line of sight behind her body.

"Mom! No..." you cry out and scramble from the false safety of the pillows. Somewhere in the back of your mind you realize that you are still naked, but you don't care as you crawl forward and drop to your knees before your mother raising your hands in supplication with tears in your eyes. Your voice cracks: "Mom... Please... Not again..."

Your mother's gaze shifts between you and Isabel for just a moment before focusing on you again. You see her bite her lower lip as she thinks a moment longer then finally nods." Isabel..."

You hear your sister squeal in glee and see her arm shooting forward; the foul, dreaded sock balled up in her gigantic fist. You scream and start to crawl away as quick as you can aimlessly heading for the edge of the bed.

"No!" your mother's voice booms. "Give me the sock."


Aww, I can do it!" your sister whines as you keep crawling. You don't care who does it; you just don't want it done.

"No! I have to see if it's you, or your smell or what. I have to see if he's reached a shrunken limit." you see your mother's left hand suddenly swoop in like a bird of prey ready to scoop you up. Instead her index finger flicks out and her pink, painted nail flicks you in the chest. You tumble end over end to land on your back, dazed and unable to catch your breath again. your mother leans in...

"Give me your sock."
1513322.title: Nothing happens...

choices: You wake up still tiny in the middle of the kitchen table...
You wake up trapped, helpless and tiny in the bottom of a glass jar...
15133221.content:
"I'm sorry, David, but I have to do this," your mother says all business-like as she takes the proffered sock from your excited sister's giant hand. "We have to do this," she corrects herself as her hand swiftly drops over you pressing the rancid, unwashed soccer sock over your helpless body; her huge fingers shifting to make certain that all you can inhale and smell is the foul odor of your sister Isabel's feet.

You try to scream as the sock descends again but you have no breath. The impact of your mother's huge finger that sent you sprawling just seconds before has left you gasping and weak; totally helpless for her latest experiment. Somehow you manage yo raise your hands but Linda easily flicks them aside and the sock quickly engulfs your six-inch frame. The weight of her hand is not as great as your sister's has been but she still easily holds you in place as she adjusts the grip and pressure to make sure you get no oxygen not filtered through the rank material of your sister's sock.

"We have to see if you can still shrink... If it's your sister's feet that sets you off or if you are done. Don't worry..." your mother says, her voice God-like and high, far away.

You start to cry at your mother's clinical indifference to your condition and plight. Your feeble struggles slow and finally stop altogether as she casually holds you in place on the mattress of your sister's bed. You feel the heat as your body starts to sweat again, your head swimming and spinning as the dizziness returns making it impossible to think beyond the simplest functions like breathing. And every breath is saturated with the foul scent; the taste of your sister's nasty feet. You feel your body start to tingle and convulse like it has before and you know that you are starting to shrink again.

"OOooooo..." You hear Isabel's voice muffled and far away, but you can also hear the excitement as she watches your helpless body dwindle away. "He's shrinking again!" she shouts with glee and you vaguely realize somewhere in your soul - just as she does - that it's totally her that has this power over you. Her feet, her scent, her whim that can shrink you to the size of a helpless mouse; the fate of your life now in the hands of an eight-year-old girl. You're at her mercy and you realize slowly as your body continues to shrink that she probably has none, at least where you're concerned.

And as quickly as it began the pressure on you vanishes and you see the shadowy tube of the sock fluttering up and away into the sky. Precious fresh air washes over you once more as you gasp, gag and cough. Your stomach finally rebels after all the torment and you roll onto your side retching. You hear Isabel's disgust though the puddle you make is probably barely visible to her; a tiny spot easily wiped away with a tissue. You heave and moan as you clutch at the sheet beneath you, finally collapsing in the dampness you've created; perspiration, vomit and by the smell even a bit of urine. It seems when you shrink your body likes to expel your excess liquid waste. Something in your memory nags at that but Isabel's laughter pushes those thoughts aside.

"It's me!" she shouts gleefully. "I can make David tiny! Just me!". You can barely focus but you realize that your sister sounds way too happy about that.

"It seems that way, Sweetie," Linda agrees but you hear hesitation in her voice again. You struggle to stay awake and listen, but the past... What? The past hour has been so intense and exhausting, it's hard to concentrate or even keep your eyes open. You try to talk and start hacking again, spitting up more phlegm, wondering where it's all coming from. you're weak and helpless before your family...

"But we have to be careful. We don't know just how small he can get." You feel your mother's huge finger nudging you, rolling you out of the damp spot. You tumble easily under her direction, finally rolling onto your back again and looking up at her. "He's about three inches now. Any smaller and he will disappear."

"I'll be careful," Isabel says.

"I know you will, Sweetie," Your mother agrees and you feel her fingers closing about you. her thumb and index finger press into your sides and you are swiftly lifted off of the bed to dangle helplessly between the huge faces of your female relatives. "But can you change him back?" your mother asks as you squirm in her fingers; trapped.

"I dunno," Isabel says somewhat deflated. "I didn't know I could even shrink him till a little while ago."

"Better I keep him with me then, Dear," your mother says, nodding. You feel her grip shift as you roll uselessly into the palm of her hand. You try to gather your wits but you are still weak and breathless. You feel your mother's fingers rise up in a cupping motion; trapping you in a loose grip. "I don't think you can resist playing with him."

"I can!" your sister protests but you all three know that's a lie. Another minute with Isabel and you would be a speck of dirt under her toenail. Despite your mother's indifference, you feel just a little safer with her.

"No, I'll keep your brother with me for now," she says holding her hand flat before her. You can barely make out her huge face as you look up from the palm of her hand. You wonder why she seems to be smiling... "I think that's best..."

There's a sudden fast movement and the motion and pressure become too much in your abused and weakened state. The world swims by in rapid swirling colors as the heat of your mother's body overwhelms you.

Blessed darkness rolls over you and the world fades away...
15133221.title: Isabel gives Linda her sock and your mother bri...

choices: Dinner passes without incident and soon it's time for bed...
You try to take a drink of water but Isabel has a wicked idea...
151332212.content:
You wake up - you don't know after how long - shivering and cold. You're curled up slightly in almost fetal position, lying on your side and hugging yourself. It feels damp on the cold hard floor beneath you and there's a sickly, stale odor in the air, though thankfully it's not the scent of your sister's feet.

Slowly you open your eyes blinking against a bright wavering light. Your muscles are tight, aching even as you try to stretch and come awake. At the same time your head and feet both press up against the same type of cold, hard surface that you are laying on. You look around in a confused daze not knowing where you are, which is a common enough occurrence after a long, deep sleep, but truthfully you know that whatever sleep you did get was fitful and full of nightmares.

You roll over onto your hands and knees reaching up and feel the thick wall at your head. It's glass you realize after a moment; thick like safety glass, slick and a little slimy. You can feel that same slimy sensation under your knees now as you come more awake, and on your skin as well. You wonder what it is as you bring your hand to your face and sniff and your face immediately twists in disgust. Rancid and rotten; the smell of old, spoiled eggs. It takes a moment for you to continue waking up, the pieces falling into place as you slowly crane your neck all about. You see glass on every side except above and there you see a metal plate far too high to reach with sharp, jagged holes punched through its surface. You swallow hard as you feel light-headed and anxious as you recognize where you must be; a mayonnaise jar!

'TINK! TINK!'

Sound explodes within your jar and you cower clutching at your ears to stop the ear-splitting noise. thankfully it doesn't last long and tentatively you lower your hands and arms and slowly look around expecting the worst after what you experienced earlier... that morning? You have no idea as you peer through the thick glass looking at the blurry, distorted shapes far beyond and out of reach in the distance. Some shapes nag at your memory seeming vaguely familiar, but the thick glass distorts and at your current size - less than six-inches you assume as the last you knew - things just don't look right.

'TINK!'

Again the deafening noise but this time as you cover your ears and bend trying to block it out you see movement in your peripheral vision to your right. You turn to see what's happening and your eyes grow wide as saucers at the sight; a huge leering face pressed almost against the glass, blurry and distorted but you recognize the vast blue eye and the wide, mocking grin immediately...

"Mom!" You hear your sister Isabel's voice muffled yet echoing as it drifts down through the holes in the lid of the mayonnaise jar. It's not loud, but then you see the fork in her hand as it bounces off the outside of the jar; the noise grating and almost deafening. 'TINK!' "David's awake!"

You bend fully down covering your ears as best as you can, almost your whole head and cringe waiting for your sister to casually tap the jar again. You don't know if she realizes just how terrible the noise is, or if she even cares but you can hear the delight in her voice and you know that she is enjoying this whole business; your shrinking, being locked in a jar and knowing that she was responsible. In her mind it's probably fair compensation for your tickling her feet that morning, if not every mean thing you did to her over the years. And if not, you have a sinking feeling that it will be.

"Isabel. Don't tease your brother."

You look up at the sound of your mother's voice thinking that maybe there's some hope after all. Her voice is muffled as well but softer than Isabel's and you soon reason why as you see her blurry form in the distance through the glass. You can make out the deep blue of her denim pants, the pink of her scoop neck tee shirt and her general shape though it's like looking in a fun house mirror at a carnival. She looks squat, fat even until she sits and places something on what you assume is the kitchen table. You soon smell the hint of food but the rancid odors inside the old jar swiftly twist the usually aromatic odors of your mother's good cooking into something foul and disgusting.

You dry-retch, glad that your stomach seems to be empty and void as you finally stand and press up against the thick glass of the jar. As things come a bit more into focus you quickly see that you are on the kitchen table and your prison - as that's what it is - being some bizarre center piece. You can make out the salt and pepper shakers, both at least as tall as you, as well as a towering bottle of ketchup and further back the forms of your mother and sister blurring in and out of sight as they move. You realize after a long helpless moment of staring that they are enjoying dinner while you languish in your tiny glass prison.

Anger swells within you. You can't understand why they are doing this to you. Oh, you know that Isabel was probably just playing in the beginning as you were, but to keep shrinking you and now trap you inside a mayonnaise jar like some... some bug! it's too much! You can't believe your mother could be so cruel and you start pounding on the glass and screaming at the top of your lungs demanding to be set free; cursing and threatening...

You don't know how long your tirade lasts, how long before reality sets in and you realize just how useless it is. Worse, you realize that the harder you struggle the faster the air in the jar seems to thin. Soon the foul smell gets stronger and dizzying, sapping your strength and reducing your strongest blows to pathetic taps. You stagger finally, overcome by the smell and lack of air thumping against the glass behind you and sliding down the slimy wall to thump on the glass floor. You hear your sister giggling at your antics and even a deeper chuckle that has to be your mother. You feel choked up as tears well in your eyes.

"David... David!" You look up and see your mother leaning closer. "Calm down right now! There's holes in the lid but if you act the ass you'll still use up all the air and pass out. Now listen... I know you probably think this is cruel; putting you in a jar and all, but it's for your own good. You were only about four-inches tall when you passed out before so I thought it best to put you somewhere where you wouldn't get hurt. It wouldn't do to let you run around and maybe fall off the table or maybe get stepped on." You see your mother grin at that; a blurry flash of white teeth as she glances at your sister. "And in the jar your sister can't do whatever it is she's been doing to you. Right?" You just sit there with your back against the wall of your glass cage feeling numb and dumb.

"And it's late," your mother continues after a sip of what looks like red wine. Wonderful. "I'm not taking you to the hospital. No way. I think they'd take you - and Isabel - and I'd never see either of you again. No... i'll take you to Doctor Diaz tomorrow, if nothing's changed." You hear that name and wrack your befuddled brain trying to remember who that is. Suddenly it comes to you.

"That's your Gynecologist!" you shriek but your mother just shakes her head and frowns.

"David... I could barely hear you when you were right by my head before. There's noway I can hear you now so just settle down and make the best of it until tomorrow. I've made dinner if you're hungry; hamburger casserole... your favorite?"

Under normal circumstances it was once but now, in the stinking jar the thought of eating anything just makes your stomach roil in disgust. You shake your head and deign to sulk at the injustice of it all, pouting but for the best of reasons you feel. for the time being you are little more than a curiosity, maybe even a pet.

"Fine," your mother says and you can hear the irritation in her voice. She sighs heavily and reaches for something way off to the side that you cannot make out. her hand then comes towards the top of the jar and a moment later something long and pointed shoves through the lid. Your eyes grow huge as you think she is trying to stab you for a moment, but whatever it is descends about halfway into the confines of your jail and stops. You see water dripping from what appears to be the tip of a huge eye-dropper.

"You sweat a lot this afternoon, then slept for hours. You're going to need water eventually. You're going to need to replenish eventually I figure. This'll work. Just like a hamster bottle. You can suck on the tip." You groan as you stare at the eye-dropper listening to the pride in your mother's voice unbelieving that she is treating you this way...

"Mom? Why's David crying?" you hear your sister ask and that just makes it all the worse...
151332212.title: You wake up trapped, helpless and tiny in the b...

1513322122.content:
As you hear your sister's words you lean your head back against the glass and close your eyes. You try to will yourself to stop sobbing like a baby knowing that it's not going to get you any sympathy from your mother. Every reason she gave for locking you in the mayonnaise jar made perfect sense in some twisted, logical way. Certainly letting you run wild on the floor to possibly get stepped on and crushed was not an option to even consider. And you knew - just as your mother did - that Isabel would continue to use whatever power she suddenly has to continue shrinking you; if not to torment you then just for the fun of it. Even now you knew that she was probably enjoying seeing you cry.

After awhile you begin to hear the dull, filtered sounds as your family starts eating again; the scrape of utensils on their plates, the muffled, far away sound of your mother and sister's voices as they chat about mundane things. Life goes on you suppose, at least for them. And you though it'll never be the same again.

DRIP

Finally you open your eyes after a seeming eternity cautiously looking around. You see your mother's blurry form in the distance washing up the dinner dishes in the sink if you have your bearings right. It amazes you; her seeming lack of concern and even her cruelty at keeping you locked in the jar, 'for your own good' of course. Isabel is still at the table however, her face close and grinning as she watches you intently.

DRIP

You try to ignore her as a drop of water falls to the floor with a splash. You see a puddle forming between your legs where the water has been splashing down without you even realizing it. You look up at the eye-dropper your mother, Linda graciously shoved through the lid of the jar for you to drink from - 'like a hamster'; the words echo mockingly in your head. You see another stray drop forming at the tip of the dropper growing bigger as you watch until it finally comes loose to fall and splash at your feet.

DRIP

You lick your lips as you realize your mother was right about that at least; you are thirsty. Whatever power Isabel now holds over you with her feet to make you shrink it also made you sweat like a pig. Again something nags in the back of your mind about that, something about a person's body being ninety-odd percent water but the reason eludes you. You probably should have paid more attention in science class, but who knew?

The thought of eating inside the smelly jar still makes you gag and your stomach churn, but as you lick your lips you do think that maybe you might be able to hold down a little water. You stand slowly using the wall behind you for support as you realize that the dripping water has made the floor even more slippery mixing with the oily residue of the mayonnaise. As you tentatively balance you think that oil and water don't mix, and you wonder why these strange thoughts keep popping into your head. Are you going crazy? With all that's happened over the last few hours you wouldn't doubt it.

As you reach out and grab the end of the eye-dropper the latest drop comes loose and rolls down your arm. The water's warm but it is refreshing as the over-sized drop hits your shoulder then starts trickling down your skin along your side and chest, your stomach and below. It feels good and you decide that a drink would feel even better.

You can sense your sister is watching you intently even without turning around to actually see her. You can picture in your mind's eye her little smirk as she enjoys your struggles at so simple a task. And of course it's a task just made all the more difficult and humiliating despite your mother's good intentions at your size.

Even as you set your mind to suckle at the tip of the eye-dropper you realize that it's almost out of reach of your mouth. You give it a tug but find it's lodged in place to its limit, or else you're just too small and weak to pull it down any further. The only way to get a drink will have to be by moving directly under the thing and standing up on your tip toes. You sigh at that knowing it will give Isabel another show, but your sudden craving for a simple drink of water wins out.

You maneuver under the dropper now standing in the puddle and try to find some solid footing. The floor of the jar seems to be becoming even more slick from the water and you'll be damned if you do a prat fall for Isabel's enjoyment. Finally though you find your footing and - holding on to the plastic tube - you go up onto your toes and put your mouth to the tip.

You see a shadow pass by and overhead from the corner of your eye as something huge seems to swoop by. Before you can react the water in the dropper comes gushing out in a deluge. You splutter as your eyes go wide, suddenly swallowing as fast as you can and trying not to drown. It's like 'shot-gunning' a beer as the water rushes down your throat, filling your belly in a wave. Somewhere above you can hear Isabel's laughter as you push away from the dropper. You groan and splutter and try to scream as your feet slip on the slimy bottom. Isabel laughs all the harder as your feet fly up into the air and you promptly fall back onto your ass. Your head thumps against the wall of the jar as you sprawl to the floor in the sudden puddle coating the bottom of the jar.

You lay there dazed for a long moment, hacking and coughing up water from your lungs and through your nose. You gasp again trying to breathe as the world spins. Little flecks of gray flit through your sight as you shake your throbbing head trying not to pass out. Throughout it all you can hear your sister's mocking giggles.

"All right. What's going on now?"

You hear your mother's voice as you cough up another long stream of phlegmy water. You look up still trying to catch your breath from your hands and knees in the bottom of your prison to see your mother's pretty face hovering closer to the jar and taking up most of your field of vision. You don't have the strength or breath to sputter out an answer but you do have a pretty good idea as to what went wrong. Just as you were starting to drink you figure that your loving sister reached over and squeezed the bulb of the eye-dropper unleashing its full load; several gallons to you to come down in a gushing torrent.

Isabel of course has a different explanation: "I dunno, Mom. David was taking a drink an' suddenly all the water whooshed out all over him. It was too funny!" Isabel giggles again as you turn to her and stare daggers, still trying to regain some naked composure in your jar while wishing your head would stop spinning.

"Oh, I'm so sorry, David," your mother says apologetically and it actually sounds like she means it. "I really thought that... would..."

You hear your mother's voice suddenly trail off and stop all together. You look up again to see both your mother and your sister with their faces almost pressed against the jar. Their eyes are wide and their mouths are hanging open even wider as though they can't believe what they are seeing. You spit again as you try to find your voice to ask what's wrong now but as usual your sister blurts it out first:

"He's growing!"

15133221221.content:
You realize you are growing as you groan feeling your muscles contorting and stretching. Your back soon thumps against one side of the jar that's become your little prison while your feet press against the other. Your head is throbbing and racing all at once as you scoot around trying to accommodate the swiftly dwindling space. You are soon kneeling in the bottom of the mayonnaise jar and looking out helplessly at the gargantuan features of your mother and sister.

Isabel's eyes are wide with astonishment but her mouth is flickering between shock and amusement. She leans in with her elbows on the kitchen table watching curiously as your body convulses again. You writhe in agony as your muscles spasm and your bones lengthen. You gasp and cry at the sudden pain as your sister who started all of this taps on the glass with her fingernail...

TINK

"Neat!" she says with a giggle as the sound echoes, overwhelming and forcing you to curl up against the noise. Your body ripples again and you feel the glass of the jar pressing suddenly on all sides.

"Mom..." you cry out as your body twists and folds trying to conform to the limited, tiny area. You reach up and gasp as you cut your finger on the jagged air holes punched through the lid of the mayonnaise jar. You moan as the ragged metal suddenly presses into your neck and back.

"Oh my God!" you hear your mother shout and suddenly the jar flies. Darkness encloses you as you see her gigantic hand wrap around the jar; picking it up and drawing you close. You hear a grinding sound as the sharp daggers drilled into the lid scrape across your neck and back. You scream as you realize your mother, Linda is unscrewing the lid of the mayonnaise jar, ignorant of the damage she is doing you in her haste.

You groan and gasp as a burst of fresh air washes over you and the lid flies away. Immediately you try to stretch and straighten but the curve of the jar holds you tight. You moan as you feel your body shift again; growing and filling the space of your prison. You feel the heat of your mother's hand and look up in desperation to see her staring down at you; panic in her wide, dark eyes.

"Mom!" you whine as you squirm, realizing that you are growing too fast. "Get me out!" you shriek.

You scream as your mother's fingers are suddenly there. Huge and tree-like they dip into the jar shoving against you to get a grip. Her nails slice into your bare skin making you whimper but she ignores your complaints. You feel her huge thumb and forefinger press into your arm.

"Ahhhhh!" you screech as she tugs trying to get you out of the jar. You feel your shoulder thump up against the lip of the jar.Pain wracks your body as she gives a hard tug and something pops. You cry out and whimper as she continues to pull in a panic. Even in your agony though you realize that you have already grown too large to be pulled out of the jar. "Mom..." you cry and finally feel her fingers slip away.

"Break the jar!" you scream as your body morphs again. Your knees are way up in your chest now and your arms are useless as you try to shift. Your left arm hangs limp from your mother's attempt to free you. You feel the jar pressing in. "Please..."

"No!" she says as she sets the jar back on the table. "Breaking the jar will kill you!"

At that point you don't care. death would be better; a quick death compared to being crushed as you grow.

"Isabel!" your mother snaps, "Get your sock!"

"No!" you shriek as your mother's words sink in. You struggle uselessly once more doing little more than rocking the jar. You see Isabel run off blurring in the distance only to reappear a few moments later growing as she approaches. You shake at the flurry of movement above you.

You focus on your mother and see your sister's smelly sock in her hand; her fingers wadding it up. You try to move but know you are trapped. You scream as the sock suddenly descends upon you...

"Mom! No! Nnnnmmmph!"

You struggle uselessly as the sock envelopes your face. You gasp but all you smell and breathe is the salty damp stench of your sister's foot odor. You feel the weight of your mother's hand as she holds the sock tight against you forcing you to breathe deeply. You moan as you feel your body shudder at the smell; your muscles and bones shrinking and contracting again. When you can you try to struggle and move; to fight back but your mother's fingers are overpowering and easily hold you in place.

You feel the pressure of the jar ease as you retch, the stench of your little sister's smelly feet overwhelming and becoming your world. You groan as your mother's fingers follow you into the jar pressing down with the sock.

"I'm sorry," she says and you hear her voice; hollow and far away on high. You push at her fingers and thrash around one final time before the smell and darkness drags you down...
15133221221.title: You ARE growing, but...

151332212213.content:
You wake slowly feeling every ache and pain in your body as though you were in a car wreck. Your muscles are cramped and sore as you move; your legs twitching as you roll and try to get them under you. You feel water beneath you sloshing as you move and you can smell a foul stench rising up from it; sweat and urine and the all too recently familiar odor of your sister's feet.

You groan as you finally struggle to your hands and knees, shivering as you realize how cold you are and that you are still naked as well as wet and dirty. You shake your head trying to focus your thoughts, remembering all that happened as best as you can...

Your sister, Isabel, somehow shrank you with her foot smell and your mother, Linda, thought it would be a good idea to keep you safely in an old mayonnaise jar at least until tomorrow when she could get you in to see her friend who is a doctor - a gynecologist of all things. Her plan had backfired however, you remember, when Isabel had drenched you with water and you had started to grow again and almost died, trapped in your makeshift prison. You remember your mother's desperation as she took Isabel's stinky sock and apparently saved your life by shrinking you again...

"Thanks, Mom," you grumble under your breath and finally open your eyes yo see if anything has changed. Just that fast your eyes snap wide in horror and you scream as you fall backwards scrambling until you thump up against the glass wall behind you. You scream again as you hear thunder only slowly realizing that it is laughter; the voluminous giggles of your once-again huge sister as she stares at you.

You see her titanic, pretty face so very close to the jar but blurry and shifting as she laughs. Her smile is wide and you see an almost devious sparkle in her big blue eyes as she takes you in enjoying your tiny size and probably your nakedness as well; your humiliation. Suddenly you see her huge finger swoop into view and you quickly try to cover your ears knowing what is probably coming:

TINK!

You double over your knees as the jar vibrates and the noise of your sister's fingernail tapping the glass reverberates through you. Her laughter roils through you again like a clap of thunder causing you to whimper, which only makes her laugh all the harder.

"David!" she squeals with delight. "You're so funny!"

"Stop it!" you shout but your voice just echoes dully back at you within the confines of the jar. "Please... Isabel," you say with a sob but more softly. "Just stop." After a long moment you realize that she has and dare to look up again.

You see your sister's face still close to the jar still grinning and watching you closely. You sag back onto your hands and knees thinking that your torment is over - at least for the moment. Looking at your sister's huge face though, and wondering what to do or say next that might earn you your freedom you realize that she looks bigger than she did before. You moan as you realize that you're even smaller than you were the first time you woke up in your prison and realize that your mother must have held Isabel's sock to you for too long.

"God," you say as you kneel in the foul water puddled at the bottom of the jar. You have a flickering flash of insight remembering that it seemed to be water that made you grow before. How and why escape you as science was never your strong suit, but you wonder what's different now. And you smell again the stench and somehow know that this water is spoiled, tainted, whatever as your sister's foot smell seems to radiate around you.

Without warning the jar suddenly tilts and you go sprawling into the mire. You are quickly soaked again as you roll to the other side once more, striking the glass with a thud and hissing as pain shoots through your shoulder. As soon as you start to right yourself again the jar tips once more and you fall into the mess cursing.

"What's wrong, big brother?" Isabel asks as she tilts the jar again. You grit your teeth and try to hang on and keep your balance but your little sister is just too huge and powerful. You slam against the side of the jar again, time after time rolling through the sickening water and helpless to your sister's slightest whim -

"Isabel!"

Suddenly the jar stops moving and you collapse at the bottom in the filthy water. You swear you heard your mother's voice booming and when you finally regain your senses enough to look up you see that Isabel's face has retreated into the distance. Her form is shadowy now and far away and joined by the blurry silhouette of your mother.

"I told you not to antagonize your brother, didn't I?" your mother's voice booms obviously agitated. "Why can't you listen?"

"Aww, Mom," Isabel says whining. "I was just playin'."

"Well, stop 'just playing'. Try to imagine if the situation was reversed." You watch as your mother steps away from your sister and approaches your prison. You see Isabel still in the background sticking her tongue out at you before your mother comes into blurred view taking up your sight. You lick your lips in fear as she leans in and then you realize that she's changed her clothes.

"Mom?"

"Are you okay, Sweetie?" she asks, her voice loud but you can hear the sincerity as you clamp your hands over your ears again. "Sorry," she says in a softer tone.

"Mom! Please!" you beg as you lower your hands again and move to the glass pressing up before her movie-screen face. "Just let me out!" you shout but immediately see her frown.

"Better not," she says with a sigh. "It's safer for you in there, and Isabel's promised me that she won't take you out either."

"B-But..." you stutter pushing on the thick glass, "what if I start to grow again?"

"I don't think you will, David," your mother says as she stands up straight again. "You haven't grown in that water since I shrank you again and you were out for over an hour. And I've left Isabel's socks right here, just in case."

"Left? In case..."

"I have to go out, David," your mother says as she checks her wrist watch. "I got a call from my boss; some computer snafu with a case. I shouldn't be too long." Your eyes grow wide as you stagger back in disbelief. You see your sister's gargantuan form strolling up to stand beside your mother's.

"You- You're just gonna leave me... With her!" You start to gasp as you feel a wave of panic wash over you. You can only imagine what hell Isabel will put you through until your mother returns. "Mom! Please..."

"Don't be silly, David," your mother says as her huge body drifts away to a shadow with distance. Isabel's face moves closer then as she leans in smirking at you. "I've called your cousin to come watch you both."

"What?" you say in unison with your little sister.

"Mommmmm..." Isabel whines drowning out your own protestations. Having Isabel in charge of you would be hell, but you can only imagine a different level of the Inferno with your cousin calling the shots.

Your cousin Laura is a year younger than you and has always had a thing for you; at least you imagined so. Sure she was pretty, but she's your cousin! And if your mother and sister seem to have no real regard for your problem you can only guess what Laura will think when she sees you.

"Mom! Please!" you shout as you pound on the jar. You watch as your mother seemingly ignores you and slings her bag over her shoulder before digging for her keys. "Take me with you! Stick me in your purse! Please!"

And the doorbell rings...
151332212213.title: You wake up still trapped in the jar but see yo...

choices: Your Cousin Laura Plucks You From the Jar...
1513322122131.content:
You watch helplessly as your mother, Linda heads for the door and opens it up without a care. You've already realized over the last few hours that things were getting progressively worse for you. Your mother's initial shock and worry slowly changed into a casual disregard - not that she did not care for you and keeping you safe, but that your opinion and wants no longer seemed to matter. Now it seemed that things were about to get worse as she was leaving you in the care of yet another relative that would take no pity on you.

"Hi, Laura," you hear your mother say as she opens the door wide and steps back. "I'm so glad you could come over."

"Sure, Aunt Linda!" another voice sounds and you see the mammoth blur in the distance that must be your cousin, Laura. You see the two women hug briefly - both wavering, massive forms of blues and grays distorted by the thick glass of your prison and the distance. "I wasn't doing anything. It's no problem and I can use the money; that's for sure."

The water at your feet vibrates as the front door slams shut and you stagger back as far as the mayonnaise jar will allow; pressing your back against the glass as your mother and cousin stride closer, getting larger. From the corner of your eye you see your 'little' sister, Isabel's body coming closer as well as she doesn't want to be left out.

"Hey, Izzy," your cousin says as she reaches out and tousles your sister's hair.

"Stop it!" your sister snaps and takes a step back out of reach but you can hear the giggle in her voice as well. It's then that your mother takes a long stride forward and steps in front of the end table where your jar sits, blocking it and you from Laura's view.

"Where's David?" your cousin asks and you see her long arm momentarily as she drops her huge hobo bag onto the sofa. "Figure he must be out's why you need me to watch Izzy."

"It's not just Isabel that I need you to watch, Laura..." your mother says with some hesitation. "There's been a problem..."

"Oh?" You can hear some questioning concern in your cousin's voice muffled by the thick glass. A quick flicker of hope wells up within you. "Is he sick or something? Where is he?"

"Sick? Yeah... I suppose that's as good as anything..."

You hear a sadness in your mother's voice as she finally takes a step to the side to stand with Isabel. You look up and up at the tall, slender form of your cousin as she looks to your mother and sister. You can't quite make out her pretty face but you know that she is probably confused by your mother's cryptic words. Just then Isabel steps away from your mother and you see her gigantic hand swooping in and wrap about the jar as far as her fingers will allow.

"Look!" you hear your sister shout with excitement as your prison is swept rocketing up into the sky. You fall back and land on your ass again in the filthy waste water at the bottom of the jar then roll around until your prison comes to a sudden, abrupt halt. You slam into the far side of the jar and groan with the pain of impact, gagging and spitting the retched water from your mouth and lungs.

"Isabel!" Your mother's voice echoes hollowly within the jar.

"What's this?" your cousin asks, her voice only a bit softer and cautious.

"It's David!" Isabel squeals with delight and you're surprised that the glass jar doesn't shatter with the decibels. You cringe and try to hang on as the jar shoots forward again; again retching as it stops suddenly. You struggle back to your hands and knees well aware of the new gigantic form hovering just beyond the walls of your prison.

"What's this?" you hear as your world shifts pink with your sister's hand on one side of the jar and your cousin's face coming into focus on the other filling your limited sight. Laura's face gets bigger and bigger as she leans in for a better look and you can see her enchanting green eyes widening as she peers into your prison.

"Oh my GOD!" she shrieks and suddenly her face is gone, moving back up far and away. You see her titanic body stagger a bit and your mother starts to move again, placing her hand on Laura's arm to steady her. You can hear your sister's giggles as the jar shakes. "Is that...David?"

"It is," your mother says as she guides Laura to the sofa and sits her down. Your mother quickly drops beside Laura's right and Isabel - not wanting to be left out - plops onto the sofa on your cousin's left. You don't know if your sister has simply forgotten about you in the excitement or what but you fly around the jar like a pinball until Isabel settles your prison in her lap.

You lie there for awhile feeling battered and bruised but otherwise unhurt. Too, you can feel that your shoulder seems fine again after your initial slamming into the wall. The other aches seem to be fading as well, far faster than you would expect as you try to get to your hands and knees again.

You wonder on that as you stand using the wall of the jar for support and look up and out. Isabel has calmed thankfully, but you can see Laura's vague face turned in your direction, looking at you with an intensity that makes you nervous. You can see the blurry form of your mother beyond your cousin and hear her voice as she tries to explain what's happened...

"So, Isabel's rank foot smell did this?" your cousin asks incredulously then bursts out laughing. "Oh, God! That is SO insane!" You hear Isabel join in as your cousin laughs loudly and before too long you can hear your mother's chuckles as well.

"My feet don't stink!" Isabel finally shouts apparently realizing what the word 'rank' means. "David just likes 'em!"

More laughter at that as you see your mother's left arm come up to check her watch. She suddenly stands and shoulders her purse again, jangling her keys. "Listen, I really have to go," she says as she strides for the door with your cousin jumping up and tight on her heels. Your mother opens the front door of the house then turns back and you see just for a moment her dark eyes focused on you...

"This is weird, I know," she says to your cousin, "but I need you here. Isabel's still too young - "

"I am not!" Isabel shouts and your jar shifts but your mother ignores both.

"And David... well..."

"What should I do?" your cousin asks looking back at you briefly. "Or not do? This is way beyond weird, Aunt Linda."

"I know," your mother says with a heavy sigh. After a moment though she seems to come to terms and steel herself. "I'm taking him to the doctor tomorrow, so don't give him very much water - just a drop if he gets thirsty. The eye dropper's still on the kitchen table. Water seems to make him grow, and I need Doctor Diaz to see him like this, otherwise she'll have me committed.

"Just keep him in the jar and DON'T let Isabel shrink him anymore. I really think she wants to see how small he'll get... I dunno... Just do your best, Laura and use your judgement. I trust you."

"Sure, Aunt Linda. Of course..."

You watch as they hug again, your mind trying to sift through all you've just heard. You get up and press against the jar realizing that your mother just gave your younger cousin full control over you. You pound your fist against the jar's glass but see your mother step through the doorway and the door soon closes.

"Mom!"

SLAM
RATTLE
CHUNK

You hear your cousin locking the door and sliding the chain in place. Once secure she turns and leans against the door for a moment. A feeling of utter dread passes through you and you shudder as even from across the room you can see a smile on her face as she stares at you in your jar.

You back up again as you quickly slam against the wall of your prison. Cousin Laura steps right up and leans in. You see your sister doing likewise as Laura's pretty face looms and swirls into focus. You bite your lower lip as her hand sweeps into view...

TINK!

"Hi, David," she says with a giggle as you drop to your knees. Laura taps the glass with her fingernail again making you jump in shock. You chance a glance and see your younger cousin licking her lips.

"I think we're going to have some fun," she says as she reaches for the jar.

Isabel laughs as you hear the lid of the jar start to grind open...
1513322122131.title: Your Cousin Laura Arrives to Babysit...

15133221221311.content:
You press back into the wall of the mayonnaise jar that's become your prison watching in fright as the lid slowly starts to screw off. Your cousin Laura's hands are bigger than your sister's and as she holds the jar her fingers wrap most of the way around the glass, plunging you in darkness. Laura quickly unscrews the lid however and in moment you feel a wash of cool air fill the jar driving out the stuffiness and some of the smell. You breathe deeply, relieved almost, but it's short-lived as you look up and see your cousin's titanic face peering down at you.

Laura is pretty - you've always thought so - and you know that she used to have a crush on you so you have the barest flicker of hope that maybe she'll take some pity on you. Again your hopes fade however as you see her pretty face and lips twist into that same delighted smile that your sister's been wearing since she first shrank you.

Her huge green eyes seem to twinkle as she tilts the jar a bit sending you stumbling through the waste water only to thump against the far side. Just as swiftly her hand shifts again and you are falling back losing your footing to land with a splash on your naked butt in the ankle deep water. Soaked again you look up as you hear a giggle and her warm, minty breath washes over you.

"David..." she says with a happy, playful lilt to her voice. She bites her lower lip to suppress her giggles as she brushes her long, blonde hair back with her free hand. Her eyes shift as she takes in your tiny form then grow wider. "You're naked!" she says with a gasp and involuntarily your hands move between your legs to cover yourself.

She giggles again and in the distance you can hear your sister, Isabel joining in. It was bad enough that your little eight-year-old sister and your mother, Linda were seeing you nude but Laura you know is fourteen; just a few months younger than your fifteen years. Somehow that makes it even worse, and to hear her laughing at you just makes you burn with shame.

"Yeah..." Isabel chimes in and you see her face almost pressed against the jar grinning widely. "His clothes didn't shrink when he did. Cool hunh?" The two girls laugh and you blush an even deeper shade of crimson. You almost wish they'd just put the damn lid back on the jar and leave you alone.

"Very cool," Laura agrees, "and I think he's cute like this too." You see your cousin's grin widen when you look up and you shiver in fear as her tongue peeks out of her mouth and slides along her teeth. You turn away wanting to hide.

"I want to hold him," Laura half-whispers causing a new dread in you. You look up again and see her eyeing you more seriously now.

"You are holding him," Isabel says with a snigger.

"In my hand, silly, not in the jar."

Before you can react the jar shifts again causing you to tumble onto your back in the filthy water. You look up in horror as you see your cousin's huge, tree trunk like fingers slipping down through the mouth of the jar. You watch knowing this can't be good, panicking as her first two fingers and thumb drift closer.

You reach up with both arms and start slapping at the huge fingers; your pathetic blows doing no damage as your hands bounce off of her long pink nails. You hear her chuckle as the jar tilts a bit more and you start to slide up the slippery wall carried with the water. You're screaming at her to stop but she either doesn't hear you or ignores you as her fingers finally close tightly about your right arm.

"Gotcha!" she says as you wince in pain; her fingers squeezing tight as you roughly pulls you up; first to your feet and then off of them with no effort at all. Laura pulls you from the jar and sets it aside on the end table before raising you to her face. She stares at you almost curiously as you dangle there kicking and screaming for her to stop.

"Laura! Let me go! Put me down!" You shriek as you writhe and squirm in her grip but your pleas are falling on deaf ears. You see her smirk as she watches you struggle.

"This is just so weird," Laura says as she sits back down on the couch. "I can't believe you're so tiny... but here you are." Her nose wrinkles a bit as she brings you a little closer. "Gawd, you stink though, David."

"Yeah!" Isabel agreed with a giggle. "Mom thought that gunk in the jar was keepin' him small. He smells like my dirty socks!" Isabel laughed and you squeal as you suddenly feel her finger poke you in the butt setting you swinging in your cousin's grip.

"Isabel! Stop it!" you scream but your tiny voice just makes the two girls laugh again. Finally though Laura sets you to lay in her soft, left palm. You look up at her pretty, smiling face and then see Isabel jump up onto the sofa leaning closer for a better look. she's grinning widely as you try to cover yourself again. You see your sister's finger rapidly approaching but your cousin's right hand brushes hers away.

You breathe a quick sigh of relief but Laura's hand does not stop. You gasp as her index finger pushes into your chest and shoves you down to hold you in place. You start to panic again frantically batting away as her thumb and other fingers easily overpower you shoving your fingers aside to expose you.

"Aww... Don't hide, David," she coos as she pins your arms down, ignoring your kicking legs. "We saw it already. Tiny but cute, Cuz." Laura laughs as she presses her index finger; her long nail playfully brushing against your chin.

"Laura! Please!" you beg feeling a tingling sensation between your legs again. You can feel yourself getting hard again and you wonder why the humiliation is turning you on. You squirm as best you can but that just seems to excite you more - and Laura as well.

"Please!" you try once more. "Don't do this! Just give me some water and make me big again!"

"Hmmmm..." The pressure on you eases a bit and you see your cousin looking thoughtful for a moment. You wonder if she is actually thinking about it and then her smile widens again.

"Okay," she says happily and turns to your sister. "I've got a water bottle in my purse, Izzy. Go get it for me, hunh?"

Isabel looks dubiously between you and your cousin for a moment, gnawing on her lower lip. "I dunno... Mom didn't want you to give him much water..."

"Don't worry," Laura says as she presses her finger down a bit harder again. "I won't.

"Just enough so I can watch..."

1521.content:
You find yourself standing face to face with Isabel. She was always tall for her age, but you'd still had a good foot and a half on her. You're stunned, while her lips curl into a dangerous grin. "Guess your prank backfired huh," she taunts you. "Since you want to play so much, this is perfect though. Too bad you aren't even shorter; then I could be the big sister for once!" As she teases you, all you can do is stare dumbly at her feet, blinking again and again, thinking you'll finally notice that she's standing on her toes or standing on something else, but there's nothing there, just her smelly, unwashed feet standing on the same floor as you. She notices you staring though, and giggles. "What's wrong, squirt? Do you like my feet or something? You can smell them some more if you want."

"Don't be gross, Izzy!" You snap back at her, blushing at her insinuation. "No one would like your gross feet!"

"Hee hee! You do! David likes smelly feet~ David like smelly feet~!" She starts to chant, which just makes you feel even more embarrassed by your current situation.

"I do NOT!" you finally exclaim in frustration, her teasing actually getting to you because of how insecure you feel right now. You punctuate your sentence with a hard shove... or at least you try to, but Isabel barely moves. Her eyes light up and she giggles

"Is that all you can do, little Davy? Wow, you sure are a little wimp, huh~? You should shove people like this!" She shoves you back and you fall on your back with a yelp, taken by surprise. You're left staring up at her giggling face. "Don't worry, Davy! Since you like my feet so much, I'm gonna leave footprints all over your face this time!" Before you can retort, she tackles you as you try to rise and you end up wrestling with her on the floor, trying to get out from under your sister's stronger body before she can rub her gross feet in your face anymore.

"Seriously Isabel! Stop it or I'm not gonna go easy on you!"

"Haha, who cares! You're a wimp when you're fighting someone your own size!"

Unfortunately, she seems to be right, and you find yourself rapidly losing control of the situation, until at last you end up laying flat on your belly with Isabel sitting triumphantly on your back. You squirm around as best you can, but she effectively keeps you pinned to the floor.

"Heehee! I win! I win! Now guess what time it is, wimp!"

"Izzy let me up! We can't just-"

"That's right, time for the wimpy loser to smell the powerful winner's feet!" She curls her legs and from her position on your back to press her smelly soles into the sides of your face, sandwiching you between her dirty feet and leaving big footprints on your face. 1521221111212211212.content: Isabel's room might have more hiding spots since she never cleans it but would you really want to hide in her room? The Laundry room is where the washing machine is, and all the clothes are stored etc.
1521221111212211212.title: another room

15212211112122112122.content:
As soon as you entered the room you heard loud footsteps coming from the stairs. Isabel was already back. And you didn't have time to look for a proper hiding spot.
Isabel stopped in the middle of the activity room and spoke loud enough to be heard in the whole floor.
"Ok shrimp listen! I'll give you two minutes for you to come here! If you don't obey! Then you might end up vacuumed up! Ha ha ha:!" Just as she finished Linda could also be heard from downstairs.

"Izzy honey? What are you doing?" She asked

"Gosh !" The girl gasped " I'm just playing mom!!!" She answered annoyed.

"Ok! But be careful not to break my vacuum cleaner hon!"

Isabel rolled her eyes and activated the vacuum for a second. "So the timer starts now! I won't miss any spot so if you want to resist I hope you've found a really good hiding spot!"

David desperately ran, longing the walls hoping Isabel won't come to check here first.

"One minute left" Announced Isabel's voice from the activity room. After a minute of running in circles, David realised there wasn't any genuine spot to hide and his hearth began pumping as fast as a motor. He hesitated to just give up and run back to his sister before it was too late.
15212211112122112122.title: Laundry room

152122111121221121221.content:
It was a miracle, a slight piece of fiber came from one of the closets, making an almost rope-like structure. Fortunately, it was easy to have a hold on it, instead of a regular rope you could place your tiny feet in between the fibers to hold your pound. When you finally reached the source of the fibers you decided to lounge it and jump in the closet.

The dreaded Isabel spent the entire time cleaning the whole floor. Linda finally arrived, she congratulated her for the good work and said how proud she was of her, after that Isabel closed every room upstairs then they both left. guiding her to the car for her sport.


You had survived and was safe, for now, that is. Staying in a dark place reminded you far too much of the horribles days you were trapped inside your evil sister's sock, you couldn't bear it so you decided to climb back out.

Something was weird, you were growing back, slowly but definitely, you remembered being close to a 1/10th inch and within only half an hour you had grown a lot. It was hard to measure up now since you were still rather small, but you might be two or three inches tall already.

You were trapped in the room for the moment. More than an hour passed and you heard the door unlocking. You were tall enough to reach the doorknob on your tip toes but didn't change room as you thought they would take more time before coming home. You rushed in one of the closets to hide inside of it.
Once there you hoped Isabel wouldn't check in here. Fortunately for you, she didn't.

You remained still for a while and realize you had reached back your normal size, you were waiting for this moment for so long you were glad it finally happened, now all you needed to do was to confront your evil sister and tell about her to Linda.

You finally opened the closet and tried to sneak out of it, you rush it a bit too much and make the ironing board collapse on the ground.

"Shit!" You said grabbing your hair, but after a quick thought you shouldn't be afraid now, she is just a girl and you're a teen, there's no way she can scares you right?
152122111121221121221.title: End of hiding

1521221111212211212211.content:
Only seconds after the iron board touched the grind, Isabel burst from the entrance. As soon as your eyes met you are taken by an overwhelming feeling of oppression, reminded of the way she had been constantly dominating over you again and again.

Her piercing eyes opened fully realizing how much you had grown back, "Wow! Davy! You can grow back? I thought you would remain a foot germ forever!" She took a step forwards in the room which immediately made you go on the defensive, something was off, you were back at full height, yet she felt so powerful and oppressing, Your arms shook uncontrollably as you stretched than in front of you, open-palmed as a signal not to come any closer. Even your knees felt numb. Isabel was scaring you for good, and she realized that in a much-amused voice she chips in closer your personal space.

That's the exact moment your heart shattered, as she stood around a meter away from you it was crystal clear now. You remained open-mouthed as you looked up at Isabel's smirking face. She was still taller than you. You were at maximum height, you had felt it, you had waited another hour just to be sure and yet, Isabel was more than a full head taller than you. You were directly facing her chest.

"That can't be truuue" You cry out taking awkward paths backward until you reach a wall.

Isabel laughed as she began walking again towards you, "Tough luck! You haven't fully grown back, I wonder, how did you grow back shrimp?" She stopped when she was just in front of you, she had to bent her head to look at you properly in the face. Your facial expression was priceless.

"I..I just grew back in time, but I thought I was at full size that's why I left the closet." You bent your head to the ground as looking at the analyzing shark-like face Isabel was making felt way too oppressing. Instead of her face, you were now looking her feet, thoughts of the time you were pinned under them flashed in your head making you gulp and let out a scared whine.

Isabel rubbed her chin with her finger while she thought "Hm...I see... So you're telling me if you don't stay near my feet for a while you could come back at normal size? Well, I think we both know what's coming then..."
Your eyes opened wide guessing where she intended to put you back. " NO! Wait!" You cry out.
Isabel grabbed both your cheeks and played with turning it around. "What is it you have to say baby shrimpy davyyy?? " She cooed.

"I...I can't grow more!" You throw out. You seemed to have gotten your sister's attention as she stopped bullying you for a second.

"I made sure to stay an extra hour in the closet to make sure I wasn't growing anymore, and only went out when I thought I was back to normal." You desperately explain.

Isabel's concentrated stare shifted to her grin back again. "But this IS your new normal state, Davy!!!!" She looked delighted by the news.

"That's great it happened. I thought about keeping you as my foot germ forever or squishing you but it might get even more interesting now!" She applauded her hands together as she shrieked little-satisfied laughers and bounced repetitively in place in a satisfied manner.

With her evil sicked mind, you knew what she had coming wouldn't be good, you fell on your knees and bent in protection yet again. "Please big sister don't be mean with me I know I was mean and an idiot before but I swear I'll always obey and respect you, please I'll do everything you want but let me live a normal life, I understood how superior and strong you are compared to me and I vow to make you happy and proud but please, please don't shrink me back I beg you!!" You tried to speak with open hearth and a genuine talk to appease her fury against you. But only silence remained in the room for seconds.
Sweating from anxiousness you slowly and shyly looked up to see her. Much to your surprise, there wasn't an evil expression at the moment. Just a wide smile and sparkles in her eyes.

"Oh my god! Davy! You truly have learnt your place! I've never expected you to look so pathetic! That's amazing! I don't even need to beat you up to have you grovel at my feet! hee hee !" She used her right foot and set it on your face taking a victory pose above you. After that, she rubbed your hair for a bit using her sole and stood back.
"You know what? Ok." She just said
Not understanding what she meant you kept looking up at her.
"Ok, I'll give you a chance, I'll let you live back with us." She slowly explained.
Your eyes had sparkles at their turn and you bent multiple times thanking her.
"You know this won't be that easy though... You've disappeared for ...I don't know... Like two weeks or something. Mom was so sad about it. I mainly do that for her. But your behavior will have to change, we can't let the old David back home. What I want is a totally new one got it? Oh- and if you lied about your condition or try to do anything against me. You'll end up there got it?" Isabel showed you the bottom of her sole and waited for an acknowledgment from your part before putting it way.
1521221111212211212211.title: Back with Izzy

15212211112122112122111.content:
Isabel looked down at you with a wry smile on her face. She scared the poor boy, but he had what he had deserved, now he was finally bound to accept his real place in the family when she'll have the higher role, she thought.

"You know Davy, I really liked when you called me big sis. Now I expect you to do that every day, and to treat me like that. Is that clear?" Isabel said as she remained still in front of you with her arms folded.
"Y...Yes...It is" You hesitantly answered.
"Good. Now stand up, we'll have to establish some terms and rules." She unfolded her arms, waving you to come closer as she took a step back from you, letting you stand up on your own. You were kind of lost right now, what was going to happen? How will mom react to all this? What has Isabel planned? All these questions melted in your mind. But you were clicked back to consciousness by Isabel's finger as you blenched realizing you had already lost the conversation.
"What did I just say shrimp?" Isabel's frowning stare felt terrifying as you bent your head to the ground mumbling something.
She grabbed your ear and pulled it up, making you follow her grip on your tiptoes.
"I've just started speaking and you're already not listening? What is it that you want? Me to shrink you back to a germ and put you in my sock? Is that what that is?" She shrilly yelled right inside of it, you immediately started to cry and apologize to her.
"Anyways, as I said. We can't let you go all out on our act and directly ask mom for that, if we want to make mom accept it we're gonna have to accept it step by step." Isabel closed her eyes as she thought about it, seemingly not finding an amazing solution at the moment.
"Let's focus on you now. I expect you to act like my little baby brother, the cutest you act, the more you'll be on my good sides.
