Nothing pisses me more off than having to bear you smugging around or trying to act tough, just be your true self and always speak to either me or mom with respect. Keep in mind that you're a little boy now, you're my tiny wimpy little brother, so I expect you to always act like the baby boy you are with everyone !" Isabel was now turned in front of you, waving her finger back and forth as her authoritative figure explained to you what she explained. Sometimes you crossed her piercing eyes when looking up which made you shyly look away.

"Let's see what else do we need. Hmmm" Isabel tapped her chin "Hmm, when we see mom again, you'll tell her that you fell asleep outside somewhere and found your way back here, but you don't know anything about the reason you transformed to a little boy...Oh! And that you don't remember being a teen before! Haha! That'll be fun! I mean you only remembered being the shrimpy little boy you are, as if it was normal! Haha! Oh! Oh!-And whenever you don't speak I want to see you suck your thumb like a little baby! Haha! Yes like that!" *she gestured as she bent forwards near your face a whining baby sucking on his thumb* "Oh! and eventually, now I'm the big sister we'll have to get mom ti give me your former room! I wonder if she'd accept having you sleeping with her, can you imagine that? It would be so fun!"

Isabel was in tears from laughter thinking of all the funny humiliating position possible she could put you through. She noticed you looked at her feet again. She wiggled her toes making you shiver at the thought of being near them again. "What's wrong Davy? Do we have a deal? You obey and you get to not be squished? Sounds fair to me."
15212211112122112122111.title: Little brother Davy

152122111121221121221111.content:
Isabel stood back at full height, proud of making you take all the height difference as you only stood eye level with her chest level.
"Are we all set?" She asked with her usual smug grin. You replied by nodding but she didn't seem pleased.
"No, we aren't Davy! The good answer was: Yes Big Sister while chewing your thumb like the baby boy you are!" Isabel let out in a fiendish scold, she grabbed your head at the same time and maneuvering your face around as she grabbed your hair with one hand. After seconds of shaking it on the sides, she turned, still grabbing you by the hair and forced your face, flat against her ass. "You clearly are a retard for forgetting this already! Jesus! How can you be this much of a dumbass? Hm?" Her voice boomed from high above as your face was pinned, stuck against the wide ass. Isabel kept your face forced against her ass and felt your meek kisses of appologise on her bottom- a feeble effort to beg her for mercy. "Yeah! That's right, get deep in here, get in your big sister's big ass Shrimpy-Wimpy!" Your sister kept rubbing your face against her wide ass, making sure you covered every spot with kisses she suddenly have a moan and throws your face away, you had to take a significant amount of steps to avoid falling on your back with her throw. Then you saw her face, she was reddening and looked puzzled for a second. Isabel then gulped and took a deep breath- closing her eyes in the process.

The strange effect that occurred last time struck again, it had been a while but you recognized how too well the sudden crash of your spirit. As you glanced at her towering form she exponentially looked more powerful and intimidating-without even growing, it was as if an evil aura emanated from her as you began to feel your knees shuddered from fear. Munching up her ass made her even more powerful on you, luckily for you, she didn't know it...Yet. Isabel opened back her eyes and stomped towards you, ever so afraid you cowered before her towering form.


Isabel didn't show a smile or anger on her face, she simply observed with her piercing eyes the insignificant daisy thing in front of her. David felt like he was facing a superior being right now, it wasn't his annoying brat sister he was dealing with anymore, to him it was a powerful form able to just end his life within a second, his natural instincts threw red flags of danger to him but his body couldn't answer. If before he would always have kept a place in his made focused on hatred and an urge for revenge against her, all his thoughts were wiped out to let sheer terror and submission thoughts towards the superior being-Like a tornado obliterating a town. The wimpy teenage boy understood how insignificant would be any action against her, at the moment he felt like any resistance he could make was worthless, as worthless as he was next to her. Isabel finally took a big smile.
(Nb: Don't go further unless you're a true desperate case, I'll have no mercy on you)

"Jesus, I feel so strong right now! Did you feel that?" She launched while stretching standing on her tip-toes, hence, increasing the height difference. Just as she moved David whined and cowered, probably he thought he was gonna be beaten again. "Y...yes. B...Big sister" He mumbled, hiding before his hands.
"It's so weird, I felt a sudden... Umm... Burst of confidence when I had your face pinned at my butt! It felt so amazing! What the heck?...!" Just at this moment Isabel suddenly felt a spurt coming from her stomach which made her step back as she covered her belly with her arms and bent a little, David wondered what happened as she stayed in position for a few seconds, she suddenly stood back and was breathing heavily, she glanced back at the bug in front of her, David felt like her piercing eyes dug deep inside of him as their stare crossed. It was another spurt of confidence Isabel was having. She had never felt so strong before and it felt amazing. Looking at this poor soul in front of her, she wanted to just crush his pathetic skull in her palm but contained the urge. She took another deep breath before taking an unusual, patronizing confident dominating tone as she spoke to the shrimp.

"You." She said with a movement of her head as she stood back at full height, hands on her hips. "The time you had been my big brother has long passed. Consider it an honor I've decided you were still part of our family. You are fortunate I'm true to my words and haven't reduced your back to your well-deserved form, germ." With an icy silent she pushed David, his trembling body offered no resistance and landed flat on his butt. She squatted in front of him and had to bent further to look at him in the eyes, forcing with her right hand his face to look up at her. "I'm your big sister now. Now and forever. I want to hear you see it. I'll know if you lie to me."

As David felt Isabel's piercing eyes, piercing his soul, she forced his thumb to his mouth, teary-eyed he genuinely answered. "Y...Yes ! Y...You're my big sis! You're my big sis Isabel and I'm your wimpy little brother Davy! Please don't hurt me Big sis Isabel!". Isabel's silent weighted in the room for seconds. She could feel it, the worm sucking his thumb wasn't lying. He was saying it out loud and genuinely, he had admitted his new role in the family. She was the big sister now, the only barrier there was her mother, and her wimpy brother had better be true to his words and convince her.
152122111121221121221111.title: Wimpier than ever

choices: Say you feel too exhausted and needed some sleep
Say you were fine with it even if you were exhausted
1521221111212211212211111.content:
Sparkles appear in Isabel's eyes, she had done it, the wimp wouldn't be a bother to deal with- She thought. She clenched her fists together."Amazing! You've truly accepted it!" She then stood back at full height again and took a victory posture. "Yes! Gosh: I feel so strong!" She paused in a position that would have shown her muscles if she had any. To you, it truly felt like it was another victory on her side as she showed off around in front of your face.

Soon enough she grabbed you by the arm and guided you to the stairs. It was all going too fast, you didn't feel ready to see your mom back again and yet, with a knot in your stomach and within seconds, you reach the living room downstairs where your mother, Linda was on the phone. Your eyes grew wider seeing how tall she was, if Isabel looked tall to you, Linda was even more gigantic.

"Mom! Look! Davy is back!" Yelled Isabel as you trembled, still firmly held by the arm by her long hand.

Linda turned to see your tiny form. You immediately felt shivers thrown down your spine as you couldn't find anything to say.

"What the... I'll call you back Tam." Slowly said, Linda, as she hangs up the phone before slowly stepping towards you. She appeared to be in a phone conversation with Tamara, your aunt, also Laura's mother.

As she stepped closer, fear struck you back, making you wiggle your way behind Isabel by reflexes. Isabel forced you back forwards.
"I found him in the laundry room mom! He was crying so I brought him to you."
"Oh my god! David?! Is that you?!" Linda almost yelled while having somewhat difficulty to breath. She fell on her knees and was around your height by doing so. You could have a good look on her eyes, reddened from days of suffering having lost her son. She looked like she had cried for days. Her saddened eyes looked at you thoroughly before she forced you in a warm hug.
"Oh my god! David! It is you! really you!!!!!" She couldn't contain her cry as she hugged you a bit too strongly. Her hug on you was a bit strong, but her delicate perfume and the warmth of her body made you burst into tears. Not able to fight your urges you began crying too." Mommyyyy!" You let out, happy to be near her again, for the first time within hellish days you felt safe and hugged back.

After the ceremonial reunion occurred and once the inevitable feel calms down you finally had a conversation. As Isabel forced you to, you said you couldn't remember what happened during those 10 days. Your mother was almost too forceful on this topic, but glancing back at Isabel you knew you couldn't break and reveal anything and remained to your words, not remembering anything. You also sucked back continuously on your thumb as Isabel gestured you. You hated yourself for not daring to go against Isabel, but after days of tortures under her might, you couldn't find any strength to go against your evil sister.
During the next hour you covered many topics, whether you should make it public, your mother, the police and many volunteers had made searched to find any clue about you and the actual situation was rather unusual. Your harsh treatment made it hard to communicate with your mother, she was so gigantic next to you, you felt highly intimidated by either her or Isabel, much of the conversation was rather one-sided, surprisingly, it was mostly your mother that spoke, Isabel tried to speak for your sake but Linda told her she was speaking with you, and excluding her from the conversation sometimes, it was your only victory on her, and you felt rather happy seeing her pissed about that. Fortunately, even if you had highly shrunk she still talked to you like her 15 years old son and treated you like this. Both the lack of sleep and the fear made you rather uneasy and awkward in the conversation, that plus the fact you kept sucking on your thumb made your mother offered to relax together for tonight since you finally all reunited and keep the serious discussion for later while you all watched a movie.
1521221111212211212211111.title: Reunited

15212211112122112122111112.content:
Ton festin était sepoudré de morcheau de peaux mortes venant des pieds de Linda et Isabel.


Time passed with you staying in between your mother and sister on the couch, you struggled staying awake for a while but at a point, you couldn't resist anymore and fell asleep with your head staying against your mother's arm. Her gentle caress drove you into a big sleep in no time.

You woke up with her standing up, a whole hour had passed and she had to prepare dinner. Letting you on the couch with Isabel.
"Slept well shrimp?" She asked as she poked you on your sides while you lied exhausted. Her finger dug into your skin making you have little startles every time she did so. Knowing she won't let you sleep you decided to sit back. "Yes." You answered, still in a vegetable state.
"You looked so cute when you slept with your head on mom's legs! You overcame yourself! I'm really proud of you!" Your face reddened realizing what just happened. Never would you have this happened if she hadn't continuously abrogated your sleep. Much amused Isabel threw her hand towards your face, you answered by cowering, fearing to be hit but she just softly ruffled your hair. After letting one of her annoying chuckle of mockery she spoke again. "For your perf, I'm gonna let you have a well deserved spare time." She grabbed the remote and put Nickelodeon on TV as she stood. She stood back, and looked even taller as she was in front of your state form."I'm gonna help mom cooking you just be good and watch your favorite show while the big persons take care of you shrimp ok?" You just answered by nodding, with a will to avoid any lost fight with her. "Good boy!" She patted your head with her long hand and left you alone on the couch. You were happy to finally have a spare time alone.

Isabel had found a little panty when the two of you were upstairs, she was clean at a really young age and after a while of checking the closest, she found this piece of tissue which used to belong to her and made you wear it before dragging you to Linda. It was a size or two under yours and began to really hurt as it was refraining your blood from circulating properly within your body. You forced to make the elastic extend and was satisfied when you felt it crack. However the pantie was now rather loose on you, you'll have to hold it when you walk to avoid any humiliating scenario.

Not caring at all of the cartoons broadcasted you fell asleep again.

Once again, your deep sleep was broke by Isabel harshly shaking you back and forth. In surprised you opened wide your eyes as she informed your dinner was ready. You both went to eat with Linda.
Your mother's gaze was mainly headed towards you, you felt she was uncomfortable about talking about what had happened to you, especially as you were far too focused on devouring the delicious pasta carbonara she had made.

"So honey, I have to know, what do you want me to do? Do you feel ready to come with me tomorrow? I'll have to tell everyone I found you back, and there will be a lot of questions, but I don't want to make you feel stressed or anything, I'm so happy you came back. I'll do anything for you to feel safe and comfy."
You stopped munching for a second, which was hard given the tremendous appetite you had right now. remaining silent as you didn't know what to answer. After a few second you looked at Isabel and she raised her thumb, implying you to suck on it. You almost immediately went on sucking your thumb, not daring to look up anymore. After a second you finally mumbled. "Yes mom, I think I'm ready." Before staying silent as the noise of you sucking on your thumb was the only sound produced in the room for a few. If it was kind of humiliating being forced to do that, it produced somewhat of a calming effect. Isabel spoke up "Mom! I don't think Davy is ready! I mean look at him he's all shocked!". Linda cut her "Izzy, hon, your brother is old enough to make his own decisions! Tomorrow we're both going to the police department and explaining everything!"

Isabel, for the first time, looked afraid. "I'm coming too, mom! I won't let Davy alone with those mean policemen!"
"I don't think it's a good idea, Izzy, it'll be long and I'm sure you won't like it." Your mother just said you felt relieved your mother was unconsciously protecting so hard with this. The wicked Isabel won't stop there though and kept pressing. "But mom! I don't want David to be alone and I'll help him out too!" She turned to you, her expression looked so angelic yet you knew it was just an act, she disgusted you. You despised Isabel yet she had you trapped here, you couldn't say no to her and you both knew it. "I guess Isabel could come mom?" You mumbled removing your thumb from your mouth before sucking up on it again.
Linda looked a bit surprised, she knew you hadn't the best relationship before and something felt fishy, yet she was living too much of a dramatic scenario to have clear thoughts about all of this. "Hm... I guess I'll think about it." She just said as she went back to eating, at least she had finally made the things go forwards now.

The dinner ended with you focusing on gulping the delicious plate while Isabel and Linda tried changing the topic and discussed of various topic but you, everyone was seemingly uncomfortable about that right now. Isabel and Linda sometimes threw you warm smiles, making you shiver and look away in fear. You felt like having developed a kind of fear for taller beings you guessed. Even if Linda was so nice with you, you couldn't help but have flashes of her menacingly standing in front of you, she would be able to easily end your life if she felt like it.

Linda finally did the dishes, letting you alone, sucking on your thumb with Isabel.
"Pst!" She whispered to you. "Have you enjoyed your meal wimp?". You nodded, it was indeed a nice meal you've just had.
"Of course you've enjoyed it! Check this!" She took a small object from her pocket and waved it under the table for you to see. You recognized it was Linda's ped egg, she often used it to remove the dead skin of her feet."I've poured it on your plate before waking you up, mom didn't clean it in a while but I still had to use it on my feet a little to fill it! I'm glad you've enjoyed your favorite plate of foot cheese!" She sneakily laughed as your face whitened hearing the news.
Your head full dizzy, you were disgusted by the thought, the tremendous nausea was too much to handle and you rushed to the bathroom before vomiting repetitively.


Linda rushed to you, making sure everything was ok, you had to convince your mother everything was fine, you felt just a little sick. Not wanting to stay around Isabel anymore you asked if you could go to sleep, not forgetting to put your thumb to your mouth as Isabel lurked from the shadows behind, and you were brought to bed. It was huge and comfy, thoughts of your evil sister wouldn't stop torturing your mind though.
15212211112122112122111112.title: Dinner with mom and Isabel

152122111121221121221111121.content:
Lying in his oversized bed, the reduced teenage boy's thoughts were haunted by the horrible thought of the traumatizing dinner he just had. Even if his stomach was empty, the thought of his feast being dusted with his mother's and sister's foot scraps was an abhorrence. He could picture his mother using her peg egg and tossing the content on his plate.

The room was plunged in darkness and David could sometimes hear the booming steps of his relatives outside. Exhaustion once again took the better of him and drove him to sleep. Finally able to escape reality he dreamt of being outside, in a forest, alone and one with nature. As he strolled he heard booming steps coming from behind him. The steps kept booming once in a while, louder and louder. At a point, he finally turns to see a gigantic Isabel looking down at him from afar. Petrified for a second, he began running to the other direction to escape her. He ran the fastest he could until he finally reached a little house, lost in the forest. Soon after the roof of the house was torn off revealing the gigantic evil face of Isabel and Linda smirking down at him. They both raised their feet together and David could only see their long powerful two soles collapsing right on him.

At this exact point, the boy startled on his bed and let a terrified yell. " AAAAAAAAAAAH!" He was sweating and trembling at this point. In only a few seconds, the door of his bedroom opened, revealing Linda, closely followed by Isabel. "David?! Are you alright?!" Linda asked afraid as she sets the light on and walked further. David felt like even in dreams he wouldn't be safe from this torture and his spirit broke. He burst into unstoppable tears. Just speaking was a pain for him. Linda went near to her son and removed the blanket on top of him, as she did so, a flask of piss could be seen around the poor boy. He had wet the sheets. Linda bit her lips as she helped David out. She kneeled on the ground to speak to him. "Is everything alright honey? Please tell me what happened?" She asked in a worried voice. "I *Sob* I'm sorry *sob* mommy *sob* I've just had a *sniff*... a nightmaaaare !* The voice of her son sounded more like a whining baby rather than an actual 15 years old but she chose not to judge him on that, surely he had a hard time, being shrunk to this size must be traumatizing for anyone she thought. Linda hugged her son for a second. "I'll take care of everything honey don't worry." Isabel jumped in to caress her little brother's back. "Are you alright Davy?" She then talked to her mom." Can I help you, mom?" Linda realized she had a bit wetted her clothes by hugging you and stood back up, she placed a gentle hand on your back and pushed you toward your sister.
"Isabel, can you watch him while I clean the sheets?" Isabel smiled at full teeth as she grabbed you and nodded. "Sure mom! I'll look after him like he's my little bro!"
Linda was about to say something but refrained and focused on removing the sheets while Isabel drove you to the bathroom. There she put you in the bathtub and forced you to remove your panty, letting you nacked. "Please big sis, don't hurt me." You whined, humiliated once again. "Hurt you?" She answered. "I said I wouldn't as long as you're good, and I must admit, for the first time ever, you impress me! You really excelled at being a shrimpy wimpy! ha ha ha! Don't forget your thumb though!" She playfully threw water at you as you sucked back on your thumb again. At least, as humiliating as this movement might be, sucking on the thumb helped you not to thin too much by the horrible events.

After a few seconds of that, she helped you out of the bathtub and put a towel around your waist to cover up your private part. Linda entered the bathroom.
"What are you?..." She asked surprised, she wasn't expecting any of this."Nothing mom! I've just helped my little bro clean himself! Now he's all clean!" Linda stood in place looking at her son, the fact he wasn't crying comforted her a little. "Izzy, hon, I know you want to help but this isn't something for you to do ok? Your brother can ..." Linda stopped during her sentence, as she looked at her little son, sucking on his thumb, she realized that indeed, letting him take a shower alone, and all the risks it implied wasn't an option given the circumstances. "Anyways, I don't want you to take that kind of decisions without consulting me before." Linda continued "But mom!" interjected her daughter. "That's final young girl!" Without adding a word she kneeled in front of her shrunk son and gave him clothes. "I only could find these, they are too small to fit your sister but I hope they'll be good on you." "Thanks, mommy" David let out, teary-eyed again, seeing his mother take such good care of him.

A few minutes later, David was dressed with his sister's clothes, they were loose on him a few sizes above his own, but they would do for now. Linda served herself a glass of wine, all of these were hard on her and she couldn't fight the stress it brought. You stayed on the couch looking at the movie while Isabel went to her mother.
"Mom what should we do for tonight? We can't let him sleep alone? He can sleep with me if you want." You stood and peeked at them from behind the couch. As they were both at the table. Linda looked at you and waved you to come. You touched your hands worryingly as you approached. "Honey, do you want to go back to sleep in your bed?" You sucked on your thumb again, looking worryingly at Isabel and your mother's face. "I don't know," you mumbled. Linda bit her lower lips, she looked a bit uneasy of saying this. "Would it make you feel better if you slept with me for tonight? I don't really feel easy to let you alone right now." Her voice was calm and warm, but the idea of sleeping with your mother sent you shivers in your spine. "Sure mommy, I'm fine with that," you answered before sucking back on the thumb. You looked back at Isabel for a second, she gazed at you expectantly, you knew what it implied and talked again. "Mom, I wondered if .. Hm...Isabel could sleep with us too?" Linda was shocked by the request but after a few seconds of processing it she accepted. Around an hour later you all went to bed together. Isabel forced you close to her in a hug. You wanted to cry but wouldn't. Your mother's presence felt reassuring and calming though. You knew as long as she was around, nothing bad could happen to you. Her gentle carress on your back drove you to sleep.
152122111121221121221111121.title: Wet dream

1521221111212211212211111211.content:
Linda awoke first this morning, she looked at her side to see Davy snuggled against his sister, who had let an arm around his shrunk body as if she was protecting him. The duo looked cuter than ever. She decided not to wake them up and went to the kitchen to prepare a morning meal.

Around twenty minutes later David was suddenly awoken by Isabel's huge butt who swallowed his face in between her cheeks as she sat on his head. "Smoochie smoochie Davy!" She mocked. The first second of his day was already a humiliation. David wished he was still in his dream and forced kisses against the bare ass on top of him. Soon enough, the dreaded sensation occurred and David felt even worse than last time. It might be a normal consequence since this time Isabel had him doing so for a good two minutes. He remained trembling and lying on the bed while Isabel overjoyed jumped around as she also had effects, though more on the positive side on this interaction.
Isabel jumped next to you on the bed and grabbed your face. "So-Shrimp, today's the big day. You get it already right? You don't stand a chance against me. I'm better than you, on any aspect, and I'm also the one who can decide whether or not you see tomorrow, right?" She forced your face to look up at her, more than ever you felt inferior to your evil sibling, and tears already poured out of your eyes. "Y..Yes, big sister, I'm worthless next to you." You mutter out. Isabel seemed satisfied as she saw pure fear in your submissive eyes, yet she needed to be sure, after all, you are so dumb you could make the plan screw at any moment. "Remember Davy, You don't know anything about your shrinking, you don't remember what happened when you disappeared AND! You feel like a little baby! If by any chance the investigation doesn't get closed you're ending here!" She raised her right foot above your face and showed with a finger a spot on the ball of her foot. She forced your face to kiss her sole then left the room, letting you cry alone.


You felt for the worst this morning, while you ate, you felt like an insignificant insect being trapped in between two humans. Finally, all of your family finally went to the police department. Walking next to your mother you sometimes snuggled behind her as other humans got close. Any other human being sent you alarms of danger, and it was really hard staying calm around those tall beings. The investigator, Miss Lara Melbourn had trouble speaking with you. As you constantly trembled and whined as she moved or spoke. She soon gave up talking to you alone and made your family come to comfort you. You purposely avoided the questions and answered as Isabel asked you too. The investigator seemed to have caught something fishy as she asked about your family relationship but couldn't press further as you were too dismissive.
"We've never seen such a case..." The investigator gasped as she passed her hands in her hair. "Well, madam, your son looks definitely shocked and I'll require a psychiatrist analysis at the soonest." A few other words were exhanged when Isabel and you were out of the office. Your mother had a concerned look on her face but wouldn't talk about it. You all went back in the car.
1521221111212211212211111211.title: Investigation

15212211112122112122111112111.content:
The family arrived at the mall to do some shopping for tiny Davy. Linda asked a waitress for help.
"Excuse me, ma'am I'm looking for clothes for my son." She asked, showing the little boy, standing next to his taller sister. "Sure, follow me!" The young waitress guided the family to the child section. "Well, everything you need will be here!" Cheered the lady as she guided all of you to the right section.

You walked behind Isabel, your forehead didn't even reach her shoulders. If you felt already small the size of the clothes made you feel even more insignificant, they were supposed to fit a child from 5 to 6. Linda pulled out a little shirt that seemed to be your height. "Look, David, this one will be great on you she said as she showed you a blue shirt. Isabel from behind shook her head for you to say no, the same process repeated for several times. "Uh...David, I know this isn't like what you used to wear honey but we don't really have a choice there and..." Isabel jumped forwards showing you another light blue t-shirt, this one had a princess Elsa on it. You remained frozen in place looking at this ridiculous childish clothes. Linda looked at the t-shirt too." Izzy, I don't think this is an appropriate outfit for your brother.."
"But mom! He's the one who has to choose! Do you like it, Davy?" Answered Isabel, swirling around her mother to face you.
"I..uh..Yes! ...A lot!" You blurted out as a cold feeling took the better of you.
"...Hm...You know what, fine, go find whatever you want, but don't do anything silly ok? I'm gonna take a look for a dress." Linda said rolling her eyes, not believing David actually preferred Isabel's choices than hers.

Isabel took you by the hand and drove you towards the girl section. "Look!! There are shoes too! How about the pink little poney ones! They'll be the best on you!" Her eyes look overwhelmed by joy, she was enjoying any last drop of your anxiety. Isabel took the extreme precaution of choosing a various choice of either very girly or just babying clothes she could find out and you ended up with various clothes such as a ninja turtle pant, Barbie, and Peppa pig shirts plus some other Noddy shoes and pat patrol shorts. " Look at you!" She drove you to a mirror before placing the clothes in front of you, as if you wear it. "You look like a true baby now! I could eat those little cheeks of yours!" She laughed as she meanly pinched your cheek for several seconds. "True baby Davy! Ha ha ha ha!"

After this little scenario, and your mother making sure you really wanted those clothes before she paid for it, it was time to go back to the car for all of you. "What do we say?" Mom asked while looking at the mirror of the car to look at you. "Thanks mommy!" You blurt out, trying to hide your annoyance and betray Isabel.
15212211112122112122111112111.title: Shopping clothes

choices: Some 18 year old girl of the neighborhood
152122111121221121221111121111.content:
Once home you could finally have some free time for a while. You hadn't seen your phone for a while now but surely didn't want to intervene with anyone online. At least your laptop was still here so you went on it and went on it and surfed the web. Isabel finally arrived in your room, you would have yelled at her for not having knocked before but there is no place for that now. "Hey, wimp, what're you up to?" She asked as she came closer and looked at your screen.
"Nothing! " You mumbled closing the pages.
"You're far too much of a shrimpy wimpy to use that. It's mine now." Just as she said so she closened the device and took it under her arm. It was a gift you had for Christmas and it saddened you seeing her take it away, just like she had taken everything away from you until now. She put the device aside and came back near you.
"Anyway, I'm here to warn you aunt Tamara is coming for you psychiatry test. So same rule as always worm." She authoritatively stood, hands on her sides before grabbing your head. "Butt-kissing time! And you'd better kiss it good." She flattened your face against her ass again, making your thoughts go numb in the process.


Tamara, your tan brown haired aunt, finally arrived and examined you. Just like any other "butt session" you had with Isabel, you felt insignificant and you basically felt like you've failed almost all the tests. Only the reasoning ones were ok but even that you weren't sure.
"Hm. Linda can I share a word with you?" Tamara asked, her face couldn't hide the worrying she was having.
The two women went on the corridor, after a few seconds you could hear your mother yell.
"What the heck! My son has nothing of these! He's just in shock because of his disease and he's lost!... He'll get better soon!..."
A few other seconds passed by and Linda yelled again.
"That's it, thanks for coming! Now leave us alone!"

The entrance door was shut close. Whatever Tamara said to your mother she wasn't happy to hear it. Without talking to you she rushed to the fridge and served herself some wine before sitting at the same table you are now. She looked saddened and lost, Linda also gulped her glass like it was water. She avoided looking at you and lowered her head between her hands. "Damn... What have I done." She slowly said. This whole scene had certainly drained up her energy.


Hours passed and Linda finally decided to talk to you. "Honey can we share a word." You nodded and got closer to her since your face only was reaching her bottom she had to kneel to be at your level. She gently rubbed your hair while speaking, her breath betrayed her consumption of alcohol. "Listen. Tamara thinks you are struck by a terrible disease, that basically makes you act and think like a toddler but I know she's wrong. This is just a momentary shock you have and all of this will be behind us in no time. I'm not giving you any of the medicine she wants me to. Mommy has been a bit harsh on her though and tonight I'll go out with her to apologize."

"Sure mo...Mommy" You stammered, shocked to realize Isabel's plan was working and she was slowly dragging up everyone against you. You hesitated to denounce her right now, but you couldn't, that wasn't the right time, you had to hold on until a real safe moment present itself. Linda's soft caress was feeling good and calming, one of the brief relief of the day of torture. "I also wanted to let you know I don't feel safe letting you two alone while I'm out, I'll have someone coming to keep an eye on you two ok?" Her gentle caress couldn't stop your sorrow, you were about to cry realizing she couldn't trust you anymore and only nodded, knowing any words you said would betray your sadness.

That being settled Linda waited for the baby-sitter to arrive and left...
152122111121221121221111121111.title: The psy

choices: eat the meal then avoid Laura the best you can
eat the meal then try to win back Laura's trust
1521221111212211212211111211112.content:
While Linda prepared herself in the bathroom, Isabel forced you to stay with her. To strengthen the power she had over you she humiliated you in the living room. Your sister didn't look like to care being heard or seen by your mother. Isabel had so much confidence she could easily find her way out of any compromising situation she didn't even care about taking extreme caution of her bullying over you, especially since she is so sure that you'd take any burden. Right now, you were lying on the couch, your face obliterated under her butt, her powerful height digging you on the cushion as you were forced to face her pajama.

The doorbell finally rang, you finally could breath properly as Izzy stood up and rushed to the door. You slowly and shakingly stood at your turn. "Yes? Who's at the door?" Yelled Isabel, "It's me" Tamara answered. As you slowly approached, you faced your mother who had suited up, she scarcely applied such caution on her makeup, but right now she was stunning. As you stepped closer Isabel grabbed both of your arms and drove you closer to her, in a hug she left her head lying on top of yours. Linda finally opened, revealing Tamara and your cousin Laura.

You briefly looked up at them, Laura was chewing on something and looked at her phone, as soon as she let her eyes on you, she let out a surprised face, opening wide her eyes but she said nothing. You on the other side felt so intimidated by all those tall beings that you immediately glanced down at the floor. They chatted altogether for a while, speaking mostly about you and your fear reveled, Linda wanted Laura to look over you and your sister while she was going out with Tamara. you didn't like much the idea of being babysitted by your 14-year-old cousin, who you used to have a rivalry with, but you didn't have much choice there. The time she teased you because she was only an inch shorter than you albeit she was a year younger had passed, there wasn't any comparison possible now. You cowered, embarrassed as the taller beings spoke about you, Laura even notified how cute you looked. As a way to calm down, you went deeper in the hug of your taller sister, hating yourself for not even daring to say anything. At least, the hot contact with Isabel's warm body was refraining you from crying out loud.

The humiliation went for the longest 5 minutes of your life, Linda highlighted you couldn't be left alone, Tamarra said you were like a child now,n and should be treated as such. Even Isabel did her part and spoke about the cute clothes you choose by yourself. Worst was Linda actually acknowledged it and said you were in need of attention and support. But you remained still and silent, looking at the women's shoes, with the typically haunted thoughts of the time you spent trapped inside Isabel's shoe for weeks. That would be your future if you did one little screw-up and knowing that was torturing you. There you were, scared, and trapped within your sister's grasp while everyone was beginning to berate you.


Laura, Isabel and yourself waved goodbye to the elder as they went in a car to go out. "Jesus, mom is so annoying, she's always the one having fun while I'm stuck with the errands...Well, at least I've time for my homework I guess..." Laura grunted as she closed the door, she looked so tall now, your face was a bit over her rear level. She looked at her two cousins, she never had thought she would have been the one in charge of both Isabel and David, the idea kind of amused her since he used to be such a cocky prick before. She took a deep breath and finally said. "Ok, so... Who's angry? " She clapped her hands in the motion.

"I'm starving!" Cheered Isabel. Surprisingly Laura kneeled the same way your mother did to be eye level with you. " Hey, Linda told me she prepared dinner and I'll just have to microwave it, so you can play until then ok?" You stayed mouth dropped realizing how much of a patronizing voice she took with you, was she seriously considering you as nothing more than a kid now? Laura gave you the warmest smile before gently tapping your head and standing back at full height, not even giving you a chance of talking. "We'll play together! I'll have my eye on lil Davy!" Exclaimed Isabel as she grabbed you by the arm, a bit too strongly.

"Good, stay around here so I can have my eye on you two ok?" Laura casually said browsing her phone again before heading to the kitchen.
Isabel went to the TV and turned on your console. She didn't pay you any attention as you look at her averagely bad plays of some mono player game you had already finished before. You had plenty of time to think of what to do. You had to take Laura by your side, it saddened you to think so but she might be an interesting help against Isabel. You decided you would do your best to please and maybe if given the occasion tell her you're still your true self.
You finally built up enough courage and went to the kitchen to have a speak with Laura.

As you came in the room Laura was once again on her phone, laughing alone at whatever thing she looked at. You shyly stepped closer to her as you finally reached her seat. "Whoops, didn't see you Davy" She finally said as she stood up and almost bumped into you. "Is there anything you need?". As much as her height was overwhelming, she acted rather kindly with you, which you were grateful with the number of times you messed with her before. "Hm... Yeah, I'd like to help you." You mumbled back, removing your thumb of your mouth for the first time in a while. You were surprised yourself it became quite a comforting habit to do so, you didn't even realize you were doing so until so now. "Ooooh!" Laura cooed in the worst babyfying way "You're so cute! Come here!" Laura grabbed you by the shoulders and brought you closer to her as she gave multiple kisses on your cheeks. Making your face reddened in the process. "You don't need to help me, Davy! Let me do everything!".
"O...Ok" You mumbled again before putting your thumb back at its place processing what had just happened. Before you left Laura told you to wait.
"So Davy, I've spoken about you of several of my friends and was rather curious myself, how do you feel right now? Mom told me you still do remember stuff of before but most of your brain is ...Uh... Damaged?"
"I...I do remember some things yes." You answered, feeling stressed, you didn't expect to be questioned again, the time at the police station almost had you piss your pants several times and being questioned this way made you uneasy. Laura remained silent, expecting some more explanation from you but you couldn't find anything else to say, the atmosphere felt rather cringy as a loud silent remained for a few seconds.
"Davy?" Laura suddenly said, cutting you out of your thoughts as you still glanced at her converse shoes.
"I..I.. Do remember I was...Am your big cousin." You suddenly said struggling to let out any word, you felt totally trapped in between the urge of reveling everything and keeping it safe to avoid Isabel's wrath. "Well, not so big now" Laura casually answered chuckling, she realized your embarrassment "Oh, come on Davy, I'm joking! What else?" She added, Laura didn't look like she took it too seriously, it annoyed you, yet, you didn't do anything to show her nothing at changed.
"Laura can I tell you something." You said taking a deep breath, about to say everything. The acting was over, you had to let it all out, hopefully, Laura will protect you from your evil sister and Isabel will have to face the consequences of her act! It would be better than being trapped in such a position!

"I'm still the same I was before Laura. I do remember everything, I'm done acting!" Laura opened her eyes wide in surprise, your show looked convincing, what if her mother was wrong?
"What do you mean ?! Is it true? But...The psychiatry test said..."
"I lied and did all of that on purpose!" You answered in the loudest voice you could. You finally had her attention.
Laura got on tiptoe and let her arms on the counter that gives to the living room. "Oh my god! Izzy! Come and see that now!".
You tried to interject but she acted far too quickly. The dreaded Isabel appeared behind you, wondering what was happening. You could feel her cold steer on you as she approached you from behind.
"What's happening?" She asked.

Panicked you laughed alone and let out, "I pranked big cousin Laura! Ha ha ha!" with the fakest laughter you could let out.
"What?" They both said looking at each other, not understanding.
"I was joking Laura! Haha! Gotcha!" You said again.

Laura's stare turned from surprised to a frowning face, even if he was just a child now, he still tried and made fun of her?! Still messed up with her and was disrespectful! What a twerp! She had been nice to him but he was still acting like a jerk now the table had turned?!
Laura crossed her arms and looked away in annoyance while Isabel laughed too with her little brother. "What did you say, Davy? What's the joke?" Your big sister asked as she stepped closer to you. "Oh! It's not important, just a little joke!" You called down the atmosphere. "Come on tell me!!! Else I'll make you tell me!" Isabel insisted.
"Urrrhhh" Let out the annoyed voice of Laura. "He just told me he still remembered everything and was still normal. And yes, I believed that. That's definitely a joke you can be ve-ry proud of little boy! You got me for good."

"Oh?! Really! You're still a big boy?! Ha ha ha! That's funny! yesterday when you wet your bed it didn't look like so!" Isabel mocked making Laura laugh softly in the meanwhile.
"Woa. He really did that?" She asked curiously still chuckling.
"Yeah! And then he cried for mom and me to sleep with him! Uh lil bro?" Isabel added as she suddenly began tickling you on the sides making you unable to resist. She had you pinned on the ground laughing.


Soon after you went back on the couch with Izzy to let Laura finish the meal.
1521221111212211212211111211112.title: Babysitting time

15212211112122112122111112111122.content:
The sofa felt way softer and comforting than the ground you had just been pinned to while Isabel effortlessly tickled you in front of your cousin. This is the only place you felt comforting, closing your eyes, the thought of your gentle mother's caress on the head made you crack a soft smile. Yet this comfort only was for a short time as Isabel's finger dug into your stomach, making you leap in position.
"Dinner's ready shrimp" She announced, shutting the TV which, you weren't looking anyways.

Sitting at your place, you looked at the plate, Laura cooked pasta in addition to the lasagnas but it had remained for too long in water and it was more paste than pasta... You hated lasagna, and told mom many times, so you just picked around without eating much, even if you were a bit hungry.
"You're not eating?" Asked Laura, stopping to browse her phone for a second.
"I'm not really hungry" You lied to avoid making her mad.
"Eat it or you're gonna cry later for food." Laura casually said before going back on her phone, she might not have done it on purpose, but her sentence felt daring, and it tickled what was left of David's pride.
"And I think pasta isn't good with lasagna." You added without thinking before looking down on your plate to avoid Laura's eyes.
"What did you say?" Laura's voice kept speaking, making your body shiver, why were you that submissive to her? Maybe because she was around twice your size and your unofficial babysitter?
"N..Nothing." You pathetically blurt out before forking a pasta, rubbing it against lasagna sauce and eating it.

Laura chose not to push on the topic and kept on using her phone, you were glad she did. Isabel wouldn't have missed the opportunity to remind you of your place there, or would probably have found a way to make you regret your daring behavior you though. Speaking of which, you looked at your sister, she was on the right corner of the table and looked at you with frowning eyes when she wasn't gulping down her plate at an incredible speed, was it because she understood? Did she find out you were about to confess everything to Laura? Oh god, of course, she knew, you are gonna get it for sure once Laura leaves. But it's not too late, right? You still could have an opportunity to have your cousin at your side? Even you had disappointed her in your last interaction you can still catch up and get her attention.

"Actually, it's fairly good Laura!" You launch while forcing yourself to chew on the food.
"Don't speak with full mouth Davy!" Isabel cuts you in her almost usual commanding voice.
"Thank you my lil Davy! I'm glad you like it but your sister is right you know?"
You nod in agreement, raise a hand as a mea culpa and lower your eyes to the almost full plate, wondering how you'll be able to eat it all, it was disgusting. You tried not to react being spoken like a child by your younger cousin but understood she sniped at you a little, after all, she might believe you truly are a child now, in doubt you thought it was wiser not to feel attacked by her belittling phrases.

The two girls had finished their meal while about 3/4 of food was still on your plate. "Ah, I'm full!" Laura said finishing her yogurt, she looked at you but didn't say a word and started gathering the plates. "I thought you liked the meal, Davy? You ate almost nothing!" Isabel said smirking at you. "W...Well, I've had enough."
"Izzy, that's ok...Here let me take your plate." Laura asked while bending to reach your plate. You grabbed on your plate and held on it.
"No! I want to help you with the dishes Laura!" For the first time, Laura let out a surprised expression, her face enlightened with a soft smile. "Ow, my big boy wanna help me? So cute! Ok sure, Davy! You'll help me with the dishes!" She bloomed with her hands on her sides. Your face immediately reddened and your eyes plummeted down in embarrassment, you could hear Izzy chuckle at your face but just went on standing up and headed towards your cousin.

Just when you were about to reach her, you stepped in front of Isabel, without looking at her and clenching your teeth fearing her cold stare. What had to happen, happened, and in a gesture, she both pushed you with her hand and tripped you up using her long leg. You collapsed face-first on the ground and looked up with teary eye, the scene you witnessed was terrifying. Your plate had landed flat against Laura's back, her whole trouser was scattered with lasagna and the surprise made her let go of the other two plates she carried which made a huge amount of shards on the ground. But what you feared wasn't the broken shard or the food that was around, it was Laura's face when she turned around.
"HOLY CRAP DAVY!" She shouted in a piercing voice.
"HOW THE HELL DID YOU DO THAT?! SEE WHAT YOU DID! OH MY GOD! ALL MY CLOTHES ARE RUINED NOW! YOU LITTLE BRAT! YOU DID IT ON PURPOSE!"
Seeing her standing at full height in front of you, enraged with her eyes fixed on you was terrifying.
"No, Laura! I'm sorry I...I Just tripped and ...And ...Couldn't hold on the plate! I'm sorry!" You cried, tears almost immediately pouring out of your face. You cursed your evil sister for tormenting you again. You knew she was up to something but what could you do? Denounce her? There was no way you could go with that.

Seeing your frail face on the ground Laura assumed you just fell and took a deep breath to calm down, she is a rather calm and nice person but as a teen, she can get some freak out moment where she loses control when pushed. Laura chilled and grabbed your arm, she effortlessly helped you back up but didn't let go.
You looked way up at her face, her voice wasn't nice and booming but purely informative. "You don't touch anything and stay here with your sister if you break something else I'll punish you got it?"

What was there to do else than nodding in such a situation. You were glad she didn't punish you already. It's almost thankfully you let out "Yes got it, thanks, Laura. I'm sorry." Now you saw her mad you got it, indeed she was the one in charge around it, and you have messed up pretty badly...
Just when you started realizing how hard it will be to gain her trust now Isabel's voice rang out from behind.
"Hey shrimp, come here!" She commanded.
Just turning around your sister was sitting back at her chair. What immediately struck you was her right foot, she had bent one leg in order to rest one foot on her knee letting you a perfect view of her sole. Her foot wasn't clean as she often walked barefoot around, but now it also had mashed lasagna flat against it. She waved it around making you fear of what was about to come.
"See what happens when you defy me little prick?" She smirked. "My feet got all dirty because of your incompetence, you know what's left for you to do right?"
"I..Izzy I..I didn'..."
"Shut the hell up and lick my superior feet!" She just said in a patronizing and intimidating voice you hadn't heard for a while as she pointed to her dirty sole.
There were no contesting orders with Isabel and you knew it now, you just sobbed and crawled to her foot. You looked at it from up close and remembered the traumatic days you had been stuck in her shoe then looked back up at her intimidating powerful face who just stared at you silently. Seeing you paused she pointed again at her foot. "Do it." She just said.

Just as she ordered you complained and started lapping away the dirty pieces of food scattered on Isabel's sole. "I want to see you eat it all wimp," She said. Not able to contain the humiliation you started to whine, slowly at first, then sniff your nose, then in a few seconds having tears pouring from your eyes, thinking how pathetic you were right now. Oh, you hoped Laura could come back and see this! So she'd get all the pieces together! You hoped she or anyone would find out about Izzy with all those hints you left behind..."Is it good little foot-cleaner?" She chuckled a little "ow, I forgot it tickled so much hee hee.".

You lapped again and again the long sole, just like a dog, fortunately, the lasagna was almost all eaten now, so the nightmare was almost over. "Hey, don't forget in between the toes boy. I think it's dirty too." You slowly looked between her slim toes as she stretched them around. "There is nothing in between them Isabel I...I think your foot is clean now...can I..." Looking up at her you saw her cold stare raising an eyebrow and immediately stopped. Almost in a second, you lapped each and any spot you could in between her long toes. "Good." She said." You know, I heard little child only had two ways of learning things, either treats or punishment. I clearly saw what you did with Laura and tried to turn her against me..."
You stopped sucking on Isabel's toes but couldn't dare look up after this humiliation, so you stared down clenching your little weakling fists."I'm sorry Isabel, I ...I just didn't want Laura to.."
"Hush when I speak boy" She slightly slapped the top of your head with her now clean foot. "You're spoiled, and I've been way too kind with you so you'll have to learn the hard way now. I hope you'll remember this the next time you try to turn someone on me."
"Yes, Isabel! I've got it! Thank you so much for teaching me!" You pathetically let out in utter submission, bending in the process.
Isabel only reacted by letting a soft laugher. "Oh, but you haven't been punished yet boy, I told you, a spoiled brat like you gotta learn the hard way."
Not understanding what she meant you looked up at Isabel again, then you saw it. She was holding Laura's phone in her hand.
Then the worst sickening feeling went threw your mind realizing what was bound to happen.
"Izzy please..." You mumble, whitening seeing this.
Isabel threw with all her strength Laura's cellphone, the last apple, and the most expensive one too. The time felt like stopping when you saw the screen explode on the ground.

"LAURA! " She yelled as you backed on your ass from her, your heart was beating at full speed.
15212211112122112122111112111122.title: A supervised meal

152122111121221121221111121111221.content:
"What ?!" Resonated in a grunt Laura's voice from afar.
"Davy said you're a bitch and broke your phone!" Izzy said pointing at you, visibly motivated by making your life a nightmare.

You stood up and raised your hands in front of you, hearing loud footsteps coming closer in a hurry your arms began to uncontrollably shake. What was left for you to say? Deny and call on Isabel? And make your life even more of a mess than it already is? Why did she have to add you did it on purpose? That plus saying you insulted her? Laura was going to kill you for sure now! And there is nothing you can do.

Just as you saw Laura's tall silhouette in lingerie appear from the corridor you ran to the other part of the living room, hiding behind your mother's sofa.
"OH MY F****** GOD THE LITTLE SHIT!" Exploded Laura's voice in a piercing shriek similar to a Valkyrie going in battle. From behind the sofa, you could partly see Laura's face, it was red, bursting with anger, in fact, what could be worse for a teenage girl than losing her precious smartphone? Especially one so expensive?
Laura in decided loud stomps came closer to you, each of her steps felt like the ground was shaking, but she came way too soon for you to process it. With teary eyes, you raised up your shaking arms in a cowering gesture.

"WHY THE HECK DID YOU DO THIS YOU TINY PRICK?!" Her loud screams made your whole body shake like a leaf while you were tetanized by fear, it was impossible to say a word. "THAT'S IT YOUR GONNA GET IT NOW!" She grabbed you by the neck, Her fingers were so long they totally wrapped your neck, with every step she took she also slightly lifted you off the ground so you spent a second in the air, that was a fair demonstration of the difference of power between you two.
With a rough pull, she sets your stomach against her knee, firmly holding you against it with one hand. And just as you understood what was gonna happen an overwhelming slap touched your bottom provoking an incredible pain in the meanwhile. This repeated, once, twice, five times, ten, twenty, you lost account while your cries resonated in the whole house, sheer torture, that's what you got for having tried to betray Isabel. Trying to break free only made the slapping increase in power or the hold Laura had on you tighten, you are far too weak to resist her. All you could do is cry in pain and take it all. Take the whole fury of Laura the babysitter, who you knew for sure, you wouldn't be able to confess to now.

Never in your life had you suffered such a beating, Laura had finally let you out and looked at you with a certain disdain. She pointed to your room, her face still red with anger. "Go to your room now boy! And just wait until I tell everything to your mother! Oh boy, you're gonna regret it!". You couldn't say anything but cry the left amount of water you had in your body. Stumbling around, you caught up on falling multiple times while awkwardly walking. Your bum hurt like it was against a hot metal piece, never had you been so afraid of Laura, you knew Isabel was a threat, but seeing how she managed to totally turn over someone usual so gentle into a maniacal monster in seconds made you regret your decision for sure. Speaking of Isabel, she just looked at you as you passed in front of her, you didn't want to look at her, and you were far too in pain to have any angry thoughts against her either. So you just kept on going until you finally reached your room. You laid on your stomach on your bed, crying while your bottom still hurt like crazy, somehow, sucking on your thumb felt like calming you down, it seemingly had the power to make you feel less stressed, and calmed your tears. The peace wasn't for long though, as your nice sister came in without knocking.

Isabel showed you the biggest victory grin she could, displaying in the meanwhile her flashy white teeth as she sat just next to you on the bed. Not liking staying near her and having suffered enough you chose to stand back up still sucking on the thumb. You both looked at each other for a second then she decided to speak first after letting out a little self-satisfied chuckle. Then in a coo, she formed a pout with her mouth and said "Poor baby Davy, big persons are so mean to him! He tries to defy his superiors and gets his little bum slapped booo.". Seeing you didn't answer she just ordered you "On your knees, here". You complied in a second, sitting where she pointed, even if this position made your ass hurt even more. Isabel took a similar posture from earlier but with her left foot on the knee this time, making it face level with you as you have her sole a few inches away from you.
"Breath in my superior smell." She just said. Her feet didn't stink that much, you recognized the odor that surrounded you for days pretty well, however it wasn't concentrated and was pretty easy to go through. "Smell that? Do you enjoy it?" She asks.
"I... Don't know...Izzy;.." You answer, trying to not sound defying at all. "That's the odor and sight of sheer defeat for you, breathe in deep and look closely." She casually add. Taking deep whiffs you got what she meant, you were trapped, she had you at her feet, and whenever you tried to fight her, the situation kept going worse for you. Whether was it destiny or Isabel outsmarting you, the sight of the bottom of her foot felt like a normal result of your pathetic tries. Isabel always ended one step ahead of you. Or rather always had your face stepped on by her higher-up's foot.

"That's right, breathe in...Hmmm...Good boy...." She gently said. You startled when you felt her hand touch the behind of your head but calmed and she just caressed you. It felt rather good, her gentle touch almost reminded you of your mother... What if Isabel was right? Maybe you should just accept it, you'll never win against her...
What if she managed to turn your aunt and worse your mother the same way she turned Laura against you? You couldn't deny she excelled at manipulating people... That plus she's rather sharp, and even strong to you now... Maybe that was your destiny? To be under Isabel? She had all the cards in her hands while you had none...

You suddenly opened your eyes and hugged Isabel's foot right against your face."Isabel, I beg you! You've won! I admit my defeat! You're my superior! Please stop it! I'll do anything." You cry out and look up at Isabel's surprised face before digging again against her foot.

" Ow, Really?... I don't trust you. You've just betrayed me remember? Sorry but not sorry." Isabel answered matter of factly.

You realized you had shrunk, and still slowly shrunk down as time passed, her feet had the typical effect on you. You pictured being frowned in her dirty shoes for eternity. Her hand wasn't caressing you anymore, but forcing you in place while she only showed disdain on her face.
"Oh please! Izzy! Please! I beg you! No! I'll do anything you want from me! Please give me another chance!" You cry out realizing she's planning to reduce you to nothing again.

However, she suddenly let's go and tap her chin using her finger. "I'm a bit surprised, I didn't expect you to accept your place that easily... I mean, you've been pretty much doing it by yourself, maybe that's what you truly want? Maybe you realized that's your place too? Let me think..."
You kept looking up at her praying she doesn't decide to shrink you to speck then Isabel's eyes look down at you again.
"Ok, I've decided to try round 2. From now on I want you to cut that Izzy crap, you'll consider me as your big sister and address or refer to me as such. Did I make myself clear?"
You look up and nod eagerly. "Yes! Got it, big sis!"
"Uhh... I don't think that will do never mind. " She says rolling her eyes.
"W...What ?! No! Big sis please!" You said begging profusely
" Never mind, it sounds fake as hell, you don't believe it, let's just drop it..."
You had to convince her she's the big one...No that wasn't it... Isabel is too smart to lets herself be fooled by your tricks, she had proven it over and over again. It was you who had to be convinced... Thinking about it, she's the tallest, the strongest and had proven she's the smartest too, maybe she was right, she's the big one between you two, she's your big sister! At least that's what she wants you to understand, and you're getting it now! She's your big sister!

That's at this precise time something definitely broke inside the young boy's mind. "Big sister Isabel, please! Please I beg you! I understand now! You're my superior! My everything! I was blind, you're better than me in any field, please! Accept me as your little brother Davy! Please, big sis, it's all I could wish! To be protected and guided by you!"

Isabel couldn't hide her surprised face by the boy's performance, he had grabbed her foot again and deliberately rubbed his face against it in submission, his little speech was impressive too, it came from the center of his heart and she felt it. She accepted giving him one last chance.

"C'me here" She grabbed Davy from his armpit and set him sat on her legs, the boy barely reached her chin.
"No more little schemes Davy?"
"Yes, big sis!" He answered.
Isabel caressed his hair from one hand and his stomach from the other, the little boy rested his head against her warm body, it felt so good, even if his butt still hurt.
"Oh yeah, and we have to make this room mine, I like this double-sized bed."
"Yes, big sis!"
"Oh yeah, and you'll ask mom to sleep with me, I want to have a little footstool at night to keep my cute feet pampered and warm."
"Oh! Yes, big sis!"
"Oh yeah, and now you're my little brother you have to ask my permission before doing anything ok?"
"Hm-hm!"Davy nodded with a warmed smile.
"Oh yeah, and whenever I go to a friend, you'll come with me so they can be your friends too!"
"Thanks big sis!"
"Ow, I love you tiny Davy."
"I love you too."

For once, Isabel and David shared a smile. David felt safer now.
152122111121221121221111121111221.title: Room confidence

15212211112122112122112.content: Or he could be her little lover or her little child?
15212211112122112122112.title: Other

choices: Trick or Treat: Smell Izzy's Feet
153.content:
You sneak into your younger sister's room, opening and closing the door without making a sound. Silently you manage to slink your way around her bed, noticing that one of her bare feet were sticking out of her blanket. You did your best to ignore this fact as your made your way to Isabel's face, then leaning in closely to her you yell out "Izzy, it's time to wake up!" shaking her shoulder while laughing at her.

Isabel wakes up and grabs your arm and in a strange twist ended up surprising you as she pulled it towards herself, kicking her barefoot outwards right into your face. The sound of her foot slapping you could be heard echoing throughout the room as Izzy pulled on your arm, pushing her foot harder against your face as she noticed what was going on.

"Whoops, sorry about that bro. Guess this will teach you a lesson about trying to scare your little sister, huh?" Izzy teased, repositioning her foot on the surface of your face so that your nose was caught between her big and second toe.

You tried your hardest to push Isabel's leg away from you but all the experience she gained from wrestling you had made her used to dealing with your old tricks, playfully kicking her free leg at your other arm as you tried to break her hold on it.

"What's wrong big brother? Don't you like the smell of my feet?" Izzy teased, scrunching her toes around your nose to further humiliate you in this situation. In one move she'd managed to dominate you with her foot, your senses overwhelmed by the foul smell and taste of her foot as you tried to mumble for her to stop.

"I'll let you go on one condition." Isabel paused.

"You agree to play whatever I want for the rest of today and I'll let you go." Isabel smirked, tightening her grip and pushing your head back with her foot. Your neck straightened up and breathing became difficult, you couldn't take it anymore and conceded to your younger sibling taping her calf in acceptance of your defeat.

Isabel finally released her grip on your arm and her foot lifted from your face, allowing you to breath air that didn't reek of the 8 year old's foot sweat as she sat up on her bed.

"Looks like I'm in charge today, huh bro?" Isabel asked, jumping off her bed and landing in front of you.

Meanwhile you were busy whipping tears from your eyes caused by a combination disgust for her feet and the humiliation you suffered by them. However as you went too look down at Isabel to discuss breakfast you realised she was staring directly into her eyes...at the same height as you were standing.

You thought this might be some kind of trick and looked down at Isabel's feet to see she was standing flat footed on the carpet, same as you were. Judging by the look on her face she was equally as shocked to be the same height as you were. Maybe she'd experienced a serious growth spurt overnight? Although you quickly dismissed this idea as you noticed that her pajamas still fit her perfectly. As odd as it might seem you were now somehow shorter, making you and Isabel the same height.

"Hmm you weren't always this short, right bro? I mean I'm not any taller." Isabel said addressing the elephant in the room. You were both curious as to how this happened but neither one of you could think of an explanation for this turn of events.

"Well if I had to guess I'd say it was caused by..." you paused not wanting to give Isabel any ideas if what you were thinking was true, glancing at her bare feet wondering if they were the cause for you shrinking down to Isabel's height.

"I know, maybe you'll shrink more after you_____________." Isabel said, leaving you speechless.

1. ...smell my feet.- Isabel makes you lay on the floor so you can smell her feet again to see if you shrink.

2. ...wrestle me.- Isabel challenges you to a wrestling match and blocks the exit so you can't escape her challenge.
153.title: Isabel's Power Awakens

1531.content:
"I know maybe you'll shrink more after you smell my feet again bro!" Izzy said this and it left you speechless. You looked down at her feet and back into her eyes. You couldn't believe you were in this situation in the first place, standing eye level with your 8 year old sister. You had shrunk 13 inches this morning! You didn't want there to be a chance of shrinking more, especially since you'd be shorter than your sister!

You said to your sister, "Look Izzy, I don't want to go near your feet again, I think we should get help from someone and ask why I shrunk." Isabel' facial expression changed after you said this. It went from a smile to her looking angry. "Don't make me make you smell my feet bro. Just do it!" You were actually intimidated by your sister after she said this to you, so you decided to just do it.

You knelt down and put your face near Izzy's feet. You breathed through your nose as you smelled her feet once again. The smell was the same as before, very foul and gross. Your sister bent down and shoved your face into her foot. She said, "Come on bro! Really take a good sniff! I know you love my feet!" Your nose was shoved in between Izzy's big and second toe again as the smell got worse and worse. When Izzy let go of you, you moved away from her feet and got up!

Izzy started to laugh as you stood to your full height. You had shrunken more! Izzy was now taller than you! The question is... How much did you shrink?
1531.title: Trick or Treat: Smell Izzy's Feet

15311.content: She looks at you in awe as you have shrunk too a size of a banana. She says "ooh lets have some fun". She motions you to lick her size 5 feet. You nod your head no, as an 8 year olds toes head strait or your small face. The sweet smell of her child feet make you drool. Your tounge slides out of your mouth and covers your sisters little feet in saliva. She wiggles her toes with spit sealing out from in between them.
15311.title: About a foot (3 feet tall)

choices: A Shrinking Experience With Isabel's Dirty Socks
1532.content:
"Maybe you shrink when I beat you in something, so to test that out were gonna wrestle and since we're the same size now I can totally beat you." Isabel teased, challenging you directly.

"Yeah I don't know about that sis but I can't afford to waste my time with your games." You tell Izzy, trying to step around her so you can leave.

In order to stop you Isabel simply lifted her left food and took a wide side over to block your path "Uh, uh, uh, you're not going anywhere unless you beat me first big brother!" she teased, holding her hand over your head to remind you that you were the same size as an eight year old girl.

You didn't want to admit that you were too scared to wrestle her, or find out that she might be right. Dealing with equal sized little brat was proving difficult enough, you couldn't imagine what she might do if she was even bigger than you. "I'm serious Izzy, I don't have time for this." You said trying to make any excuse to leave your sister's room, hoping that with time you'd return to your normal height.

"Sound's to me like your scared I might beat you, can't say I blame you I did just wake up and kick your butt didn't I bro." Isabel teased, trying to antagonize you into a fight with her.

Unfortunately for you it was working "You caught me off guard earlier, that won't happen again!" You yell out, digging your own grave.

"Oh yeah, then why don't you prove it." Isabel taunted, raising her hand and signaling for you to make the first move.

You couldn't help yourself from attacking, you wanted to shut her up so badly that you charged your sister with all you had. Then, just when you got in front of her you ducked down and grabbed Isabel's leg, knocking her off balance and bringing her down to the floor with you.

However while you were both falling to the ground Isabel made a quick maneuver that turned the tides in her favor yet again. Using her other leg to stay on top of you as she fell forward Isabel managed to land on top of you cushioning her own fall while you absorbed the impact for her. Your younger and now heavier than you remembered sister landed on your back, knocking all the air out of your lungs and possibly bruising your ribs.

You rolled over trying to regain control before Isabel could make her next move but it was already too late, as flip to face the ceiling you vision was completely shadowed by Isabel's young butt. She sat on top of your face and laughed at you "Hehe, how does my big butt smell big brother?" she teased, shifting her butt from side to side as you attempted to push her off of your face.

"You know you're actually pretty comfy, maybe I'll use you as a chair when I'm watching cartoons from now on." She teased, mocking you. Isabel had already managed to get one of your arms under her knee and was in the process of trying to trap the other, you quickly acted knowing that if she caught it there would be no escape. You couldn't let yourself be defeated by your sister's butt.

However for once luck was on your side as you managed to force Isabel off of you, finally you could start breathing again. But as you tried turning around to get up you found that Isabel was still two steps ahead of you in this match, she'd never dominated you so easily before in a wrestling match, not even when you let her win.

She spread her legs enough to catch your head and clamped them shut around your neck, hooking her feet onto one another to improve her grip. She began squeezing her thighs together tightly around your head as you did your best to break free, you still hadn't had enough time to even catch your breath completely and you were running low on energy to fight back.

You could hear your bones rubbing together as Isabel tightened her grip even more, though try as you might you were unable to break free. You didn't want to do it but you couldn't help yourself, you raised your arm and tapped Isabel's thigh repeatedly until she got the message that you'd given up. You could feel her grip weaken as you conceded to her overwhelming victory but was it because she felt you give up or had you actually shrunk more. You hoped for the former of the two options although you would soon find out for yourself.

"Yay I won, get up now David. I wanna see if your any smaller?" Isabel said excitedly, rising to her feet and standing up over you. Had you shrunk?

Yes- Losing to Isabel had shrunk you down to level with her chest.

No- Losing doesn't shrink you, it must be something else.

No- You hadn't shrunk and Isabel lets you go so you can do the laundry.
1532.title: Wrestling With Your Growing Sister

15321.content:
Much to your own shock and horror losing your wrestling match with Isabel had actually shrunk you down further in size, almost a foot in height so that you were now smaller than your eight year old sister. You looked up at her front level with her chest as her lips contorted to form a wide smile, at that moment you knew things were only going to get worse for you from now on. Worse of all now Isabel was fully aware of your shrinking, not only that but she now had a concrete method for making you even smaller.

"Hehe, your so short now big-er opps. I mean my little brother." Isabel teased, laughing at you now that you were the size of a 5 or 6 year old.

"Okay Izzy, you had your fun now let me out of here!" You said, trying your best to sound as commanding as possible. Not that it helped when staring down a 7 foot tall(at least from your perspective) version of your not so little sister.

"Sorry David, but now that your little I'm the big sister and that means you should listen to me now. Don't forget you agreed to play with me all day." Isabel nodded, feeling superior as she cornered you.

"Let me through Isabel, right now!" You yelled, bumping into her chest as she used her larger body to block your path.

"And why should I, we still have so many games I want to play with you. Who knows maybe if you beat me you'll grow instead of shrinking more. But I won't let that happen, I like you being shorter than me so much better." Isabel grinned, trapping you yet again into playing her games. You wanted to escape but its not like you could force your way through her, you couldn't even win a wrestling match against her when you were the same size. Worst case scenario is that she'd turn your escape into a rematch and beat you again, even easier this time. Shrinking you who knows how much.

"Okay Izzy, okay. I'll play with you. What's the next game?" You asked, hating every moment as you submitted to your younger sister's whims. But you had to admit she had a point, if losing shrunk you then all you had to do was make sure you won and maybe you'd grow a few inches instead.

"Hmm, let me think?" Isabel hummed, putting her hand to her chin as she most likely tried to think of a game in which she would have a clear advantage in over you.

"Let's play Simon Says." Isabel giggled, rubbing her hands together as her smile turned evil.

"Really, Simon Says? That's not so bad." you thought aloud, not seeing a possibility in which you'll lose.

"Okay brother, now listen very closely and do whatever I tell you. Oh and if I don't win in five moves then you do." Isabel snickered, clearly having a plan to throw you off your game.

"Simon Says, jump up and down." She said, starting the games as you did just that. Surprised by the fact that even as you jumped your face never reached the height of Izzy's.

"Now stop." She followed up, already trying to throw you off your game.

"Nice try sis but you won't trick me that easily." You said, feeling so sure of yourself and your inevitable victory. No wonder she put such an obvious handicap on herself, she must have expected you to fall for that early on.

"Good boy, now Simon Says waddle like a penguin." and much to your own embarrassment you obeyed her commands, placing your hands facing outwards on your hips and lifting one foot up and a time, swaying from side to side and switching feet as you moved.

"Hehe, you look silly. Now Simon Says bark like a dog." Isabel said, trying to contain her own laughter.
