"Woof, Woof!" You barked, not wanting to to lose this game. Now all you had to do obey one more command and you'd win and hopefully grow a few inches in the process. Unfortunately for you Isabel still had a trick or two up her sleeve.

"Hehe good doggy. Finally Simon Says to get down and kiss my toes!" Isabel yelled, laughing at you.

"What?" You asked in a moment of shock and awe.

"Opps, you didn't do as Simon told you. Guess that means I win huh?" Isabel laughed.

"Wait, but I-I'll do it." You said, willing to kiss your sister's stinky toes if it meant you wouldn't shrink any further than you already had. So why didn't you do it when she asked you to.

"Too late. Now shrink for me so we can play more." Isabel said, successfully outsmarting you.

You watching in agony as Isabel started getting even bigger right before your eyes, meanwhile her eyes filled with joyous wonder as she watched you shrink right before her for the first time. Sure you'd gotten smaller before but she'd never watch it happen first hand, the first time it happened she wasn't even aware of it and the second time you'd shrunk before you could even stand up.

Soon it stopped and you now stood at a height equal to Isabel's hips, now she was nearly twice your size and more intimidating than ever before. This must have been her plan along.

"Hehe, you're so tiny. Just like a wittle baby." She teased, although it was an accurate representation of your height.

Isabel was now easily over 10 feet tall from your point of view and if you kept falling for her tricks it would be long before she was even bigger.

"Don't worry little brother, I still have plenty of games we can play until you're teeny tiny. I just can't wait to figure out just how small I can make you." Isabel teased, revealing her master plan. She wanted to turn her brother into a bug. What game will she play next to accomplish this goal?

1. Tug-of-War, Isabel grabs her discarded knee high socks from yesterday and forces David to play Tug-of-War with them as the rope, but will her socks accelerate the pace at which he shrinks.

2. Rock, Paper, Scissors, Isabel attempts to shrink David several times over by challenging him to multiple rounds of Rock, Paper, Scissors, of course this also give David a huge opportunity to regain some of his lost height(if winning causes him to grow).
15321.title: Disobedience Leads to Shrinking

choices: To the Victor Goes the Spoils
153212.content:
"Look at how little you've become, I bet Laura or Sally would love to make fun of you like this." Isabel teased, dealing with one brat around her age like this was bad enough but two would be almost indefinitely worse. Not only that but if Isabel attempt to play a game with you and Sally and you ended up losing would you lose the same amount of height or shrink twice because you lost to two people instead of just one.

"Quick question bro, do these pants make my butt look big?" Isabel asked while spinning on her heels, thrusting her young rear outwards so that it was practically rubbing up against your face. You tried your best to push her away but it became increasingly difficult given the fact that she was twice your size and bound to get even bigger.

This was bad, you thought to yourself. Your height now barely allowed for you to reach your younger sister's butt and if you kept falling for her tricks you were only gonna get smaller.

"Don't worry bro, you'll be smaller in no time at all after we play Rock, Paper, Scissors." Isabel said, turning back around so she could look down at you. Was she kidding? She had to be, there was no way she could have expected to shrink you in a game of chance. You had at least the same odds of beating her as she did of winning against you.

However childish her game might seem her plan was still obvious, this was probably the only game that she could use to shrink you multiple times in a row without stopping. Not only that but you still hadn't been able to test your theory that you might grow a few inches if you managed to beat her in a game, for all you no nothing would happen at all.

With this thought floating around in the back of your mind Isabel raised her hand and announced the start of the game. "Rock, Paper, Scissors, says....shoot!" She said, throwing rock. Unfortunately in your haste to make a decision you choose scissors, meaning that you lost the first round and a bit more of your height.

"That's right big brother, shrink some more for me. Actually, I guess I should get used to calling you my little brother from now on." Isabel teased, not that it helped the situation any as you watched her get even bigger. You continued shrinking, losing nearly a quarter of your already diminished height from a little game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. You stopped shrinking about somewhere down your little sister's thigh, thinking it was strange that you were using her as a way to measure yourself.

"Wow, if you keep losing games like that then pretty soon you'll be able to hug my toes." Isabel teased, as if you wanted to be anywhere nearly her smelly feet. Lucky they were still quite a bit smaller than you as you looked down, but even at this size they were he biggest feet you've ever seen.

"Ready for round two?" She asked, immediately going into the motion of shaking her fist.

"Rock, Paper, Scissors. Shoot!" She giggled, throwing rock again. Fortunately for you this time you'd learned from your mistake and threw paper instead. Meaning you finally one a game. You could feel yourself get slightly taller, however it was not at the same rate at which you'd shrunk earlier. In fact your height still only allowed you to reach Izzy's thigh, just an inch or two higher.

"Wow, looks like someone had a growth spurt." She teased, barely noticing the difference in height. At this rate you'd have to beat her a hundred times to get back to normal size, but she only had to beat you once to undo any progress you made and then some. Practically nothing had changed, at this size you were still small enough to walk through Isabel's legs standing straight up.

While panicked by these thoughts you heard Isabel say "...Scissors, Shoot!" She already started the next round and you threw scissors again in a rush to make a decision. Like before it was the wrong one as you noticed Izzy had made her hand into a fist, crushing you with rock.

"Well it was fun while it lasted, but you were meant to shrink for me, not get bigger." Isabel teased as you began shrinking again, the height you gained lost before you could even blink. At your new height you barely reached the eight year old's knees, easily making her four times bigger than you, in one game she'd managed to double her size advantage over you.

"Hehe, you're so tiny now. Even babies are bigger than you." Isabel teased, however you realized these words to be the truth.

Just then...

1. Isabel suggests another game for you to play with her, something she has a clear advantage in.

2. Your mom calls upstairs to let Isabel know that Sally's here, she forgot her best friend was coming over but decides to let her in on the fun by making you wrestle her too.

3. Laura who was suppose to be babysitting Isabel walks into the room and see you shrunk, she asks how it's possible and Izzy explains everything. Peaking your cousin's interest.
153212.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors, Shrink!

choices: Humiliated By Sally's Feet and Butt
1532122.content:
"Izzy, your friend Sally's here. She's coming up." Your mom yelled up the stairs, you wanted to call out for her attention but you were practically the size of a toddler now and no doubt Isabel would stop you before you could yell out anything useful. You were trapped playing her games and to make matters worse her best friend was here to join in on the fun of shrinking you.

"Oh no." you muttered to yourself, realizing that your sister might not be the only one capable of shrinking you. What if losing a game against Sally would also shrink you closer to the size of a bug like Isabel wanted. What if you lost a single game against both girls? Would you shrink the same amount or shrink twice as much because there was two of them?

Then you looked up at your younger sister, about half your age but easily four time bigger than you in your current state. She was having so much fun playing with and shrinking you that shed all but forgotten that she'd invited sally over for the day. Luckily this worked out perfectly because now she had the perfect plaything for the two of them to enjoy. Now all she had to do was make sure that you continued to get smaller and smaller.

The door to your sister's room swung open and you instinctively thought to hide behind your sister's leg, still embarrassed that your face didn't even reach above her knees. Sally walked in and the two girls started talking as if all was normal, you were surprised that Isabel's first thought wasn't to tell Sally about what happened to you.

Of course it didn't take Sally long to notice a tiny teenager hiding behind Isabel's leg. Naturally you caught her interest but you were just as curious to find out how much bigger than you you young girl would appear given your current situation.

"Um, Izzy. Who's that, are you babysitting or something?" Sally asked, thinking you were a toddler.

"Hey Dave" starts your cousin "Would you mind if we.. well.. shrink you just a little?" she ask you with a baby face and a finger in her mouth.

"Man, you two are nuts, just.. leave me alone for now, I'm trying to enjoy this game" you retort, annoyed by their odd request.

You sigh and roll eyes.. "Whatever" you mumble, not caring.

Isabel and Laura then look at each others and grin.

15423221.content:
"Are you ready to teach your brother a lesson, Isabel?" Laura said with a devious grin

"Of course! This is going to be so much fun! I can't wait to be the one in charge for once!"

You are beginning to grow nervous from how confident the girls are in there ability to dominate you, but you aren't willing to show it. As far as you're concerned, these two are just your younger siblings. Even if your little sister and cousin somehow did have this weird power that they were bragging about, you were still older than them. You should still be in charge of them.

Ignoring you once again, they begin to inhale the stench of their feet. The look on their faces meant that they weren't enjoying the stench at all, but they were enduring it for some reason... Just then, their plan starts to take effect: Right before your eyes, the girls are __________ by smelling eachother's feet!

154232212.title: Getting superpowers

choices: They produce tens of thousands of copies, covering the city and beyond.
The copies merge with the originals, becoming 10 times bigger.
1542322121.content:
You're easily taller and stronger than any one of them (well, at least Isabel), but there's no competing with an army of fifty. Dozens of arms eventually pull your body to the floor, where you're dogpiled by physically identical gloating sisters and giggling cousins. The mass of bodies easily weighs you down while others teasingly press their nasty stinky feet all over you. Still, you struggle as hard as you can. They've certainly shown that their feet are capable of bizarre powers – you have no intention of simply letting them work their freaky magic on you. Your skin crawls with revulsion...

"Haha! How do you like this, David?" one of the Isabels crows.

"Now there's nothing you can do!" one of the Lauras adds triumphantly. "So hurry up and shrink like we wanted!"

You struggle and fight, but there's little to be done about the crowd of girls standing on or draped across you, a few dozen stinky feet covering your entire body. The smell is nauseating and you suppress your gag reflex.

But after a minute or so, another new fact becomes apparent. Regardless of any prior assertions of magical powers, you aren't shrinking at all. Absolutely no change whatsoever... apart from the fact that you are beginning to reek of stinky feet. Your cousin – well, one of them at least – gives voice to this fact first. "Hey, Isabel, he's not shrinking!"

The crowd of girls seems to frown in unison. "Why not?" your sister mutters. "Was it because we're using our other feet powers instead?"

All the Lauras shrug. "So, what should we do?"

The Isabels grin. "What do you think?" The Lauras match their grins, and within a few seconds the entire crowd of girls have collapsed to the floor again. Your own brows furrow in confusion... then shoot up in horror as they all shove their feet into each other's faces before taking a simultaneous deep breath. The foundation of the house shudders as dozens of copies begin popping into existence. Laughter fills the air, a stomach-churning sound overlaid with the heavy sniffing and breathing of the orgy of feet worship. You grimace, feeling the weight of more and more bodies pressing your tired flesh into the carpet.

Luckily, with the crowd of girls more occupied with sniffing than subduing, you find both the strength and the purchase to crawl toward the front door, eventually breaking free and scrambling to your feet and freedom outside. You continue until you reach the street, waving your arms about in a vain attempt to waft away the stench clinging to your body, before turning back and apprehensively eyeing your house.

The structure shimmies and shudders, and activity is clearly visible through the windows and the still-open front door. The heaving groans of stressed floorboards and support struts barely outpaces the muffled giggling of an unknown but terrifying number of manic girls, and a cold sweat prickles at the nape of your neck. The sweat only magnifies as additional copies of Isabel and Laura begin spilling out the front door, each of them quickly diving toward the closest outstretched foot and taking a deep breath... only for more copies to appear and repeat the process. Like a bizarre advancing wave of young girls, the front lawn is gradually becoming covered in materializing bodies. You take a few shaky steps down the road as you reevaluate your safety from the middle of the street...

More activity catches your eye, and your stomach drops further.

The front door isn't the only entrance to the house, you note with dismay, as you spot an advancing sea of foot-sniffing girls in the back yard around the side of the house. With growing horror, you realize that, not only is the house likely filled with copies of your sister and cousin... not only are doppelgangers creating more and more copies across the front yard... the back yard is also swarming with a multiplying crowd of only two faces...

And the process is speeding up.

As more copies are created, more copies exist to sniff their own feet and thus create even more copies. Mathematical exponential growth, accelerating without end... and you're powerless to stop it. The absolute terror robs you of your senses, utterly frozen and incapable of reacting as the tidal wave of girls spreads into the street.

"Ahhhhh, that was so awesome!"

The thunderous vocalization jolts your brain back into gear. By some unspoken signal, all the Isabels and Lauras stop their sniffing at the same time and sigh in response before voicing the exact same line simultaneously. With an absurd number of flailing arms and legs, the crowd of girls scramble to their feet, then turn toward you in a disturbing display of synchronicity, flashing utterly justified shit-eating grins on their faces. There's a bit more shuffling, and one copy each of Isabel and Laura push their way through the crowd before stepping up to you.

"Uh..." You work your jaw, but in your stupor you barely have the capacity for rational conversation, even if you can properly get your suddenly dry mouth to work properly.

The (presumably) original Isabel grins, hands on her hips. "Haha! What do you think, David?"

"Incredible, right?" The (seemingly) original Laura chimes in, her eyes twinkling with mirth. "We made a whole army in just a few minutes! There's about a thousand of each of us now!"

"Yeah!" Isabel crowed. "We're totally unstoppable!"

"Which means..." Laura laughs.

"...there's only..." Isabel adds.

"...one thing left to do!" The two finish together.

You swallow nervously, lick your dry lips, and shakily ask, "A-and what's that?"

They both smirk wickedly and declare, "Take over the world with our feet, of course!"
1542322121.title: Multiplying Girls

choices: The giant girls take a short breather to torment you with their enormous feet.
The giant girls immediately continue with their plan of world conquest.
15423221212.content:
You grimace. Of course their goal turns out to be absolutely childish, utterly horrifying, and actually obtainable given their powers. Still, they're only young girls. Even numbering in the thousands, you're pretty sure they'll still be stopped eventually by the sheer military might and nuclear options available to the whole country, much less the entire world. Once the world governments realize the tsunami swarming across the continent consists of unprotected, unarmed young maidens, a tactical display of pure explosive force will likely halt their conquest in its entirety, quite possibly permanently. A cocktail of emotions swirls through your heart, considering that the planned actions of your sister and cousin – still family, even considering everything that's happened – may lead to their brutal but entirely justifiable deaths.

Isn't there any way you can stop this from happening?

"Jeez, yeah okay, Pinky and The Brain," you retort without much heat. It's pretty tough being assertive before a crowd of identical grinning girls. "So you can make copies of yourselves. Big deal. Don't you think the authorities are gonna retaliate pretty hard when they see you multiplying across the country?"

Isabel snorts in derision, though Laura seems to be giving your argument actual consideration, cupping her chin as her brows furrow in thought. Good. If you can convince them to give up this worldwide conquest of theirs, then—

"Yeah, they probably would," Laura slyly purrs, her frown quickly morphing into a feral grin. "You think I wouldn't have thought of that? We've got something else in mind. After all, this isn't our only super power."

You feel the hairs stand up on your neck. Behind the girls, your house rumbles ominously.

"Uh-huh!" Isabel chimes in smugly. "While we were smelling our feet earlier, we found out they can do something else amazing too! Wanna see?"

You slowly shake your head, but the girls are already in motion. An additional copy of each girl approaches before kneeling on the street in front of the originals. Sharing a glance and a quick grin, Isabel and Laura each raise one leg over their respective copy's face, the doubles almost reverently reaching up and grasping the originals' feet before mashing them against their flesh. Your confusion lasts only a few moments before the copies begin shrinking, starting slow then rapidly disappearing beneath the originals' tread. Within a minute or so, the copies are completely gone, vanishing under the soles of your sister and cousin.

Blinking, you stare at their feet for a long moment, expecting something else to happen. When nothing does, you shake your head before looking up again. "Oooookay, so what did—"

Isabel giggles.

You swallow hard, your skin feeling cold and clammy, as you stare into your little sister's eyes. Eyes that are currently level with yours.

Laura laughs as well, and you can't help but glance aside... directly at your cousin's still developing chest.

Ice settles in your veins, your brain crunching the numbers even as your other thoughts vacate. Your small younger sister, who normally measures only 4'4" tall, now stands eye-to-eye with you— Isabel steps closer. —strike that, she's slightly taller than your 5'5" stature. And your 14-year-old cousin, who usually meets your gaze evenly (due to her slightly earlier growth spurt), now towers head and shoulders above you— Laura steps closer as well. —way above you, nearing 6'10" in height. Calculations complete, your mind slips another gear and you can only gape thunderstruck at the two enlarged girls.

Your house rumbles again, stronger, even more ominously.

"See what we mean, big bro?" Isabel replies in a voice somewhat louder than usual. Then she grins. "Or are you now the 'little' bro?"

"Definitely 'little' I think," Laura chimes in mercilessly, reaching up to ruffle your hair. Her hand, usually smaller and more delicate than yours, easily covers the top of your head. "I think you get it, though. Sure, we can smell our feet and make endless copies of ourselves, but it looks like we can also use our feet to absorb our copies, too. And that, as you can see, makes us grow bigger."

"Bigger!" Isabel echoes. "Each copy makes us bigger and bigger! And if we make more copies after that..."

You already understand, even as they gloatingly describe the ever-worsening circumstances. The world's military can easily subdue an army of identical young girls, certainly. But if those same girls are the size of trucks or houses or office buildings...

"By the way," Laura adds, interrupting your thoughts. "We're connected with our copies too. Like a hive mind. So I know you'll be completely blown away right... about..."

*CRUNCH*

"NOW!"

Your house rumbles yet again, before the front wall abruptly collapses outward. Amid the shower of crumbling brick, insulation, and drywall, hands nearly the size of shipping pallets plow through the cloud of debris before reaching down and grasping the edge of the front porch. Arms like birch tree trunks flex and pull forward, dragging forth a blonde-haired head larger than a clothes dresser, followed by proportionately sized shoulders and a prepubescent upper body. You stand transfixed and terrified as the enormous form of Isabel looks up and spears you with a self-indulgent grin, before effortlessly crawling out of the house, trailing wreckage in her wake. Once outside, she briefly smooths her outfit – which strangely seems to have grown with her – and proudly stands up at a staggering 30' height, nearly even with the highest ridge of the angled roof of your two-story house.

Another eruption sounds from the back of the house, sending a bigger cloud of dust and debris wafting across the back yard. Moments later, Laura's gigantic brunette head surges above the roof behind Isabel, another excessively smug grin already in place. Towering nearly 38' tall, your cousin gingerly eases herself around the house, her footfalls sending minor tremors through the ground, further rattling your already shaking teeth. Her hips, somehow still clad in her habitual super-tight Daisy Dukes, easily brush the 20' eaves, rattling the gutters and inevitably drawing your eyes up and down her extremely long and shapely teenage legs. After strutting halfway across the front yard she pauses and crosses her arms, staring down at you with an air of utmost superiority.

"How about now, cousin?" Laura asks blithely, tilting her head in challenge. "Still think we can't do it?"

You have no words. Frozen completely in the middle of the street, your thoughts can only focus on the unbelievable nightmare unfolding before you.

Isabel giggles again. "Oh yeah, and we're not done just yet! Come on, girls!"

The remaining copies flock toward the colossal feet of the gigantic Isabel and Laura before grabbing hold and shrinking down like ice on a red hot skillet. Now that you're paying proper attention, you can easily see their mass transfer to the two giantesses as they swell bit by bit into the sky. And even though the rate of growth seems to be slowing, given the increasing disparity in size, the sheer number of remaining copies keeps on coming for a few minutes longer... until all the extras have finally returned to the originals.

You stare blankly at your giggling 43' tall sister and your smirking 54' tall cousin as they pose brazenly on your front lawn, and you can't help but worry about what's to come...
15423221212.title: Consolidating Forces

choices: Travel all those miles to get to her face and try to get her attention
155.content:
You think for a joke that you are going to sneak up on here and scare her. You enter her room closing the door behind you and then quietly tip-toe over to the far side of her bed. Slowly you lift her bed sheets up and crawl face first up in them. Soon you are lying in her bed with her next to you, still sound asleep, your positioned so that your feet are at the top of her bed by her head and your head is by the end of her bed by her feet.

You want to scare her by starting to playfully gnaw on her teeth to make her think that a mouse or rat or something like that is chewing on her feet. Slowly you inch your head towards her feet and soon you head is right by them and you then put your mouth on her big toe and start playfully gnawing. Suddenly you feel something quickly wisp by your side. Without thinking you move your head with her foot in your mouth and bang it into the wooden end of her bed, knocking yourself out cold.

A while later:
You stand up moaning and clutching your head. "Ouch, that was a complete waste, she didn't even wake up to get scared!" Looking around all you it is hard to see because of darkness. "Where am I?" you wonder aloud, "I can't be in her bed still, I wouldn't be able to stand up then." You try walking around to see where you are and get your bearings, but all you can make out is a large plain with some kind of ridge far away and that seems to be moving farther away by the minute.

You start to run towards the ridge, when sudden the very ground you are running on begins to move, like there's an earthquake and suddenly some light shines in from the far, far distance. Getting a better view of things you see that you are standing on a peach colored plain and the ridge that is moving off in the distance is some smooth, whitish surface. Thouroughly confused you continue your run towards the moving ridge as fast as you can.

After what seems to be the longest time the peach colored plain starts to dip down and you ridge looms closer and closer. You focus so much on ridge that you fail to notice the increase in slope and soon you trip and start sliding down the steep slope until you hit the ridge with an "Omph!" You stand up and look around and notice that the ground is covered in some type of mushy substance, your knee deep in whatever it is. You then walk over to the ridge and see that it shoots straight up from here and that it is not as smooth as it first appeared, it is filled with all sorts of cracks and ridges. You want to climb up and get a better view to see where you are.

You look up towards the top of the ridge and see that the top seems to be moving away and then you notice that your legs seem to be even deeper in the mush, "That's weird," you say frowning. You are either getting smaller somehow or this landscape is getting larger. "Oh well" you think as you begin climbing up to the top of the ridge as fast as possible.

Later you reach the top of the huge ridge, exhausted, and look around to again see almost nothing in the slightly brighter darkness. Suddenly the hard ground beneath your feet quakes and you fall forward off the edge of the ridge. You hit of the side of ridge as you fall and then start to slide against it. After several minutes of sliding the ground begins to even out beneath you and soon you come grinding to a halt.

You stand back up and once again the ground beneath you shakes and light shines in as the darkness is lifted from above. You look around...and your heart skips a beat. You just just realized where you are. You have shrunken and you are on your sister! You are small beyond belief too! You must be nearly microscopic compared to Isabel!

Right now Isabel is lying on her back and you are on her ankle. Miles off in the distance, down your sister's impossiple long legs, you can see a pair of black short shorts, and then past that you can see that she is wearing a hot pink shirt, and then extremely far off into the distance you can sortof see her enormous face, a landmass all its own.
155.title: Joke.... or not?

Optistmic thoughts really help.You look on,and decided what you were going to do.You're going to explore your sister's body,no matter what.It could be sexy,it could be fun,and it could be dangerous.But,you smiled.Before you was Isabel,herself an expansive world,thousands upon thousands,maybe millions,of miles big.

In the extremely far distance are Isabel's short shorts, if you're going anywhere except her foot you'll need to go through them, even if the fabric of her shorts is touching her skin you'll still need to go under, climbing up even the seam could be way more effort than it's worth. You're getting ahead of yourself though, right now you need to start walking, you're never going to reach Isabel's shorts by fantasizing about them, you start your march of which might take days.

You take care not to hurt your ankles by stepping in any pores and press onwards but suddenly the thought arises of what to do when Isabel gets up and starts going throughout her day, what if you fall off, could you?
Looking around yourself, even from side to side Isabel's leg stretches like plains for miles, not to mention from her hips to her feet, at this size you woulden't be surprised if your new goddess had her own gravity, and if she didn't you could easily continue climbing or find some minor imperfection in the skin to sleep in until she goes to bed.
The possibilities are endless at this size and Isabel's god-like form is like an oddly shaped planet just for you to explore, her size is hard to comprehend, even though at your normal size she was significantly shorter and smaller than you she is so big she woulden't even notice you if she were looking right at you.
The size of Isabel has gotten you thinking, at your size how big would somebody like Laura be? At full size she was about as tall as you which is again, significantly taller than Isabel, even though she's your cousin you think Laura is pretty hot, if you could somehow get transferred from Isabel to Laura you would have a much bigger world to explore. Your mother too, she was even taller than you if only a little bit, but she was also quite big, not quite fat but still pretty chunky, she would be two times as big as Isabel to explore.

You bring yourself back to the task of exploring Isabel, if you never grow back (which you're sort of hoping) you could spend the rest of your life exploring god-like women like Isabel.
Through all your thought you must've been walking for at least an hour, Isabel must've stayed up late last night to sleep in to what you assume is near 11 in the morning, through all your walking you've only noticed a slight difference in how close you are to Isabel's short shorts but a difference is a difference.

Suddenly your goddess of a sister starts moving probably to get out of bed, you see a barely noticable (to Isabel) crack in Isabel's skin and it would be perfect to rest in if you don't stick to Isabel's skin, alternatively you could trust that Isabel is big enough to have her own gravity and stay out in the open.
